T02TD2510.1E:106b-31: bshags pa dang ga sol ba 'debs pa la sogs pa ni gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:106b-32: phyag rgya dgrol ba ni gsum pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:107a-2: 'di dag dang gos gsum pa brje bar yang bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:107a-3: de la sdom pa rnams la gnas pa ni gos dang po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:107a-4: ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa ni gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:107a-5: phyi gos gtsang ma ni gsum pa zhes bya bar bshad do //
T02TD2510.1E:107a-6: de nas phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02TD2510.1E:107a-7: nyin re zhing sdom pa gzung ba yang lan drug tu bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:107a-8: de nas sdog pa dral ba dang phyag rgya thams cad dgrol ba ji lta ba bzhin du byas la rnal 'byor chen po bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:107a-9: de nas snying gar dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:107a-10: yang na rnal 'byor chen po dang ldan pas dang po'i sbyor ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:107a-11: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog rnam par bsgoms nas bsdu ba byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:107a-12: phyag 'tshal ba dang ched du brjod pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:107a-13: rang gi snying gar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs par lhag par mos pa yang byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:107a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams byung la rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis gnas nas ched du brjod pa chen du brjod par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:107a-15: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu gyur ba'i rnal 'byor pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las phreng ba'i dbang nga skur ba la sogs pa dbang bskur ba thams cad blangs la /
T02TD2510.1E:107a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:107a-20: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:107a-21: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la dbang bskur te /
T02TD2510.1E:107a-22: phrin las rnams la nges par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:107a-23: de la dang po re zhig rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag chen po bcings la sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu bsdus par mdzod cig ces rang gi las la nges par sbyar bar bya'o ;
T02TD2510.1E:107a-24: / de bzhin du sems ma dang /
T02TD2510.1E:107a-27: las kyi rdo rje mas rigs thams cad bsdus par rgyas gdab par mdzod cig ces bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:107b-0: mi bskyod pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub tu sems bskyed par mdzod cig / rin chen 'byung ldan la @107b sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:107b-1: 'od dpag tu med pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
T02TD2510.1E:107b-2: don yod par grub pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzod cig ces bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:107b-3: rdo rje sems dpa' la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub kyi sems la rab tu gzhag par mdzod cig / rdo rje rgyal po la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:107b-4: chags pas rjes su mnyes par mdzod cig / legs pas legs so zhes bya bas mnyes par mdzod cig / rin chen gyis dbang bskur bar mdzod cig / nyi mas nyi ma'i 'od kyis snang bar mdzod cig / rgyal mtshan gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'jog par mdzod cig / bzhad pas 'dzum pa rmad du byung ba la rab tu gzhag par mdzod cig / chos kyis shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'jog par mdzod cig / rnon pos sems can gyi nyon mongs pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:107b-5: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gcod par mdzod cig /'khor los de rnams dkyil 'khor du zhugs par mdzod cig / smra bas spros pa med pa'i chos nyid la nges par sbyor bar mdzod cig / rdo rje las kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i mchod pas mchod par mdzod cig / srung bas theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa'i sems nyid las rjes su srungs shig / gnod sbyin srung ba yongs su bskyangs pas de rnams yongs su srungs shig / khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur sgrubs shig ces bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:107b-6: sgeg mo la sogs pa la /
T02TD2510.1E:107b-14: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de rnams nges par sbyor cig / rdo rje lcags kyus byang chub kyi sems kyi lcags kyus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du dgug par mdzod cig / zhags pas byang chub kyi spyod pa'i zhags pas gzhug tu gsol /
T02TD2510.1E:107b-15: lcags sgrog gi theg pa gzhan 'dod pa'i sems la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dral ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-0: @108a * // shes rab kyi pho rol tu phyin ba'i bsam gtan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcing du gsol //
T02TD2510.1E:108a-1: 'bebs pas rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhing skye ba med par 'bebs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'bebs par mdzod cig ces bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-2: byangs pa la sogs pa la dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer yongs su skyongs shig ces bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:108a-3: thams cad du thams cad kyi rang rang gi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-4: rang gi phrin las la des par sbyar ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:108a-5: de ltar las kyi rgyal po mchog rnam par bsgoms nas yang rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas bsdu ba byas te /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-6: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas yang dag par bstod nas /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-7: ji lta ba bzhin du dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-10: dbang du bya ba byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-11: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-12: phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-13: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad de /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-14: rdo rje go chas srung ba thams cad yang dag par srungs la /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab la dbang bskur te /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-17: mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba dang phyi'i yo byad thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-18: sgeg mo la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-19: las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i mchod pa bcu drug dang /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-21: mchod pa'i khyad par thams cad kyis yang legs par mchod la /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-27: badzra sa tva zhes brjod la /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-28: thams cad kyang bdag kho na yin no zhes bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:108a-29: de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bas bstod la /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-30: de bzhin du yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-31: ji lta ba bzhin du phyag byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-32: phyag rgya dgrol bar byas la dbang bskur te /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-33: go cha bgos nas mnyam pa'i thal mos kyang mnyes par byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-34: badzra sa tva zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-35: yi ge brgya ba yang brjod la /
T02TD2510.1E:108a-36: mngon par 'dod pa'i dpa'i dngos grub kyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos nas mchod yon phul lo //
T02TD2510.1E:108b-0: slar byon ba'i phyir bskul te gshegs @108b su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:108b-1: de nas rdo rje bsrung ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:108b-3: rdo rje khu tshur gyis bdag nyid bsrung ba byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:108b-4: mchod rten gyi las la sogs pa'i bya ba bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:108b-5: de ltar nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas rig pa'i brtul zhugs rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:108b-6: de ltar rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:108b-10: grong khyer gyi byang shar gyi phyogs kyi char yid dang rjes su mthun par /
T02TD2510.1E:108b-11: shin tu mnyam zhing snum pa /
T02TD2510.1E:108b-12: shar du gzhol ba shin tu tshad dang ldan pa /
T02TD2510.1E:108b-13: tshva sgo med pa'i sa'i cha der rgyal pos ni khru brgya'am lnga bcu'o //
T02TD2510.1E:108b-14: blon po dang blon po chen pos ni khru lnga bcu 'am nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
T02TD2510.1E:108b-15: tshong dpon nam ded dpon gyis ni khru nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am de'i phyed do //
T02TD2510.1E:108b-16: sgrub pa pos ni khru bcu gnyis sam drug pa bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:108b-17: de la dang po re zhig mngon par 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su mi rus kyi phye ma khrag dang dug dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:108b-18: mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gi chogs dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs bzlog nas /
T02TD2510.1E:108b-21: sa bdag la sogs ba zhi bar byed pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:108b-22: de nas sa sbyang du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:108b-25: pus mo nu btsam du 'og tu brkos la /
T02TD2510.1E:108b-26: spos chu dri zhim pos bran pa'i sas bkang nas /
T02TD2510.1E:108b-27: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus chag chag btab ste /
T02TD2510.1E:108b-29: shin tu mnyam par byas te /
T02TD2510.1E:108b-30: khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du chud pa /
T02TD2510.1E:108b-31: rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas la sgo bzhi dang ldan ba skar khung gis yongs su bskor ba /
T02TD2510.1E:108b-32: mtha' ma dril bu btags pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD2510.1E:108b-33: bla re mchog sna tshogs bres pas nye bar mdzes par byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:108b-34: sangs rgyas rin po che la sogs pa'i ras ris dang sku gzugs la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grva bzhir gzhags pa'i spos snod rnams las spos legs par 'thul ba /
T02TD2510.1E:108b-37: gos la sogs pa'i yo byang rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa'i sa'i cha dris nye bar byugs nas rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus bsangs la /
T02TD2510.1E:109a-2: rdo rje sems dpa' dang yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:109a-3: sa sbyang ba dang yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2510.1E:109a-4: de nas rang nyid khrus byas shing lus dri zhi ma pos byugs la /
T02TD2510.1E:109a-5: ji snyed pa'i gos dang rgyan gdags shing /
T02TD2510.1E:109a-6: shin tu dmar ba'i ras gos bgo ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:109a-7: me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing gdong dri zhim por byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:109a-8: yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.1E:109a-13: tshes lnga'i snga dro'i thun mtshams nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.1E:109a-15: de la gnyug mar gnas pa'i sa'i char ni phyag dar dang skyang nul la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:109a-16: de bzhin du lag pa sa la reg par byas nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2510.1E:109a-17: yi ge brgya pa bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:109a-18: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug la /
T02TD2510.1E:109a-20: bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:109a-21: de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po sprul la /
T02TD2510.1E:109a-22: phyag 'tshal ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:109a-23: sdom pa gzung ba dang rnal 'byor chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:109a-24: gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa bskyed la /
T02TD2510.1E:109a-25: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug ste /
T02TD2510.1E:109a-26: deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02TD2510.1E:109a-28: deng bdag 'dus pa mchog yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:109a-29: zhes bya ba'i par gyis bdag nyid spro ba bskyed bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:109a-30: de nas yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:109a-31: spos smod lag tu thogs te /
T02TD2510.1E:109a-32: ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi //
T02TD2510.1E:109a-34: dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol //
T02TD2510.1E:109a-35: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:109a-36: de nas yang dang po sbyor ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:109a-37: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog dang /
T02TD2510.1E:109a-38: las kyi rgyal po mchog rnams bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.1E:109a-39: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas na dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po gnas shing /
T02TD2510.1E:109a-40: aom badzra satva h'um zhes zlo sa pa la brtson pa la rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bri pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:109b-0: sgrub pa'i grogs mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas mtshan brgya rtsa @109b brgyad pas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:109b-1: de ltar na 'di ni ci rigs pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:109b-2: tshul 'dis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug pa las langs nas yongs su bskor bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:109b-3: 'on te spros par 'dod na spros pa dang bcas pa'i skyor ba nyid bya bar shes bya bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:109b-4: sems dpa' chen po ni phyag rgya cher bsgom zhing byin gyis rlob bgyid cing zhes bya ba ni de nas gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs nyid la /
T02TD2510.1E:109b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha' gang bar bsams te /
T02TD2510.1E:109b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dkyil 'khor lnga pas phyag byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:109b-7: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:109b-8: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:109b-9: bdag nyid rang nyid rdo rje can //
T02TD2510.1E:109b-10: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid //
T02TD2510.1E:109b-11: bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che //
T02TD2510.1E:109b-12: stobs chen rdo rje can bdag nyid //
T02TD2510.1E:109b-13: bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal //
T02TD2510.1E:109b-14: phyag na rdo rje brtan bdag yin //
T02TD2510.1E:109b-15: bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag / byin gyis rlob pa mi 'dor ro //
T02TD2510.1E:109b-17: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas ji ltar yongs su bsgoms pa'i dkyil 'khor bteg ste nam mkhar bzhag la /
T02TD2510.1E:109b-18: rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis badzra sa tva zhes zlos shing bdag nyid kyang byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2510.1E:109b-19: rdo rje sems dpa'i nga rgyal bskyed de /
T02TD2510.1E:109b-20: badzra dri shti mata ces bya ba nig gnyis su bkod la /
T02TD2510.1E:109b-21: aa zhes bya bas rkang pa gnyis su sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la /
T02TD2510.1E:109b-22: yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen bor bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:109b-24: sems dpa' che yi phyag rgya cher //
T02TD2510.1E:109b-25: sgom zhing byin gyis rlob bgyid cing //
T02TD2510.1E:109b-26: zhes pa 'di'i don ston pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:109b-27: phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs //
T02TD2510.1E:109b-28: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen mo ma bkrol bas sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bshig la langs te /
T02TD2510.1E:109b-29: phyag rgyas gnas pas na phyag rgya la gnas zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2510.1E:109b-30: phyag rgya chen po bcings pa nyid kyis gnas pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:109b-31: kun du rnam par bltas nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:109b-32: zhes bya ba ni dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.1E:109b-33: g-yon phyogs nas bltas pas bgegs bskrad par byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:110a-1: de bzhin du g-yas phyogs nas bltas nas phyogs mtshams dang /
T02TD2510.1E:110a-2: dkyil 'khor nam mkha' dang sa bcing ba dang ra ba dang dra ba byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:110a-3: rkang mthil gyis yongs su bzang bas sa bzhi brtan pa nas brtsams te ri rab kyi steng gi bar du rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byed cing ;
T02TD2510.1E:110a-4: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2510.1E:110a-5: de'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas badzra satva h'um zhes zlos shing g-yas phyogs nas yongs su bskor nas /
T02TD2510.1E:110a-6: yang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las bshad pa'i tshul gyis bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa bya ba nas /
T02TD2510.1E:110a-7: lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:110a-8: de nas nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su dkyil 'khor de dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis nam mkhar zhag la thig gis thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:110a-9: sar pa zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gzhan du yongs su ma spyad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:110a-10: legs par bkal nas kyang zhes bya ba ni dris byug pa'i gser la sogs pa'i snod du gzhag go //
T02TD2510.1E:110a-11: tshad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor khru drug pa la sboms su mthe'u chung gi tshad la chur dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur gyi tshad kyis so //
T02TD2510.1E:110a-12: mdzes pa'i thig gis zhes bya ba ni tshon sna lnga pos lta na sdug pa'i thig gis thig gang ba pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:110a-13: mkhas pas zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi mdog dang dbyibs dang bya ba la sbyang ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:110a-14: ci nus kyis zhes bya ba ni tshad dpag tshad nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.1E:110a-15: khru drug pa'i tshad kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du nus pa'i tshad las dpags te /
T02TD2510.1E:110a-16: dkyil 'khor gyi thig gis gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:110a-17: grub bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang //
T02TD2510.1E:110a-18: zhes bya ba ni shar dang nub dang byang dang lho'i ngos kyi ri mos zur bzhir bya pa'i phyir gru bzhi'o //
T02TD2510.1E:110a-19: sgo bzhi dang zhes bya ba ni shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi ngos kyi dbus su re re zhing sgo btod pa yod de des na sgo bzhi'o //
T02TD2510.1E:110a-20: rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la //
T02TD2510.1E:110a-21: zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2510.1E:110a-22: thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa //
T02TD2510.1E:110a-23: zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa'i thig gnyis dang mtshams kyi tig gnyis te /
T02TD2510.1E:110a-24: de dag dang yang dag par ldan par gyur pa ni mnyam por bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02TD2510.1E:110a-25: dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02TD2510.1E:110a-26: zhes bya ba ni dar gyi phreng ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:110b-0: @110b me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:110b-1: grva yi phyogs ni thams cad dang //
T02TD2510.1E:110b-2: sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su //
T02TD2510.1E:110b-3: rdo rje rin chen spras par ni //
T02TD2510.1E:110b-4: dkyil 'khor phyi ri thig gdab bo //
T02TD2510.1E:110b-5: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor grva'i phyogs bzhi char du yang zla ba phyed pa /
T02TD2510.1E:110b-6: de'i steng du rdo rje rin chen yod par thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:110b-7: sgo rnams kyi sgo khyud ni sgo khyud de //
T02TD2510.1E:110b-8: de rnams kyi mtshams ni ri mo gnyis phrad pa'i tshul te /
T02TD2510.1E:110b-9: de rnams su yang zla ba phyed pa'i steng du rdo rje'i na po che yod par thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:110b-10: de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs la //
T02TD2510.1E:110b-11: 'khor lo 'dra bar zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor de'i rim pa'i nang du zhugs la //
T02TD2510.1E:110b-12: 'khor lo 'dra bar dkyil 'khor gyi gnas gru bzhi dang sgo bzhi la sogs pa ji skad du bshad pa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba la rta babs med par thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:110b-13: rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor bar //
T02TD2510.1E:110b-14: zhes bya ba ni rtse gsum pa'i rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:110b-15: ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes bgyis pa //
T02TD2510.1E:110b-16: zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi cha re re zhing rtsig pa la brten pa'i rdo rje ka ba gnyis gnyis yod pa de'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:110b-17: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:110b-18: rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su 'ang //
T02TD2510.1E:110b-19: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan pa //
T02TD2510.1E:110b-20: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ka ba rnams kyi mchog ste gnas dam pa yin pas na rdo rje ka ba'i mchog gi gnas su'o //
T02TD2510.1E:110b-21: rdo rje ka ba'i mchog gi gnas de rnams su /
T02TD2510.1E:110b-22: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.1E:110b-26: don yod grub pa'i gnas rnams su ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zlum po lnga'i thig btab la /
T02TD2510.1E:110b-27: yang re re zhing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga lnga yod pa'i rdo rje rim mos yongs su bskor bar thig btab la /
T02TD2510.1E:110b-28: zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD2510.1E:110b-29: ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes byas shing /
T02TD2510.1E:110b-30: rdo rje phreng bas yongs bskor bar //
T02TD2510.1E:110b-31: dkyil 'khor dbus ma bri bar bya //
T02TD2510.1E:110b-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2510.1E:110b-33: bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje rtse mo las rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor che na po'i cha bgo ba mdzad pa yin pas the tshom mi bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:111a-0: 'dir yang de'i 'khor lo 'dra bar zhes bstan pa ni 'khor @111a * //
T02TD2510.1E:111a-1: lo ltar zlum po yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:111a-2: 'dir zlum po kho na yin no zhes bstan par nus pa ni ma yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:111a-4: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2510.1E:111a-5: spyir dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yin bar bshad pas des ba med la /
T02TD2510.1E:111a-6: rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor bas //
T02TD2510.1E:111a-7: zhes bya ba gsungs pa 'dis kyang /
T02TD2510.1E:111a-8: 'di tha dad par gyur pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:111a-10: gru bzhi ra bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang //
T02TD2510.1E:111a-11: rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la //
T02TD2510.1E:111a-12: rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor bar //
T02TD2510.1E:111a-13: rdo rje pho brang chen po bri //
T02TD2510.1E:111a-15: yang thig gi cho ga gsal bar byas te /
T02TD2510.1E:111a-16: de la dang po ras ba la rin la mi brtsegs par nyos la /
T02TD2510.1E:111a-17: bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srad bu /
T02TD2510.1E:111a-23: dkar pos so sor kha bsgyur la go rims 'di nyid kyis bzhag pa la /
T02TD2510.1E:111a-24: h'um h'um hr'i:aa: a'a zhes bya ba'i rang gi sa bon gyis mi bskyod pa la sogs pa srad bu la bkod de /
T02TD2510.1E:111a-25: d'i pti shti am ku sha dza: zhes bya ba /
T02TD2510.1E:111a-27: rab tu g-yo zhing 'bar ba'i mig / mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa ni //
T02TD2510.1E:111a-28: zhes bya ba 'bar ba'i lta ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:111a-29: bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po'i thig gdab par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje'i thig bdag la stsol cig / ces brjod pas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa yang dag par bskul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:111a-30: de nas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rang rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyis srad bu btang ba 'bar ba'i lta bas bkug la /
T02TD2510.1E:111a-31: rang gi lag na gnas pa'i srad bu bkang nas /
T02TD2510.1E:111a-32: aa n+yo n+y'a nu ga ta sarba dharmm'a:sphar sphar aa nu pra bishta sarbha dharmma /
T02TD2510.1E:111a-33: aa tyan ta aa nu pra bishta sarba dharmma /
T02TD2510.1E:111a-34: aom badzra satva h'um zhes zlos shing bsgril bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:111a-35: ma dang ta gnyis kyis mig g-yas pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:111a-36: g-yon par zla ba dang nyi ma bskyed la /
T02TD2510.1E:111a-37: badzra drishti ma ta zhes bya bas brtan par byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:111a-38: thig de gser la sogs pa'i snod dris byugs par bzhag la /
T02TD2510.1E:111a-39: dri dad me tog dang spos kyis legs par mchod nas rdo rje bsdams pas bzung la /
T02TD2510.1E:111b-0: aom badzra sa ma ya bra s'u tram ma ti kra ma h'um zhes lan brgya rtsa brgyad @111b bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:111b-1: de nas sems dpa' bcu drug bzlas pa'i dris dkyil 'khor gyi sa yang byugs la /
T02TD2510.1E:111b-2: ma tog gis kun nas mdzes par byas nas bang snang na bzhugs pa'i rigs thams cad la mchod yon phal te /
T02TD2510.1E:111b-3: me tog ma la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:111b-4: sbeg mo la sogs pas thams cad yang dag par mchod la phyag byas nas mig g-yas dang g-yon du yi ge dza:gnyis la nyi ma dad zla ba mdog ser por snang ba bskyed la /
T02TD2510.1E:111b-5: glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor brtag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:111b-6: de la re zhig tshon kha dog dkar po dri zhim pa la /
T02TD2510.1E:111b-7: sngags bzlas la thig sbang bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:111b-8: de nas yid kyis badzra dh'a tu zhes rdo rje'i tshig tu brjod la /
T02TD2510.1E:111b-9: rnam par snang mdzad du gyur na /
T02TD2510.1E:111b-10: badzra karmma h'um zhes zlos shing rang gi snying ga nas rdo rje las su sgrub pa'i grogs mchog sprul par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:111b-11: de nas badzra satva zhes zlos shing bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar bsams la /
T02TD2510.1E:111b-12: thig de g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung la dza: zhes bya bas de rdo rje las kyi gzugs can gyis sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gi lag par thig gtad la /
T02TD2510.1E:111b-13: phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du sgom zhing shar du bltas la tshangs pa'i thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:111b-14: de nas yang slob dpon lho phyogs su 'dug la /
T02TD2510.1E:111b-15: byang phyogs su bltas te gnyis pa gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:111b-17: byang phyogs su bltas te phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:111b-18: rlung gi phyogs su 'dug la lho'i phyogs su bltas te /
T02TD2510.1E:111b-19: nub kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:111b-20: de nyid du 'dug la shar du bltas te byang gi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:111b-21: yang me'i phyogs su 'dug ste nub tu bltas la lho'i phyogs kyi thig gdab bo //
T02TD2510.1E:111b-22: de bzhin du kha khyer gyi thi ga kyang gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:111b-23: de ltar na phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang nang gi dkyil 'khor kun du thig btab nas byang du bltas te shar gyi ka ba'i thig gdab bo //
T02TD2510.1E:111b-24: lhor bltas te nub kyi ka ba'i thig gdab po //
T02TD2510.1E:111b-25: shar du bltas te byang gi ka ba'i thig gdab bo //
T02TD2510.1E:111b-26: nub tu bltas te lho'i ka ba'i thig gdab bo //
T02TD2510.1E:112a-0: yang phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi me'i mtshams su 'dug ste rlung gi mtshams kyi @112a * //
T02TD2510.1E:112a-1: bar dang bden bral gyi mtshams su 'dug ste dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi bar du thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:112a-2: slob dpon dang sgrub pa'i grogs mchog ni thams cad du bskor phyogs su 'gro bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:112a-3: de la thig gdab pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:112a-4: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram ma t'i kra ma h'um zhes slob dpon gyis bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:112a-5: dza:dza:dza: zhes bya ba dza:gsum gyis sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis thig drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:112a-6: sgo ni dbus kyi brgyad cha'o //
T02TD2510.1E:112a-7: sgo khyud ni sgo'i tshad do //
T02TD2510.1E:112a-8: kha khyer ni sgo'i phyed kyi tshad do //
T02TD2510.1E:112a-9: sgo 'gram ni kha khyer gyi tshad do //
T02TD2510.1E:112a-10: tshon sna lnga'i sa ni kha khyer gyi phyed kyi tshad yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:112a-11: rta babs ni sgo'i sum 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:112a-12: nang gi dkyil 'khor ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad la sgo bzhi pa zur bzhi pa kha khyer gyis yongs su bskor ba'i ka ba brgyad dang ldan par legs par thig btab nas seng ldeng gi phur bu smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu /
T02TD2510.1E:112a-13: stod rdo rje rtse lnga pa lta bu la /
T02TD2510.1E:112a-14: rdo rje phur bu'i sngags yongs su bzlas te /
T02TD2510.1E:112a-16: de la brtod pa'i srad bus nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim du /
T02TD2510.1E:112a-17: rdo rje phreng ba dbang ldan nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.1E:112a-18: bskor phyogs su thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:112a-19: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba na gnas pa'i phur bu yi ge h'um bzhis bton la /
T02TD2510.1E:112a-20: 'og nas bshad pa'i tshon sna lngas phur bu'i bu ga bkang la mnyam por byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:112a-21: h'i zhes bya bas mig g-yas pa dang g-yon du nyi ma dad zla ba bskyed la /
T02TD2510.1E:112a-22: khro bo'i lta bas kun du bltas la sgo rnams bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:112a-24: thig de tshon gyis dgang ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:112a-25: tshon gyi rim pa ni 'di'i 'og nas dum bu gnyis pa las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:112a-26: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02TD2510.1E:112a-27: sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs gzhag cing //
T02TD2510.1E:112a-28: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02TD2510.1E:112a-29: de'i shar gyi phyogs kyi char rdo rje sems ma /
T02TD2510.1E:112a-31: nub tu chos kyi sems ma /
T02TD2510.1E:112a-32: byang du las kyi sems ma bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:112a-33: rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:112a-34: zhes bya ba ni de la rdo rje shugs ni 'di yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:112a-35: yid kyis ri mo bteg nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:112b-0: rdo rje srad bu 'am gzhan @112b yang rung //
T02TD2510.1E:112b-1: phyir byung nang du zhugs kyang ni //
T02TD2510.1E:112b-3: de nas 'di'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:112b-4: aom badzra be g'a kra ma h'um /
T02TD2510.1E:112b-6: rdo rje 'dzin sogs mnyam par gzhag / ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa dang rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2510.1E:112b-9: rdo rje legs pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:112b-10: de ltar na de dang mnyam par gyur te /
T02TD2510.1E:112b-11: thugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rna bzhin nyid kyis ni mi mnyam pa med pas mnyam pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:112b-13: rdo rje snying sogs rdzogs bar gzhag / ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan dang /
T02TD2510.1E:112b-17: rdo rje bzhad pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:112b-18: de ltar na dkyil 'khor de rdo rje snying po la sogs pas gang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:112b-19: tshe dpag med kyi dkyil 'khor du ;
T02TD2510.1E:112b-20: / rdo rje spyan sogs dag par gzhag / ces bya ba ni bcom ldas 'das 'od dpag tu med pa dang rdo rje chos dang /
T02TD2510.1E:112b-23: rdo rje smra ba dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:112b-24: de ltar na dkyil 'khor de dag par 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.1E:112b-25: rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas kyang de dag yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:112b-26: gdon mi za ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2510.1E:112b-27: rdo rje rgya gram la sogs gzhag / ces bya ba la rdo rje rgya gram ni rdo rje las te /
T02TD2510.1E:112b-28: gang du de nyid la sogs pa yod pa de ni rdo rje rgya gram la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD2510.1E:112b-29: bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:112b-33: rdo rje khu tshur dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:112b-34: 'khor lo yi ni grva rnams su //
T02TD2510.1E:112b-35: rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang gzhag / ces bya ba ni nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams me'i phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.1E:112b-39: gar ma rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:112b-40: dkyil 'khor phyi yi grva rnams su //
T02TD2510.1E:112b-41: sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams kyang gzhag / ces bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu'i me'i phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.1E:112b-42: bskor phyogs su bdug pa ma dang /
T02TD2510.1E:112b-45: byug pa ma bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:113a-1: rnams kun gyi nang du ni //
T02TD2510.1E:113a-2: sgo srung bzhi yang gzhag par bgyi //
T02TD2510.1E:113a-3: zhes bya ba ni kun gyi zhes bya ba'i tshig gis phyi dang thams cad kyi shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje lcags kyu /
T02TD2510.1E:113a-5: nub tu lcags sgrog / byang du rdo rje 'bebs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:113a-6: 'khor lo phyi rim phyogs su ni //
T02TD2510.1E:113a-7: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag /
T02TD2510.1E:113a-8: ces bya ba ni khyams kyi nang du byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams phri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:113a-9: de la bcom ldan 'das rnams par snang mdzad ni sku mdog dkar po /
T02TD2510.1E:113a-10: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams pa ;
T02TD2510.1E:113a-11: seng ge'i gdan la padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba /
T02TD2510.1E:113a-12: dar la'i stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs bsnams pa rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa /
T02TD2510.1E:113a-14: zhal dang po shar du gzigs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:113a-15: de bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa yang go rims ji lta ba bzhin du /
T02TD2510.1E:113a-23: nam mkha' lding gi khri la padma dang zla ba'i steng na rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD2510.1E:113a-27: mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgyas rdo rje dang /
T02TD2510.1E:113a-28: rdo rje rin po che dang /
T02TD2510.1E:113a-29: rdo rje rin po che dang /
T02TD2510.1E:113a-31: sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02TD2510.1E:113a-33: rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa /
T02TD2510.1E:113a-34: zhal gcig pa rnam par snang mdzad la mngon par phyogs pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:113a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po 'di dag badzra dh'a tu zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i spyi'i snying po zlos shing bri ba'am bzhag la /
T02TD2510.1E:113a-36: bar snang la bzhugs pa phab ste gcig tu bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:113a-37: de bzhin du satva badzri zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2510.1E:113a-38: badzra aa be sha zhes bya ba'i bar zlos shing /
T02TD2510.1E:113a-39: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar du bri ba'am bzhag la /
T02TD2510.1E:113a-40: bar snang na bzhugs pa phab ste /
T02TD2510.1E:113a-41: gzugs brnyan dang lhan cig tu bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:113b-0: rdo rje sems ma ni padma dang zla ba'i gdan gyi steng na rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po rdo rje rin chen ma la sogs @113b ba'i gdan yang de lta bu nyid yin par shes par bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:113b-1: der rdo rje rin chen ma ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni rtse mo rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:113b-2: rdo rje chos ma ni padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa /
T02TD2510.1E:113b-4: 'dab ma brgyad thur du gyes pa /
T02TD2510.1E:113b-5: 'dab ma brgyad gyen du gyes pa kha ma bye ba'i nang na rdo rje rtse lnga pa chud pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:113b-6: rdo rje las ma ni sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa kha dog lnga pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:113b-7: de la dbus ni dkar po /
T02TD2510.1E:113b-12: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa'i bar dag kyang padma dang zla ba'i steng na sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:113b-13: rdo rje sems sogs dang po'i mgon //
T02TD2510.1E:113b-14: rdo rje phyed pa'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02TD2510.1E:113b-16: de la rdo rje sems dpa' ni sku mdog dkar po g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur dril bu dang bcas pa bsnyems pa'i tshul du dkur brten pa /
T02TD2510.1E:113b-17: phyag g-yas pa kha tv'am ga'i phyag rgyar bzhag pa'i gung mo la dang po'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa rang gi thugs kar bstod pa'i tshul gyis bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:113b-18: rdo rje rgyal po ni gser gyi mdog can rdo rje lcags kyus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sdud par mdzad cing bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:113b-19: rdo rje chags pa ni sku mdog dmar po mda' dang gzhug de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'bigs pa'i tshul du mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:113b-20: rdo rje legs pa ni margad kyi ma dog can phyag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur dang bcas pas legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed cing bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:113b-21: rdo rje rin chen sku mdog ser po g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rin po che'i dril bu bsnams shing bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa /
T02TD2510.1E:113b-22: g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rtse mo rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa dpral ba'i steng na bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:113b-23: rdo rje gzi brjid nyi ma'i mdog can phyag g-yas na rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil lhor bsnams te /
T02TD2510.1E:113b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snang ba mdzad pa /
T02TD2510.1E:113b-25: phyag g-yon pa gdan la brten nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114a-0: rdo rje rgyal mtshan nam mkha'i @114a * //
T02TD2510.1E:114a-1: mdog can phyag g-yas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan phyag g-yon gdan la brten par bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114a-2: rdo rje bzhad pa dung dang padma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar ba /
T02TD2510.1E:114a-3: phyag g-yas kyis so'i phreng ba gnyis kyi rtse mo na rdo rje yod pa bsnams te /
T02TD2510.1E:114a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'dzum pa la nges par sbyor ba /
T02TD2510.1E:114a-5: phyag g-yon gdan la brten pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114a-6: rdo rje chos ma sku mdog dkar dmar phyag g-yon pa dkur brten pas rdo rje padma bzung ste /
T02TD2510.1E:114a-7: phyag g-yas pas de'i 'dab ma rang gi thugs kar 'byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114a-8: rdo rje rnon po nam mkha' ltar sngo ba sangs phyag g-yon gyis rang gi thugs kar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa /
T02TD2510.1E:114a-9: g-yas kyis ral gri bsnams pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:114a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114a-11: rdo rje rgyu gser gyi mdog can phyag g-yas kyi gung mo'i rtse mo na 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bskor bar mdzad pa /
T02TD2510.1E:114a-12: g-yon pa gdan la brten nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114a-13: rdo rje smra ba zangs kyi mdog can phyag g-yas kyis rdo rje lce bsnams nas /
T02TD2510.1E:114a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang smra bar mdzad cing /
T02TD2510.1E:114a-15: g-yon gdan la brten pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114a-16: rdo rje las zhal dkar po /
T02TD2510.1E:114a-17: rked pa'i bar dang phyag gnyis sngo skya /
T02TD2510.1E:114a-19: zhal gyi 'og logs nas rked pa'i bar du dmar skya /
T02TD2510.1E:114a-21: lhag ma byin pa gnyis nas zhabs kyi bar du dkar po /
T02TD2510.1E:114a-22: phyag g-yon gyi rdo rje khu tshur gyis sna tshogs rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis 'jog pa /
T02TD2510.1E:114a-23: phyag g-yas kyi gung mo la sna tshogs rdo rje rang gi thugs kar bstod pa'i tshul gyis bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114a-24: rdo rje srung ba gser gyi mdog can phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje go cha bsnams te /
T02TD2510.1E:114a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la go bskon pa'i tshul gyis zhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114a-26: rdo rje gnod sbyin sku mdog nag po lto ba yang pa /
T02TD2510.1E:114a-27: zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs pa rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis zhal gyi mtha' gnyis su mche ba gnyis 'dzin cing bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114a-28: rdo rje khu tshur sku mdog ser po dam tshig gi khu tshur gnyis kyi nang du rdo rje chud pa /
T02TD2510.1E:114b-0: dam tshig gi khu @114b tshur gyis btsir zhing bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114b-1: sgeg mo sku mdog dkar pa /
T02TD2510.1E:114b-2: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis bsnams te /
T02TD2510.1E:114b-3: rdo rje 'gying ba'i tshul gyis sgeg pas g-yon du cung zad 'dud pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114b-4: phreng ba ma sku mdog ser po /
T02TD2510.1E:114b-5: rin po che'i phreng bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams tshem par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114b-6: glu ma sku mdog dmar skya pi wang brdung ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114b-7: gar ma sku mdog rdo rje las lta bu rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsnams te /
T02TD2510.1E:114b-8: phyag gnyis kyis gar mdzad cing ba zhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114b-9: bdug pa ma sku mdog dkar mo rdo rje spos snod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams tshim par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114b-10: me tog ma sku mdog ser mo phyag g-yon gyis rdo rje me tog gi snod thogs te /
T02TD2510.1E:114b-11: phyag g-yas kyis me tog gi char 'bebs par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114b-12: mar me ma sku mdog dmar skya mar me'i sdong bu bsnams te /
T02TD2510.1E:114b-13: snang ba'i tshogs kyis mchod par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114b-14: byug pa ma gar ma ltar sna tshogs pa'i mdog can phyag g-yon dri'i dung chos bsnams te /
T02TD2510.1E:114b-15: phyag g-yas kyis dri'i sprin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114b-16: rdo rje lcags kyu sku mdog dkar po rdo rje lcags khus de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spyan 'dren par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114b-17: rdo rje zhags pa sku mdog ser po rdo rje zhags pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gzhug par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114b-18: rdo rje lcags sgrog sku mdog dmar skya rdo rje lcags sgrog gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'ching bar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114b-19: rdo rje 'bebs pa sna tshogs pa'i mdog can phyag g-yas kyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams te /
T02TD2510.1E:114b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'bebs par mdzad pa /
T02TD2510.1E:114b-21: phyag g-yon gdan la brten te bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:114b-22: de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni zhi ba'i nyams dang ldan pa /
T02TD2510.1E:114b-23: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2510.1E:114b-26: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni rab tu dgyes pas spyan gdangs pa /
T02TD2510.1E:114b-27: sgeg pa'i nyams dang 'dzum pa dang bcas pa /
T02TD2510.1E:114b-28: sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa /
T02TD2510.1E:114b-29: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:115a-0: byams pa la sogs pa shar gyi cha la ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'dra bar rdo rje bsnams @115a * //
T02TD2510.1E:115a-2: / lhor ni rdo rje rin chen dang 'dra bar rin po che bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:115a-3: nub tu ni rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar rdo rje padma bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:115a-4: byang du ni rdo rje las dang 'dra bar sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:115a-6: 'di ltar rin po che'i chod pan dang dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur ba mnga' ba yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:115a-7: aom sarbba sam sk'a ra pa ri shuddha dharmm'a te ma h'a n'a ya ba ri b'a re sv'a h'a zhes bya ba ni bskal pa bzang po rnams kyi spyi'i rig pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:115a-8: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2510.1E:115a-9: de ltar dkyil 'khor legs par bkod nas /
T02TD2510.1E:115a-10: phyi rol kun du spos chus byug cing me tog sil ma bkram la dgongs ka'i dus su /
T02TD2510.1E:115a-11: badzra satva zhes zlos shing rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya me tog gi phreng ba bzung la /
T02TD2510.1E:115a-12: rdo rje shugs kyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs la /
T02TD2510.1E:115a-13: yang rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing dkyil 'khor lan bdun bskor ba byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:115a-14: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lhag pa dang ma tshang ba'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bltas la /
T02TD2510.1E:115a-15: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phreng ba de phul te /
T02TD2510.1E:115a-17: blangs la rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:115a-18: badzra satva h'um zhes bya ba bar ma chad par bzlas par bya'o ;
T02TD2510.1E:115a-19: / de yang rdo rje dril bu rab bskor bas //
T02TD2510.1E:115a-20: mkhas pas ma tshang yongs su skong //
T02TD2510.1E:115a-21: lhag pa gang yin 'dor bar byed //
T02TD2510.1E:115a-24: de'i rjes la yi ge h'um las bdag nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:115a-25: de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:115a-26: rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas //
T02TD2510.1E:115a-27: rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi po //
T02TD2510.1E:115a-28: yid kyis su ni dbye bar bya //
T02TD2510.1E:115a-29: aom badzro tgha ta sa ma ya bra be sha ya h'um zhes bya ba /
T02TD2510.1E:115a-30: phyag rgya dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo thams cad dbye bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:115a-31: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:115a-32: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la /
T02TD2510.1E:115a-33: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i me tog gi lcug ma rdo rje sems mas yongs su bzung ba las /
T02TD2510.1E:115a-34: aom badzra satva h'um zhes bya ba 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02TD2510.1E:115b-0: yang badzrod ka h'um zhes stong rtsa brgyad mngon par @115b bzlas te /
T02TD2510.1E:115b-1: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i spyan sngar legs par gzhag go //
T02TD2510.1E:115b-2: bum pa lhag ma rnams la ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
T02TD2510.1E:115b-3: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:115b-4: de'i rjes la bum pa gang ba la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags bzlas la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:115b-5: yang bum pa gcig la rdo rje sems dpa' lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla ste 'jug pa'i sgor mngon par phyogs par gzhag go //
T02TD2510.1E:115b-6: ma 'byor na dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa lnga la bum pa dul bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:115b-7: aom badzra satva mu shti aa: zhes bya ba ni bskyod pa'i rigs kyi bum pa la'o //
T02TD2510.1E:115b-8: aom badzra ratna mu shti tr'am zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs kyi bum pa la'o //
T02TD2510.1E:115b-9: aom badzra dharmma mushti kham zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i rigs kyi bum ba la'o //
T02TD2510.1E:115b-10: aom badzra karmma mushti ham zhes bya ba ni don yod par grub pa'i las kyi rigs kyi bum pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas la rigs de la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:115b-11: de bzhin du bum pa gang ba yang dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:115b-12: bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o zhes nges pa gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:115b-13: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha yid kyis mngon sum lta bur mngon du byas la mchod pa lnga dang kha zas kyi bye brag rnams kyi ci nus par yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD2510.1E:115b-14: rang gi gdong ji lta ba bzhin du g-yogs te phyag bzhi dang sdom pa gzung ba'i bar du byas nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
T02TD2510.1E:115b-16: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod nas sems ma rdo rje ma bcings la /
T02TD2510.1E:115b-17: slob ma 'jug pa'i cho gas zhugs te /
T02TD2510.1E:115b-18: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sems ma rdo rje ma dral zhing a'a: zhes bya bas bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:115b-19: ji lta bar ni bka' nod do //
T02TD2510.1E:115b-21: de la ji lta bar zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:115b-22: de ltar bdag nyid la dbab pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:115b-27: yang sems ma rdo rje ma bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:115b-28: rang gi snying gar bkrol bas kyang dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:116a-1: thams cad blang ba byas nas dam tshig gsum gzung ba'i phyir dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:116a-2: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das las sngags mnos la byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:116a-4: bdag nyid la mchod pa byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:116a-5: bdag kun du bzang po rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa rang gi dbang bskur ba'i ming nas brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:116a-6: de nas rdo rje bsgrub bgyi ba //
T02TD2510.1E:116a-7: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su /
T02TD2510.1E:116a-8: badzra dh'a tu aa zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rjer bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD2510.1E:116a-9: rdo rje de badzro& ham zhes bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.1E:116a-10: de nyid la ya th'a sarba ta th'a ga ta ta th'a ham zhes bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.1E:116a-11: rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsgom par bya ba nas de bzhin du rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2510.1E:116a-12: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i gnas su badzra a'a be sha /
T02TD2510.1E:116a-13: aa: zhes bya bas rdo rje dril bur bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD2510.1E:116a-14: badzra gha ndo& ham zhes bya bas dril bu'i rnam par bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.1E:116a-15: de nyid badzra a'a be sho& ham zhes bya bas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar bdag nyid bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:116a-16: de ltar na dkyil 'khor des rdo rje sgrub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:116a-17: gnas skabs 'dir mtshan ma'i phyag rgya nyid la rdo rje sgrar bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:116a-18: gang gi phyir rgyud 'dir mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du bshad la /
T02TD2510.1E:116a-19: de bas na mtshan ma'i phyag rgya thams cad la rdo rje zhes bya bar the tshom med do //
T02TD2510.1E:116a-21: rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:116a-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sngar bshad pa'i bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcings la rdo rje se gol brdabs pa'i sgra byed cing /
T02TD2510.1E:116a-23: aom badzra dza: badzra sa m'a dza: dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2510.1E:116a-24: zhes zlos shing rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas bskal pa bzang po'i bar gyi sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:116a-25: de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
T02TD2510.1E:116a-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2510.1E:116a-27: dkyil 'khor thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor te de rnams kyis de yang dag par gang bas na de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:116b-0: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas bskal pa bzang po'i bar gyi rdo rje dbyings kyi khang pa brtsegs ma @116b na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus par mdzad de /
T02TD2510.1E:116b-1: rdo rje slob dpon gyis brtags pa'i dkyil 'khor dbye ba mtha' yas pa'i gzhal yas khang du bzhugs te /
T02TD2510.1E:116b-2: kun nas yongs su bskor ba'i tshul gyis 'dus par gyur cing /
T02TD2510.1E:116b-3: tshogs par mdzad do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02TD2510.1E:116b-4: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs ba la /
T02TD2510.1E:116b-5: bsdus par gyur pa'i rjes thogs nyid la phyag bya ba la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:116b-6: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'dus par gyur ba'i sku'i gsang ba phyag rgya chen po'i tshul sgom par byed cing 'dus nas byon pa la pus mo gnyis kyi lha ngas la btsugs la /
T02TD2510.1E:116b-7: rdo rje thal mo bskor nas shis pa brjod pa'i tshul du snying gar 'jog pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:116b-8: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02TD2510.1E:116b-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:116b-10: de nas dgyes par gyur pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:116b-11: 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bstan par gyur cing mi phyed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:116b-12: grogs po nyid du nye bar gnas //
T02TD2510.1E:116b-13: zhes bya ba ni grogs po ltar sgrub pa po la dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub stsol bar mdzad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:116b-14: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2510.1E:116b-15: dam tshig rnams ni gzhag par bgyi //
T02TD2510.1E:116b-17: de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa'i rjes thogs la snga ma bzhin du sgong bye ba byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:116b-18: rdo rje lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.1E:116b-19: mi bskyod pa'i rigs bkug la shar sgor gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:116b-20: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs ni lho sgo dang nye bar ro //
T02TD2510.1E:116b-21: 'od dpag tu med pa'i rigs ni nub sgo dang nye bar ro //
T02TD2510.1E:116b-22: don yod par grub pa'i rigs ni byang sgo dang nye bar gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:116b-23: rdo rje zhags pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas rang rang gi sgo nas rang rang gi gnas su gzhug bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:116b-24: rdo rje lcags sgrog gi las kyi phyag rgyas thams cad cing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:116b-25: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas rnam bar snang mdzad la sogs pa thams cad dbang du bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:116b-26: las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis //
T02TD2510.1E:116b-27: dam tshig rnams ni gzhag par bgyi //
T02TD2510.1E:116b-28: zhes bya ba ni las kyang de yin la chen po yang yin pas las chen te /
T02TD2510.1E:117a-0: phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi las su bshad pa gang yin @117a * //
T02TD2510.1E:117a-1: pa de ni las chen te /
T02TD2510.1E:117a-2: de rnams la de'i mtshan ma mchog ste dam pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:117a-3: las che mchog kyang yin la phyag rgya yang yin pas las che mchog gi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:117a-4: rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa las gsungs ba legs par drangs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:117a-5: de la sgrub pa'i yan lag bcu drug tu bstan pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:117a-23: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa re re zhing so sor bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir gsungs la /
T02TD2510.1E:117a-24: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bsgrub pa ni phyag rgya bzhir bstan pa nyid ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o zhes rgyud gzhan las gsungs pas na dam tshig dang /
T02TD2510.1E:117a-25: chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po'i tshul nyid las rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas de'i phyir dam tshig rnams zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:117a-26: ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba ste /
T02TD2510.1E:117a-30: phyag rgya chen po nyid kyis de rnams gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:117a-31: dkyil 'khor du bris pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sku la /
T02TD2510.1E:117a-32: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rnams kyi chos dang /
T02TD2510.1E:117a-34: phyag rgya chen po'i tshul rab tu gnas par bya ba ni gzhag pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:117a-35: dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya dang //
T02TD2510.1E:117a-36: sems dpa'i rdo rje la sogs pas //
T02TD2510.1E:117a-37: de ltar sems dpa' chen po bsgrub //
T02TD2510.1E:117a-38: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod cing zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos dang /
T02TD2510.1E:117a-40: phyag rgya chen pos gzhag / de bzhin du /
T02TD2510.1E:117a-41: sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa byed pa por gyur pa rnams kyang bsgrub par bya zhing bdag nyid dbang du bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:117a-43: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod cing zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2510.1E:117a-44: 'dis ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyi spyi'i yi ge bzhi po bsgrub pa'i snying po gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:117b-0: la la dag dza: h'um bam ho: zhes bya ba @117b ni 'di dag rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa sgo srung bzhi'i phyag rgya'i snying po yin par 'dod do //
T02TD2510.1E:117b-1: yang 'di ji ltar shes she na /
T02TD2510.1E:117b-2: dgug pa la sogs pa'i don gsal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:117b-4: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod la //
T02TD2510.1E:117b-5: legs pa'i cho ga'i yid kyis ni //
T02TD2510.1E:117b-6: lus la sangs rgyas nyid gzhug go //
T02TD2510.1E:117b-7: zhes bya ba 'dir yang yin gyi sgo srung rnams kyi snying po nges par yi ge yin par khas blangs nas ni /
T02TD2510.1E:117b-8: aa: zhes bya ba dbab pa'i snying po yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2510.1E:117b-9: ho zhes bya ba rdo rje chags pa'i snying po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:117b-10: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis don 'di bshad par mdzad pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:117b-11: de nas kun mchog la sogs pa //
T02TD2510.1E:117b-12: mngon par bris nas yang dag bsgrub //
T02TD2510.1E:117b-13: dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang //
T02TD2510.1E:117b-14: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod do //
T02TD2510.1E:117b-16: don 'di dag kyang 'dir bstan pa tsam du mdzad pa yin gyi /
T02TD2510.1E:117b-17: yang bsgrub ba'i go rims ni 'di yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:117b-18: lcags kyu la sogs pas sgo rnams su las byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:117b-19: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:117b-20: ra ba dang dra ba byas nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad la rdo rje go chas bsrung bar bya ba thams cad yang dag par bsrungs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:117b-21: rdo rje sems dpas mchod yon phul la /
T02TD2510.1E:117b-22: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa blta bar byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:117b-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:117b-25: badzra dh'a tu dri shya dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya stvam aa ham badzra dh'a tu zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2510.1E:117b-26: de bzhin du rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la badzra a'a be sha dri shya dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya stvam aa ham badzra aa be sha zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02TD2510.1E:117b-27: de nas chos dang las dang /
T02TD2510.1E:117b-28: phyag rgya chen pos gzhag par bgyi zhes bya ba dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa yang dag par bsgrub la /
T02TD2510.1E:117b-29: de'i 'og tu chos dang las dang /
T02TD2510.1E:117b-30: phyag rgya chen pos gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:117b-32: bshad pa'i rgyud las ston te /
T02TD2510.1E:118a-0: dpal mchog dang po las dam tshig po'i sems dpa' la sogs pa @118a * //
T02TD2510.1E:118a-2: yang rnal 'byor gyi tshul thams cad las /
T02TD2510.1E:118a-3: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yang dag par bsgrubs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:118a-4: de'i rjes la phyag rgya gzhan sbyar bar bya'o zhes don 'di ston la /
T02TD2510.1E:118a-6: rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:118a-7: phyag rgya chen po cho ga bzhin ;
T02TD2510.1E:118a-8: / bcings nas de yi mdun phyogs su //
T02TD2510.1E:118a-9: sems dpa' chen po de bsgom mo //
T02TD2510.1E:118a-10: ye shes sems dpa' de mthong nas //
T02TD2510.1E:118a-11: rang gi lus su bsgom par bya //
T02TD2510.1E:118a-12: bkug cing bcug la bcing ba dang //
T02TD2510.1E:118a-13: dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya //
T02TD2510.1E:118a-15: dang po kho nar dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar gsungs la gang gi phyir cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba 'di'i don ni 'di yin te rdo rje thal mo dang /
T02TD2510.1E:118a-16: rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dral bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:118a-17: de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas bdag nyid la dbab pa byas nas badzra tva zhes bya ba la sogs pa yid la zlos shing chos bdag med pa bsgom mo //
T02TD2510.1E:118a-18: de nas ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par ro //
T02TD2510.1E:118a-19: de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de dag kyang badzra sa tva zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra dang bcas pa las rdo rje ste gang las de byung ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:118a-20: gzhan dag ni rdo rje las byung ba'i rang gi mtshan ma bsam par bya'o /
T02TD2510.1E:118a-21: de nas mtshan ma'i nga rgyal te rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pas ni de nyid rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i sbyor bas /
T02TD2510.1E:118a-22: bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:118a-23: rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa rnal 'byor pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i rang gi lha'i nga rgyal lo //
T02TD2510.1E:118a-24: de nas ma h'a sa ma ya stvam ham zhes byang chub kyi sems kyi nga rgyal bskyed la /
T02TD2510.1E:118a-25: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:118a-26: sa ma ya ham zhes bya bas sku dang /
T02TD2510.1E:118a-28: thugs kyi gsang ba'i nga rgyal bskyed nas /
T02TD2510.1E:118a-29: rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang /
T02TD2510.1E:118a-30: sa ma ya sa tva aa dhi ti shtha sva ma'm /
T02TD2510.1E:118a-31: zhes bya ba 'dis bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:118a-32: de'i mdun du rang gi lha'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bskyed nas /
T02TD2510.1E:118b-0: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas mdun na bzhugs pa'i gzugs brnyan la ye shes @118b sems dpa' dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:118b-4: yang rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:118b-5: badzra sa tva dri shya zhes bya ba la sogs pas blta ba byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:118b-6: dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang dza:h'um bam ho: zhes zlos shing gzhug bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:118b-7: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang /
T02TD2510.1E:118b-8: sa ma ya stam zhes brjod pas /
T02TD2510.1E:118b-9: rgyab tu zla ba grub nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:118b-10: sa ma ya stvam aa ham zhes brjod do //
T02TD2510.1E:118b-11: der bdag sems dpa'i lus su bsgom /
T02TD2510.1E:118b-12: badzra sa tva zhes bya ba la sogs pa rang gi lha'i snying po yang brjod par bya'o zhes de kho na nyid gsal bar phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba'i cho ga ni phyag rgya thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi spyi'i bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:118b-13: de bas na dam tshig gi phyag rgyas lha rnams bsgrub par byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:118b-16: phyag rgya chen pos lha rnams gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:118b-17: sku'i gsang ba phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du mthar thug pas lha dang lha mo rnams bzhugs pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:118b-18: rgyud des kyang phyag rgya chen po phyis brtan par bya ba'i las kyi phyag rgya ni ma yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:118b-19: de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa //
T02TD2510.1E:118b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de nas zhes bya ba ni sgo rnams su lcags kyu la sogs bas las byas nas ;
T02TD2510.1E:118b-21: sangs rgyas la sogs te rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.1E:118b-22: bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyi sems dpa' chen po kun bsdus shing tshogs par mdzad par 'gyur ba rnams ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:118b-23: spyan drangs nas ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:118b-24: spyan drang pa ni rdo rje lcags kyus so //
T02TD2510.1E:118b-25: rab tu gzhug pa ni zhags pas so //
T02TD2510.1E:118b-26: bcing ba ni lcags sgrog gis so //
T02TD2510.1E:118b-27: de'i dbang du gyur ces bya ba ni sgrub pa po de'i rdo rje 'bebs bas babs par 'gyur zhing /
T02TD2510.1E:118b-28: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rang dbang du gyur pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:118b-29: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa de bas na /
T02TD2510.1E:118b-31: lcags kyu la sogs pa'i las bgyis nas zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:118b-32: de nas badzra ratna zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2510.1E:118b-33: rdo rje rin chen dam tshig gi phyag rgya gang yin pa des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-0: byams pa la sogs pa yang de nyid @119a * //
T02TD2510.1E:119a-2: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-3: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa sangs rgyas lnga'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:119a-4: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la mchod yon phul la /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-8: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa re re zhing ras zung re 'am /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-9: so sor ma 'byor na thams cad kyi spyir ras zung gcig dang /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-10: bla re rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-11: grva bzhir ba dan sna tshogs gdags pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-14: ba dan rnams kyang rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-16: yi ge aom lan bdun bzlas te /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-17: lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:119a-18: badzra spha ra na kham zhes bya bas me tog gi shing brgya brgya 'am /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-20: me tog thams cad la yang /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-22: me tog gi rig pa mngon par bzlas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-23: dri zhim po thams cad dang /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-24: kha la bsgo ba'i dri rnams yang rdo rje sems ma dang /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-25: dri'i rig pa dag bzlas pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-27: aa ka ru dang tu ru ska dang tsandan la sogs pa dang bcas pa bdug spos kyi don du sbyar ba gtul ba'i spos snod 'bum mam /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-31: ma 'byor na spos snod bcu la /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-33: bdug pa'i rig pa mngon par bzlas te lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:119a-34: sva sti ka la sogs pa dang yon tan 'bum dang ldan pa shin tu legs par spyar ba'i kha zas bza' ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-35: bca' ba'i bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs pas gang ba'i snod 'bum ma /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-39: bcu la rdo rje me mang mngon par bzlas shin /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-40: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarbba dharmma'a na'm /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-41: a'a dya nu tpa nan t'a ta ces bya ba bzlas la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:119a-42: mar la sogs pa mar me grangs stong dam /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-43: tha na snod chen po bzhi bltams pa la /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-45: mar me'i rig pa bzlas pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-46: badzra spha ra na kham zhes zlos shing /
T02TD2510.1E:119a-47: lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:119a-48: rol mo'i cha byad stong ngam /
T02TD2510.1E:119b-0: rol mo'i cha byad bcu la dpal 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi skyil @119b 'khor las gsungs pa'i rol mo'i rig pa mngon par bzlas pa la /
T02TD2510.1E:119b-1: badzra spha ra na kham zhes bya bas dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:119b-2: gar mkhan dang rol mo la sogs pas mchod pa rnams kyang aom dang h'um mngon par bzlas la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:119b-6: cod pan la sogs pa yang rdo rje rin chen gyi dar dpyangs dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:119b-7: me tog gi chun 'phyang gis spras shing brgyan la /
T02TD2510.1E:119b-8: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas brgyan pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:119b-9: zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i rta babs yid du 'ong ba dril bu la sogs pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:119b-12: ba lang gi khyu shin tu brtags pa rnams kyang /
T02TD2510.1E:119b-15: badzra sva ra na kham zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:119b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:119b-17: de nas mchod pa brgyad dang /
T02TD2510.1E:119b-18: las kyi dkyil 'khor gsungs pa'i mchod pa bcu drug gis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.1E:119b-19: sgeg mo la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mnyes par byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:119b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la slob dpon gyis dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:119b-21: sems can gyi don mdzod cig ces gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:119b-22: de nas rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa'i chogs phyi rol du gtor ma sbyin no //
T02TD2510.1E:119b-23: de nas sbyin sreg gi cho gas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sngags kyis zhi ba'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:119b-24: dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i snying pos kyang sreg blugs bdun dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:119b-25: de'i rjes la ji srid dkyil 'khor mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa'am /
T02TD2510.1E:119b-26: sgra 'am gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan ma thob par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:119b-27: dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bzhin du las bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:119b-28: dum bu bzhi pa las gsungs pa'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du /
T02TD2510.1E:119b-29: sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnal 'byor gyi bdag nyid can gyi rdo rjes nye bar mtshon pa'i slob dpon ni rdo rje slob dpon te 'di ni nye bar mtshon pa'i don tsam du zad kyi /
T02TD2510.1E:120a-1: slob dpon la sogs pas kyang de bzhin du las bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:120a-2: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2510.1E:120a-3: rdo rje sems dpas byin gyis brlabs pa'i slob ma ni rdo rje slob ma ste /
T02TD2510.1E:120a-4: de rnams gzhug pa la sogs ba byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:120a-5: dbab pa'i dam tshig la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin pas /
T02TD2510.1E:120a-6: rdo rje slob ma'i dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:120a-7: de mchis so zhes bya ba ni rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don te /
T02TD2510.1E:120a-8: de la dang por ni zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2510.1E:120a-9: de la gzhug pa la sogs pa de rnams kyi nang nas /
T02TD2510.1E:120a-10: dang por re zhig gzhug par bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:120a-11: dgos pa ci zhig gi phyir zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:120a-12: 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa rnams na /
T02TD2510.1E:120a-13: sems can khams lus pa med pa mi dge ba bcu las ldog par bya ba ni yongs su bskyab pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:120a-14: des 'jig rten pa'i bde ba dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog ste /
T02TD2510.1E:120a-15: de nyid ni rgyu ste dgos pa yin la /
T02TD2510.1E:120a-16: dgos pa de yongs su rdzogs pa ni 'bras bu yin pas na rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid de /
T02TD2510.1E:120a-17: de'i slad du gang gi phyir dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs pa'i phyir dgos pa yod pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:120a-18: gang gi phyir dgos pa yod pa de na /
T02TD2510.1E:120a-19: dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir bzhugs ba la snod du gyur pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:120a-20: snod du ma gyur pa brtag mi 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2510.1E:120a-22: 'di ni snod ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di mi bgyi'o zhes rnal 'byor pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la zhu bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:120a-23: ji ltar bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa de ltar 'dir ci'i phyir mi bya ba'i gtan tshigs ci zhig yod ce na /
T02TD2510.1E:120a-24: 'dir rgyu ni de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:120a-25: sdig pa chen po bgyid ba yang mchis te zhes bya ba ni mtshams med pa la sogs pa byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:120a-26: zhugs te mthong na zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang zhugs pa ni phyi dang gsang ba'i bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis yod do //
T02TD2510.1E:120a-27: phyi'i mthong ba ni rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te lha thams cad kyi sku mthong ba ni phyi'i zhugs pa yin la /
T02TD2510.1E:120b-0: sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du yid kyi ye shes babs pa ni gsang ba'i mthong ba dang zhugs pa yin @120b no ;
T02TD2510.1E:120b-1: / ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dmyal ba dang yi dags dang /
T02TD2510.1E:120b-2: dud 'gro zhes bya ba ni ngan song dang bral ba ste /
T02TD2510.1E:120b-3: dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang zhugs pa dag gis ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.1E:120b-4: de dag gang du 'gro ba'i las yongs su zad par byas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:120b-5: bcom ldan 'das nor dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:120b-6: rgyu'i rnam pa gzhan gnyis pa smos pa yin te nor dang /
T02TD2510.1E:120b-9: 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang zhes bya ba ni nor kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas nor thams cad de ;
T02TD2510.1E:120b-10: rgyal srid kha zas ro brgya pa la sogs pa ni bza' ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:120b-11: btung ba zhim po la sogs pa'i btung ba rnams ni btung ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:120b-12: 'dod par bya ba yin pas na 'dod pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:120b-17: reg bya mngon par 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:120b-18: de nyid ni goms shing 'dris par byed bas na yon tan no //
T02TD2510.1E:120b-19: 'dod pa yang yin la yon tan yang yin pas na 'dod pa'i yon tan yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:120b-23: 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams ni nor dang /
T02TD2510.1E:120b-26: 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad de de rnams la chags pa ni mngon par zhen pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:120b-27: dam tshig la ni dga' ba dang //
T02TD2510.1E:120b-28: zhes bya ba ni khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig ces bya ba la sogs pa sdom pa yongs su bsrung bar mi nus pas de rnams la mi dga' zhing sdang ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:120b-29: sngar spyad pa la sogs pa mi nus pa zhes bya ba ni lci ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:120b-32: slong mo rgyu zhing za ba la sogs pa sngar spyad pa bco brgyad byed par mi nus pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:120b-37: 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa rnams ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du bgyid pa ni nges par srung ba med pa nyid du de la gnas pa de dag kyang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa dang mthong ba gnyis kyis /
T02TD2510.1E:120b-38: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bag chags bskyed pas /
T02TD2510.1E:120b-39: dus gzhan du bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dag kyang mchis so zhes bya'o /
T02TD2510.1E:121a-0: @121a * // rgyu gsum pa gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:121a-1: lha gzhan gyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug gi zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T02TD2510.1E:121a-8: spyod pa la dga' ba rnams zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:121a-9: 'dir rtsed mo ni gar gyi khyad par gyis gnas pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:121a-10: don bzhi po 'di dag lha gzhan gyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor de rnams la /
T02TD2510.1E:121a-11: gar la sogs pa'i cho ga'i tshul gyis bya ba yin par ston la /
T02TD2510.1E:121a-12: de bas na de dag la dga' ba rnams der 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:121a-13: de bzhin du gar la sogs pa zhugs pa rnams chos bdag med pa'i sbyor bas mi 'gal lo zhes rtogs par ma gyur pas /
T02TD2510.1E:121a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i chos nyid gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid can khong du ma chud pas /
T02TD2510.1E:121a-15: lha gzhan gyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'dug ste /
T02TD2510.1E:121a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sbangs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:121a-17: lha chen po la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de ni lha gzhan gyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD2510.1E:121a-18: lha gzhan gyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor de rnams su 'jug cing /
T02TD2510.1E:121a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du bslab pa pa'i gzhis 'jigs shing skrag pas mi 'jug go //
T02TD2510.1E:121a-20: ji lta bu der zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:121a-21: re ba thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:121a-22: re ba thams cad ni sred pa'i rnam pa thams cad de yongs su rdzogs pa ni mngon par 'dod pa'i don rnams grub pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:121a-23: de yang dag par bsdus par gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:121a-24: de lta bur gyur pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:121a-26: rangs pa rnams 'byung bar byed pa yang yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:121a-27: de las gong na med pas na bla na med pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:121a-28: sa dang po la sogs pa thob pas na skad cig ma dang po la skyes pa ni dga' ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:121a-29: skad cig ma gnyis pa la skyes pa'i dga' ba de nyid ni mgu ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:121a-30: de nyid kyi skad cig ma gsum pa la sogs par skyes pa ni rangs pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:121a-31: yid bde ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:121b-0: @121b de dag ni bla na med pa yang yin la dga' ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:121b-3: bla na med pa'i dga' pa dang mgu ba dang rangs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:121b-4: de rnams 'byung ba ni skyed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:121b-5: de byed pas na bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rangs pa rnams 'byung bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:121b-6: de ltar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor der ni zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2510.1E:121b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rigs lnga'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
T02TD2510.1E:121b-8: rigs ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2510.1E:121b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la rigs kyang yin pas /
T02TD2510.1E:121b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs so //
T02TD2510.1E:121b-11: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD2510.1E:121b-13: ci'i phyir der mi 'jug ce na /
T02TD2510.1E:121b-14: bslab pa'i gzhis 'jigs shing skrag nas zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:121b-15: bslab pa ni bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:121b-17: dge slong ma la sogs pa'i sdom pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:121b-18: des 'jigs pa ni sdang ba ste /
T02TD2510.1E:121b-19: yongs su bsrung bar mi nus par gyur pas rnal 'byor gyis 'jigs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:121b-20: de ltar gyur pa de dag kyang ngan song gi dkyil 'khor gyi lam du 'jug par kha bltas shing gnas pa rnams kyang /
T02TD2510.1E:121b-21: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'jug tu rang ngo zhes pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:121b-25: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni skye ba'i gnas so //
T02TD2510.1E:121b-27: de'i lam ni mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ste /
T02TD2510.1E:121b-28: der mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas pa ni kha bltas shing gnas pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:121b-29: de lta bu de dag kyang rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug tu rung ngo //
T02TD2510.1E:121b-30: de la lha gzhan gyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la ni mi dge ba bcu cho gar bya ba'i tshul gyis brten par 'chad la 'dir ni gang du yang bstan pa med do //
T02TD2510.1E:121b-31: de la de rnams rim gyis ldog pa'i byed par 'gyur bas /
T02TD2510.1E:121b-32: rgyu de'i phyir 'jug pa'i cho ga 'dis kyang ldog par 'gyur du rung ba yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:122a-0: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa @122a * //
T02TD2510.1E:122a-1: ni tshul khrims kyi sdom pa rigs bdun dang ldan pa /
T02TD2510.1E:122a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la gnas pa'i skyes bu dam pa dag ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:122a-3: chos la spyod pas na chos can te /
T02TD2510.1E:122a-4: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang /
T02TD2510.1E:122a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu dang /
T02TD2510.1E:122a-6: sangs rgyas kyi sa'i spyod pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:122a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang /
T02TD2510.1E:122a-8: dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang /
T02TD2510.1E:122a-9: sems can gyi don byed pa'i tshul khrims so //
T02TD2510.1E:122a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o //
T02TD2510.1E:122a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:122a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang /
T02TD2510.1E:122a-14: shes rab nyid ni dngos grub dam pa'i thabs te /
T02TD2510.1E:122a-15: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi khyad par ro //
T02TD2510.1E:122a-16: de lta bu'i thabs de dag gis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yin la /
T02TD2510.1E:122a-17: de bas na de rnams sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub tshol zhing mngon par 'dod pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:122a-19: rnam par thar ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:122a-20: sa rnams kyis 'bad pa'i nyon mongs pa dag kyang chos nyid de zhes pa la /
T02TD2510.1E:122a-21: bsam gtan ni bsam gtan dang po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:122a-25: rnam par thar pa ni gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o ;
T02TD2510.1E:122a-26: / nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni /
T02TD2510.1E:122a-27: rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:122a-28: sdug par lhag par mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:122a-29: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
T02TD2510.1E:122a-30: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do //
T02TD2510.1E:122a-31: sogs pa'i sgras ni mngon par shes pa la sogs pa bsdu'o //
T02TD2510.1E:122a-32: sa ni rab tu dga' pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu'o //
T02TD2510.1E:122a-33: de rnams kyis 'bad cing rtsol bas nyon mongs par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:122b-0: tshul khrims rnam par @122b dag pa la sogs pa dang ldan pas sngon chad nyid sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba yin pa'i phyir tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:122b-1: de rnams ni 'jug pa tsam nyid kyis ye shes babs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:122b-2: de nas ye shes babs pa des rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro ;
T02TD2510.1E:122b-3: / de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du grub pa yang rnyed par dka' ba ma lags na /
T02TD2510.1E:122b-4: dngos grub gzhan rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes smos pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:122b-6: dge slong ma la sogs pa'i sdom pa la gsan pa nyid kyis na shin tu myur bar dngos grub thob par 'gyur la /
T02TD2510.1E:122b-7: gzhan dag ni dus phyis ldog pa'i sdom pa blangs nas 'gyur ro zhes ston pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:122b-8: de ltar sems can rnam pa bzhi gzhug par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:122b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab pa byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:122b-10: yang slob dpon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:122b-11: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yi //
T02TD2510.1E:122b-12: rdo rje slob dpon dga' thub ches //
T02TD2510.1E:122b-13: sems can kun la sman slad du //
T02TD2510.1E:122b-14: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD2510.1E:122b-15: zhes bya bas rjes su gnang ba nod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:122b-16: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:122b-17: dang po kho nar zhes bya ba ni thog ma kho nar ro //
T02TD2510.1E:122b-18: re zhig ces bya ba'i sgras ni go rims la ltos pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:122b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bzhi zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2510.1E:122b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.1E:122b-21: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:122b-22: de rnams la phyag byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2510.1E:122b-23: de ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni nye bar bstan pa'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:122b-24: lus thams cad kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2510.1E:122b-25: shar gyi sgor mngon par bltas te /
T02TD2510.1E:122b-26: rdo rje thal mo bcings la lag ngar brkyang ste /
T02TD2510.1E:122b-27: lus thams cad sa la phab ste kun nas rab tu phyag bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:122b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyi byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:123a-0: de yang rdo rje sems dpa' la zhugs te snying ga'i @123a * //
T02TD2510.1E:123a-1: zla ba la rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i gzugs kyis bzhugs pa la lta ba'i yid do //
T02TD2510.1E:123a-2: de nyid ni bsnyen bkur yin pas /
T02TD2510.1E:123a-3: sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dzo pasth'a ste /
T02TD2510.1E:123a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:123a-6: a'atma nam nir+ya t'a y'a mi /
T02TD2510.1E:123a-8: bdag nyid dbul bar bya'o zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:123a-9: sarbba ta th'a ga ta zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2510.1E:123a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la /
T02TD2510.1E:123a-11: badzra sa tva ste rdo rje sems dpa' yang yin pas /
T02TD2510.1E:123a-12: sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra sa tva ste /
T02TD2510.1E:123a-13: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa de la bod pa'o ;
T02TD2510.1E:123a-14: / sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra sa tva aa dh'i ti shatha sva m'am /
T02TD2510.1E:123a-15: zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag byin gyis rlobs shig pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:123a-16: bdag gi snying gar zhugs par mdzod la rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i gzugs kyis bzhugs shig pa'i tha tshig so //
T02TD2510.1E:123a-17: de skad ces brjod nas rnal 'byor pa'i snying ga'i zla ba la rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnas pa lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:123a-18: de bzhin du 'dug ste zhes bya ba ni lho phyogs kyi sgor mngon par bltas la /
T02TD2510.1E:123a-19: rdo rje thal mo snying gar gzhag ste /
T02TD2510.1E:123a-20: yan lag thams cad sa la phab la dpral ba sa la reg par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:123a-21: sarbba ta th'a ga ta zhes bya ba'i don ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.1E:123a-22: de rnams kyi p'u dza aa bhi she ka ni mchod cing dbang bskur ba ste /
T02TD2510.1E:123a-23: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po mdzod spu'i phyogs su bzhugs te /
T02TD2510.1E:123a-24: dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje rin chen gyi gzugs su bzhugs pa la blta ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.1E:123a-25: de'i don du a'atma nam n'ir+ya t'a y'a mi /
T02TD2510.1E:123a-27: sarbba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2510.1E:123a-28: sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra ratna ni bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po ste de la bod pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:123a-29: sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02TD2510.1E:123a-31: bdag gi dpral ba'i phyogs su bzhugs la rdo rje rin chen gyi gzugs kyis bzhugs par mdzod cig ces pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:123a-32: de nas dpral bar rdo rje rin chen gnas par lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:123a-33: de nas de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:123b-0: nub phyogs kyi sgor mngon par bltas la lus thams cad sa @123b la phab ste /
T02TD2510.1E:123b-1: rdo rje thal mo spyi bor bzhag la kha sa la reg par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:123b-2: sarbba ta th'a ga ta zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2510.1E:123b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa ni mchod pa ni lkog ma'i phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje chos bzhugs te /
