T02TD2510.1E:221a-17: las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya thams cad de /
T02TD2510.1E:221a-18: de rnams kyi cho ga 'dis tshul gyis bcings nas 'phral du dbang du 'gyur zhing 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:221a-19: de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi las brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi las gsungs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya thams cad ni phyag rgya kun no //
T02TD2510.1E:221a-20: de rnams kyi las ni bya ba ste /
T02TD2510.1E:221a-21: de rnams kyis mngon par 'dod pa'i don grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste de brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:221a-22: glu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2510.1E:221a-32: de la sogs pa las bde ba gang zhig skyes par gyur pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:221a-33: de rnams sangs rgyas te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phul na las kyi phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:221a-34: de la glu ni rdo rje glu la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:221a-35: gar ni rdo rje gar la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:221a-36: ro ni lha dang lhan cig tu gyur pa'i zhi ba dang sgeg mo la sogs pa rang bzhin can gyi nyams so //
T02TD2510.1E:221a-37: zas ni kha zas ro ba rgya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:221b-0: nyal ba'i @221b mtshan nyid can nam /
T02TD2510.1E:221b-1: sems kyi spyod pa snying rje chen po la sogs pa la gnas pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:221b-3: las kyi phyag rgya'i sgrub pa pos /
T02TD2510.1E:221b-4: rdo rje glu la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:221b-5: 'tshang rgya ba nyid la sogs pa'i sbyin pas sems can gyi khams thams cad tshim par byas la bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:221b-7: 'gro kun sangs rgyas nyi dang ni //
T02TD2510.1E:221b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i nyin kho nar re //
T02TD2510.1E:221b-9: ji bzhin du ni btul ba nyid //
T02TD2510.1E:221b-10: las kyi don kun grub byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:221b-12: de ltar dkyil 'khor bzhi las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad kyi dam tshig dang /
T02TD2510.1E:221b-16: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir gsang ba'i phyag rgya gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:221b-17: dkyil 'khor yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas dkyil 'khor thams cad de /
T02TD2510.1E:221b-18: de rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:221b-22: de rnams bsgrub pa ni rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:221b-23: gsang ba'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni /
T02TD2510.1E:221b-24: dkyil 'khor thams cad bsgrub pa'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab cing bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:221b-25: mtshan ma brtan par rang gyur nas //
T02TD2510.1E:221b-29: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa'i tshul brtan zhing yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma brtan pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:221b-30: srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o ;
T02TD2510.1E:221b-31: / de'i gzugs su rang ste bdag nyid du gyur nas /
T02TD2510.1E:221b-32: dkar por 'gyur ba'i ras la gnas //
T02TD2510.1E:221b-34: aom rtsi ta pra ti be dham ka ro mi /
T02TD2510.1E:221b-36: chos thams cad bdag med par bsgoms pas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa la mi bskyod pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bag chags dang bcas pa'i dri ma nag nog dang bral ba'i ras dkar po de'i rang bzhin rtogs pas gnas shing rnal 'byor gyi bdag nyid byas nas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:221b-37: de ltar ras dkar por gyur pa'i ras la gnas pa'i rjes la /
T02TD2510.1E:221b-38: mtshan ma mchod rten byin brlabs te //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-0: @222a * // zhes bya ba mtshan ma brtan pa de mchod rten tu byin gyis brlab pa ni bdag nyid ni rdo rje dbyings so zhes nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-3: shes rab la sogs pa'i skyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan ma stegs yin par bshad la mtshan ma der bdag nyid kyi yongs su rdzogs pa'i lhag par mos pa'i rjes su mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du rnam par bsgom pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i tshul du bsgoms pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'am /
T02TD2510.1E:222a-4: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i skur bdag nyid brten pa'i mchod rten du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-6: de ltar mtshan ma de mchod rten du byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ni bdag go zhes nga rgyal bskyed pa ni bdag nyid rdo rje dbyings su bsgom pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-8: mtshan ma mchod rten zhes bshad do //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-10: pha rol phyin drug spyod pa ni //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-11: mtshan ma 'di ni yin par bshad //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-12: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-13: rdo rje mtshan mar 'di bshad do //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-14: byang chub sems kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-15: mtshan ma brtan par shes par bya //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-16: shes rab pha rol phyin padma //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-17: dkar por gyur pa'i ras la gnas //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-18: shes rab phar phyin rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-19: yang dang yang du mnyam gzhag bya //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-20: byang chub sems dang shes rab ni //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-21: yang dang yang du brten gyur na //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-23: shes rab pha rol phyin tshul las //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-24: mchod rten gyur pa'i chos 'di ni //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-25: lus can kun gyis rnyed par dka' //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-26: byang chub sems dang shes rab che'i //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-27: mtshan ma mchod rten byin brlab po //
T02TD2510.1E:222a-29: de ltar thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor mchod rten du gyur par byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2510.1E:222a-31: badzra dh'a tu ra ham sa yam /
T02TD2510.1E:222a-32: zhes bya bas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la /
T02TD2510.1E:222a-33: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrubs te /
T02TD2510.1E:222a-34: nga rgyal bskyed la bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:222b-0: bsgom pa @222b gnyis pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje rtse mo las gsungs pas the tshom mi bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:222b-1: 'di ni re zhig don mdor bsdus pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:222b-2: yang don rgyas pa ni gang rgya che bas 'jigs shing skrag pa ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms pas /
T02TD2510.1E:222b-3: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i brtul zhugs spyod par spro ba med pa de ni re zhig nyin re zhing bdag bsrung ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro pa'i bsdu ba byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:222b-4: phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bkrol nas sdig pa dral ba yang bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:222b-5: de nas mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga'i rim pas mngon par sangs rgyas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:222b-6: rang gi snying gar rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du sprul la /
T02TD2510.1E:222b-7: bdag nyid rdo rje sems par byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2510.1E:222b-8: sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2510.1E:222b-9: rang gi snying gar rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor der yid kyis zhugs la dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi bar du slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rnams ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.1E:222b-10: rnal 'byor chen po byas la rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor stong gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad tsam bsams te /
T02TD2510.1E:222b-12: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mushti bam /
T02TD2510.1E:222b-13: aom badzra sa tva mu shit aam /
T02TD2510.1E:222b-14: aom badzra rtan mu shti tram /
T02TD2510.1E:222b-15: aom badzra dharmma mu shit kham /
T02TD2510.1E:222b-16: aom badzra ka rmam mu shti ham /
T02TD2510.1E:222b-17: zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi snying po 'dis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgya chen po dang bcas pas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po go rims ji lta ba bzhin du sprul la /
T02TD2510.1E:222b-24: aom badzra r'a ga / aom badzra s'a dhu /
T02TD2510.1E:222b-26: aom badzra aa be sha zhes bya ba'i snying po zlos shing /
T02TD2510.1E:222b-27: rdo rje sems dpa'i nga rgyal gyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje pa'i bar gyis rang rang gi gnas su bkod nas /
T02TD2510.1E:222b-28: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes lan gsum zlos shing /
T02TD2510.1E:222b-29: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sku dang /
T02TD2510.1E:222b-31: thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:223a-0: zhes lan gsum zlos shing bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis @223a * //
T02TD2510.1E:223a-1: rnam par dag pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:223a-2: de nas sarbba sa mo nya ham /
T02TD2510.1E:223a-3: zhes bya ba 'di lan gsum zlos shing bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:223a-4: sems dpa' thams cad dang bdag nyid mnyam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:223a-5: de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rang bzhin ni bdag yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed la /
T02TD2510.1E:223a-6: rdo rje'i tshig gis badzra sa tva zhes zlos shing rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rang bzhin bdag yin no zhes thun bzhi'i spyor bas zla ba gcig gam /
T02TD2510.1E:223a-9: dus ji srid kyi rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i gzugs su bdag nyid mthong ba de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
T02TD2510.1E:223a-10: rnal 'byor chen po nyin re zhing lan cig byas pa des 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyi bzlas pa byas la dkyil 'khor chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:223a-15: phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams bri bar bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
T02TD2510.1E:223a-16: rnal 'byor chen po snying po che //
T02TD2510.1E:223a-17: med na dngos grub med pas na //
T02TD2510.1E:223a-18: de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis //
T02TD2510.1E:223a-19: rnal 'byor chen po brtsam par bya //
T02TD2510.1E:223a-20: zhes bya ba 'di yang gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:223a-21: yang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rnal 'byor byas la rnal 'byor chen po bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:223a-22: de nas rang gi snying gar dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:223a-23: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i dus su yang zhag bdun gyi bar du rdo rje sems pa'i sbyor bas rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:223a-24: ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms nas de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:223a-25: de ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po sgrub par byed pa'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya bstan nas /
T02TD2510.1E:223a-27: rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te //
T02TD2510.1E:223a-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub par byed par gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:223a-29: rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te //
T02TD2510.1E:223a-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad zin to //
T02TD2510.1E:223a-31: mthe chung dang ni mdzub rtse bsgreng //
T02TD2510.1E:223b-0: zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi @223b rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
T02TD2510.1E:223b-1: mthe chung gnyis gshibs la sbyar /
T02TD2510.1E:223b-2: mdzub mo gnyis kyang gshibs la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:223b-3: 'di ni gzungs kyi dkyil sgrub par byed pa'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:223b-4: dam tshig ces bya ba ni ma tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:223b-5: dam tshig mchog ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:223b-7: de bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di nyid bcings te sngar bshad pa'i rigs kyi snying po rnams kyi snying gar gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul la /
T02TD2510.1E:223b-8: gzungs kyi rig pa rnams kyis rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma nas brtsams te rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi gzungs rnams gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bskong de /
T02TD2510.1E:223b-10: aom sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02TD2510.1E:223b-12: zhes bya bas gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsams nas /
T02TD2510.1E:223b-13: bdag nyid gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin yin no zhes nga rgyal ba bskyed la /
T02TD2510.1E:223b-14: nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i spyor bas gzungs kyi rig pa re re zhing khri khri bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:223b-15: de lta bus ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:223b-16: de ltar gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub par byed pa'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya bshad nas /
T02TD2510.1E:223b-17: da ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub par byed pa'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:223b-18: rdo rje phra mo'i tshul du ni //
T02TD2510.1E:223b-19: rab tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom //
T02TD2510.1E:223b-20: rdo rje phra mo'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2510.1E:223b-23: de la rdo rje phra mo'i tshul ni //
T02TD2510.1E:223b-24: lce ni rkan la gzhar bya zhing //
T02TD2510.1E:223b-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pa spro ba dang bsdu ba bsgom pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:223b-26: brtan par byas pa ni rdo rje phra mo'i zhes bshad de /
T02TD2510.1E:223b-27: rdo rje phra mo'i tshul des rab tu mnyam par bzhag pas sems rtse gcig tu bsdus te bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:223b-28: ci zhig bsgom par bya zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:223b-29: rdo rje phra mo'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2510.1E:223b-31: rdo rje phra mos nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:223b-32: rdo rje phra mo ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:223b-33: gang zhig byed cing bsgom zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:223b-34: rdo rje phra mo'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2510.1E:224a-2: ting nge 'dzin dbang du byed cing zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:224a-3: 'dis ni don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:224a-4: snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la sngar bshad pa'i rigs kyi snying po rnams kyis rang gi snying gar chos kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed la rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis rang gi snying gnas bton te /
T02TD2510.1E:224a-5: sna'i rtse mor bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:224a-6: de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i sngags kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bkod la /
T02TD2510.1E:224a-7: snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid chos kyi dkyil 'khor yin no zhes chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nga rgyal ji lta ba bzhin du bskyed la chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sngags zlos shing zla ba gnyis kyi bar du nyin re zhing chos kyi 'khor lo sna rtser bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:224a-8: bsgoms pas dub na sna bu gnas rang gi snying gar bcug la /
T02TD2510.1E:224a-9: badzri dri dha ti shat zhes bya bas brtan par bya'o ;
T02TD2510.1E:224a-10: / de yang zla ba gcig rtsam spro ba dang bsdu ba'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:224a-11: de lta bus ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:224a-12: de ltar chos kyi dkyil 'khor grub par byed pa'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya gsungs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:224a-13: da ni las kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub par byed pa yang brtan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:224a-14: rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings la //
T02TD2510.1E:224a-15: de gnyis rdo rje dam du bzung //
T02TD2510.1E:224a-16: mdzub mo mthe chung bsnol ba ni //
T02TD2510.1E:224a-17: rdo rje dgos mchog dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2510.1E:224a-19: de la rdo rje'i phyag gnyis ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis te de bcings la gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:224a-20: ci zhig gzung bar bya zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:224a-21: rdo rje ste sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02TD2510.1E:224a-22: de yang de gnyis dang 'brel pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe 'u chung bsnol ba ste /
T02TD2510.1E:224a-23: mdzub mo gnyis bcings pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:224a-24: mthe'u chung gnyis bcings pas dam du gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:224a-25: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:224a-26: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mdun du phyogs par sbyar te /
T02TD2510.1E:224a-27: rang rang gi mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung mdud pas sna tshogs rdo rje gzung bar bya zhing dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i sngags kyis sna tshogs rdo rje gzung par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:224b-0: de ltar sna tshogs rdo rje thogs @224b pa ni rdo rje dgos mchog gi dkyil du las kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i mtshan ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:224b-1: 'di yang snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po bskyed la /
T02TD2510.1E:224b-2: sngar bshad pa'i rigs kyi snying po lngas rang gi snying gar la skyi dkyil 'khor sbrul la /
T02TD2510.1E:224b-3: las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rig pa rnams kyis lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du dgod pa byas na tshig thams cad rjes su spyad de bdag nyid la ni ma las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed la nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas rig pa thams cad khri khri bzla bar bya ba ste /
T02TD2510.1E:224b-4: de lta bus ni las kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:224b-5: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bu las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya bzhis rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa nyid kyis byas la bsgrub par bya'o zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2510.1E:224b-6: ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa gang yin pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:224b-7: rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar de rnams ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:224b-8: de rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02TD2510.1E:224b-9: dam tshig dang chos dang las kyi phyag rgya chen po yin pas /
T02TD2510.1E:224b-10: phyag rgya yang yin la chen po yang yin pa'i phyir phyag rgya chen po zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:224b-11: de rnams kyi bcing ba bzhi po bslab pa ni bstan pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:224b-12: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcing pa'i mtshan nyid //
T02TD2510.1E:224b-13: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa nyid brtan par bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:224b-14: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:224b-15: de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod cing rdo rje bstod pa'i glu blangs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:224b-16: gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:224b-17: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.1E:224b-18: badzra satva mu: zhes bya ba'i bar gyi cho ga bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:225a-0: rdo rje'i dngos grub ni bcom ldan 'das @225a * //
T02TD2510.1E:225a-2: phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa rang gi phyag rgya bzhi dang bcas par bri ba ji lta ba bzhin du ste /
T02TD2510.1E:225a-3: de bzhin du mi g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa zhes bya ba de bzhin du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02TD2510.1E:225a-4: dbus su rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su glang po che'i gdan la badzra dh'a tu zhes bya bas mi bskyod pa dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:225a-5: mi bskyod pa'i gnas su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje rtse lnga pa /
T02TD2510.1E:225a-6: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rdo rje rgyal po'i lcags kyu /
T02TD2510.1E:225a-7: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su rdo rje chags pa'i mda' dang gzhu /
T02TD2510.1E:225a-8: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje legs pa'i mgu pa'i phyag rgya badzra tva zhes bya ba'i snying po 'am /
T02TD2510.1E:225a-9: phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rigs kyi snying po zlos shing bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:225a-10: mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02TD2510.1E:225a-11: dbus su ri'i khri la rin chen 'byung lnga /
T02TD2510.1E:225a-12: mi bskyod pa'i gnas su la ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bcom ldan 'das dro rje rin chen //
T02TD2510.1E:225a-13: rin chen 'byung lags kyi gnas su rdo rje zi brjid kyi nyi ma'i phyag rgya /
T02TD2510.1E:225a-14: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su dpal gyi rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya /
T02TD2510.1E:225a-15: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su bzhad pa'i so'i phreng ba rdo rje gnyis kyi bar du chud pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rang gi snying po'am /
T02TD2510.1E:225a-16: rigs kyi snying pos bri bar bya'o ;
T02TD2510.1E:225a-17: / rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02TD2510.1E:225a-18: dbus su rma bya'i gdan la bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa /
T02TD2510.1E:225a-19: mi bskyod pa'i gnas su rdo rje chos kyi padma'i phyag rgya /
T02TD2510.1E:225a-20: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rnon po'i phyag rgya /
T02TD2510.1E:225a-21: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su rgyu'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya /
T02TD2510.1E:225a-22: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su smra ba lce'i phyag rgya rang gi snying po'am rigs kyi snying pos bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:225a-23: 'od dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02TD2510.1E:225b-0: dbus su nam mkha' lding gi gdan gyi steng du bcom ldan @225b 'das don yod par grub pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:225b-1: mi bskyod pa'i gnas su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du sna tshogs rdo rje /
T02TD2510.1E:225b-2: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su go cha /
T02TD2510.1E:225b-3: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su mche ba gnyis /
T02TD2510.1E:225b-4: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su khu chur gyi phyag rgya sngar bshad pa'i rang gi snying po'am //
T02TD2510.1E:225b-5: rigs kyi snying pos bris bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:225b-6: 'di ni don yod par grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2510.1E:225b-7: 'di dag kyang rang rang gi phyag rgya rnams su bris na zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:225b-8: dngos grub thams cad kyi kyang 'grub bo //
T02TD2510.1E:225b-9: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dngos grub gang gsungs pa /
T02TD2510.1E:225b-10: de thams cad mi bskyod pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:225b-13: don yod par grub pa'i phyag rgya bzhi dkyil 'khor du yang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshigs //
T02TD2510.1E:225b-14: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni phyi'o yo byad med par shin tu sbyangs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:225b-15: de ltar zhes bya ba ni sa la ji lta ba bzhin du ras dang /
T02TD2510.1E:225b-17: nam mkha' dang gnas thams cad du mngon par bris pa rnams so //
T02TD2510.1E:225b-18: dngos grub thams cad 'grub po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:225b-19: sgrub pa po spro ba bskyed par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:225b-20: dus nges pa'i 'bras bu gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:225b-21: dkyil 'khor rtag pa nas brtsams te //
T02TD2510.1E:225b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:225b-23: de la dkyil 'khor rtag pa ni kun du bris pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:225b-24: dkyil 'khor bris pa de nas brtsams shing de nas mgo bzung nas so //
T02TD2510.1E:225b-25: la la ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de nyid kyi tshe zhes bya ba la 'jug pa'i rjes thogs nyid kyi mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2510.1E:225b-26: la la ni nyin zhag gcig gis zhes bya ba ni nyin mtshan gcig gis so //
T02TD2510.1E:225b-27: mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang zhes bya ba /
T02TD2510.1E:225b-28: pha dang ma dang dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:225b-29: dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:225b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyi kyis khrag phyung ba byas pa spang ngo //
T02TD2510.1E:225b-31: 'di sa ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:225b-32: sdig pa chen po byed pa rnams kyang 'grub par 'gyur na gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos //
T02TD2510.1E:225b-33: de bas na thams cad bsgrub pa la 'bad par bya'i //
T02TD2510.1E:225b-34: bdag ni sdig pa byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:226a-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bdag nyid la brnyas par mi bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:226a-3: ji ltar 'dod par zhes bya ba ni dus ji tsam bsgom par nus par gyur pa'i dus de srid du byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:226a-4: bde blag tu zhes bya ba ni bya ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i bsdams pa'i sdug bsngal yongs su spangs la /
T02TD2510.1E:226a-5: rnal 'byor dang rjes su mthun pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa bsten pas so //
T02TD2510.1E:226a-7: dka' thub dka' spyad mi bzad pas //
T02TD2510.1E:226a-8: lus skabs 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal la //
T02TD2510.1E:226a-9: sdug bsngal gyis ni sems g-yeng ba //
T02TD2510.1E:226a-10: rnal 'byor la ni sbyor ba mi 'gyur //
T02TD2510.1E:226a-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:226a-12: don thams cad byed cing zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa'i yan lag thams cad ni don dam thams cad de /
T02TD2510.1E:226a-13: de rnams rgyun mi 'chad par nyams su len pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:226a-14: de yang gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zhig ji skad du gsungs pa'i chog mi byed pa de ni dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:226a-15: thams cad rjes su dga' ba dang //
T02TD2510.1E:226a-16: zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyang yin la rjes su dga' ba yang yin pas na thams cad rjes su dga' ba ste /
T02TD2510.1E:226a-17: dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i gsungs pa'i phyag rgya bsgom pa'am /
T02TD2510.1E:226a-18: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad bsgom pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:226a-20: re ba thams cad de sogs pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:226a-21: thams cad rjes su dga' ba'i ro dang /
T02TD2510.1E:226a-23: spyod lam thams cad las bde ba gang zhig skyes pa de ni thams cad rjes su dga' ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:226a-26: spyod lam thams cad kyi bde ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:226a-27: de rnams nyams su myong ba ni nyams su tshor ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:226a-28: lo gcig gis ni mchog grub po //
T02TD2510.1E:226a-29: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gnas rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02TD2510.1E:226a-30: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2510.1E:226a-32: // / de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02TD2510.1E:226a-33: sems can mdor bsdus pa la dga' ba rnams rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:226b-0: rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bu las gsungs pa'i dngos grub @226b thams cad bsdus par gyur pa'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:226b-1: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:226b-2: dang po sbyor ba'i rjes thogs nyid la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:226b-3: de la yang dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs ba nyid yin par gzung ngo //
T02TD2510.1E:226b-4: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor la ltos nas yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:226b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
T02TD2510.1E:226b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rtul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T02TD2510.1E:226b-7: de rnams kyi dngos grub dam pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:226b-8: de'i dam tshig ni dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD2510.1E:226b-9: de la dmigs pa de rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang la mi 'di nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:226b-10: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:226b-11: phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2510.1E:226b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po de'i mngon par rtogs pa ni thugs su chud pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:226b-13: ming de skad ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa ston par byed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gang yin pa der rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ba ni badzra sa tva zhes bya ba ston pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:226b-14: gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:226b-15: de nas bsdu ba byas nas las kyi mchog de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni las kyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:226b-16: rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bu las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams ni phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pas bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:226b-17: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.1E:226b-18: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ston pa'i tshig ste /
T02TD2510.1E:227a-1: sems dpa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas nas badzra sa tva zhes bya ba bzlas brjod bye ba byas pa'am /
T02TD2510.1E:227a-2: phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms pas mtshan ma thob pa'i rjes thogs la phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:227a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa 'grub par bya ba'i bar du zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2510.1E:227a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub ste /
T02TD2510.1E:227a-5: sems can gyi khams thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par bya ba grub par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go//
T02TD2510.1E:227a-6: bar du zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub rnams bsdu'o //
T02TD2510.1E:227a-7: de nas zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir mdor bsdus pa la dga' ba'i gdul bya rnams kyang phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pas rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bu las gsungs pa'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur bas /
T02TD2510.1E:227a-8: de bas na rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa des de'i dngos grub 'grub pa'i skal ba can du bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:227a-9: yang dag cing phyin ci ma log par rab tu phye ste bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:227a-10: sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2510.1E:227a-11: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor yin pa nyid kyis ni mchog yin pas dkyil 'khor dam pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:227a-12: gang gi phyir 'dir zhugs pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:227a-13: dbang bskur bas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon du 'gyur zhing rang nyid kyis kyang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad bris nas bdag nyid 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:227a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i slob dpon gzhan dag ni /
T02TD2510.1E:227a-15: rang gi rigs 'ba' zhig gi slob dpon yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:227a-16: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na //
T02TD2510.1E:227a-17: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2510.1E:227a-18: ming ji skad ces bya zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:227a-19: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes kyang bshad //
T02TD2510.1E:227a-21: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
T02TD2510.1E:227b-0: dkyil @227b 'khor phyi rim thig gdab po //
T02TD2510.1E:227b-1: zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor dbyibs rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2510.1E:227b-2: de ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba dang dkyil 'khor 'di bris la dkyil 'khor de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:227b-4: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02TD2510.1E:227b-5: rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag par bya //
T02TD2510.1E:227b-7: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /
T02TD2510.1E:227b-8: rdo rje sems dpa' lugs ma'am /
T02TD2510.1E:227b-11: ris su bris pa la badzra sa tva zhes zlos shing gzhag par bya'o /
T02TD2510.1E:227b-12: de nas dgug pa dang gzhug pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor nyid kyis rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:227b-13: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i 'jug pa'i cho ga dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs kyi bar du ji lta ba bzhin du bya bas bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:227b-14: de nas rang gi ming nas brjod la phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgrubs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:227b-15: rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi //
T02TD2510.1E:227b-16: rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:227b-17: se gol mang po brlabs bgyis pa //
T02TD2510.1E:227b-18: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya //
T02TD2510.1E:227b-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du byas te /
T02TD2510.1E:227b-20: zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:227b-21: de la dgug pa ni rdo rje lcags kyus las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:227b-22: gzhug pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas so //
T02TD2510.1E:227b-23: dgug pa dang gzhug pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni dgug pa dang gzhug pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:227b-24: rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcings pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:227b-26: dbang du bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.1E:227b-27: dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bstan pa'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa gang yin pa de thams cad do //
T02TD2510.1E:227b-28: de ltar byas nas ji ltar zhugs pa de rnams la dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi man ngag bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:227b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02TD2510.1E:227b-30: zhes bya ba sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.1E:228a-1: pa thams cad kyi dngos grub ni rdo rje sems dpa' grub pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:228a-2: de'i ye shes ni phyag rgya chen por nges pa'i tshul te /
T02TD2510.1E:228a-3: de bskyed par bya ba ni bslab pa bya zhing nye bar bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:228a-4: de la dang po kho nar mna'i snying po sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:228a-5: 'di ni khyod kyi zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:228a-6: dam tshig ma mthong ba zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:228a-7: khong du ma chud pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par mi mkhas pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:228a-8: gsang ba de rnams kyi skal ba dang mi ldan zhing phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba ma thob pa'i bar du'o //
T02TD2510.1E:228a-9: gsang ba 'di zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:228a-11: zhes 'og nas bshad pa gang yin pa de lta bu de ni /
T02TD2510.1E:228a-12: skye bo thams cad la bstan du mi rung bas gsang ba yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:228a-13: de la gsang ba 'di smras na nyes pa cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:228a-14: khyod ngan song thams cad du ltung ba'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.1E:228a-15: khyod shi nas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:228a-16: tshe'i lhag ma yod du zin kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' las 'das par gyur pas dus ma yin par 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:228a-17: de nas zhes bya ba ni mna' bsgags pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2510.1E:228a-18: rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub dam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2510.1E:228a-19: rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub dam pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub dam pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:228a-20: dngos grub kyi dam pa de'i sgrub pa ni 'dis bsgrubs pas na sgrub pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:228a-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bsgom pa de'i ye shes bslab po //
T02TD2510.1E:228a-23: zla ba yang yin la rgyas pa yang yin pas na zla rgyas so //
T02TD2510.1E:228a-24: de'i dkyil 'khor ni zla rgyas dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2510.1E:228a-29: phyag rgya chen po yongs bzung nas //
T02TD2510.1E:228a-31: phyag rgya yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02TD2510.1E:228a-32: byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig dang /
T02TD2510.1E:228b-0: phyag rgya chen po yin gyi phyag rgya chen po 'ba' @228b zhig tsam ni ma yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:228b-1: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes rnams bskyed par bya'o zhes tshig mang po ltar bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:228b-2: de rnams gang gis yongs su bzung zhing bcings pa de ni phyag rgya chen po yongs su bzung bas zhes bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:228b-3: de rnams kyi nang nas phyag rgya gang yang rung ba cig la /
T02TD2510.1E:228b-4: bdag nyid de rang nyid rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms nas /
T02TD2510.1E:228b-5: myur zhing ring bor mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:228b-6: 'di'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:228b-7: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis /
T02TD2510.1E:228b-8: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:228b-9: de'i phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:228b-12: las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:228b-13: de'i snying po rdo rje'i tshig gis zlos shing bzlas pa'i don gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid bsgoms na /
T02TD2510.1E:228b-14: shin tu myur ba nyid du rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:228b-15: dam tshig yongs su bsrungs pas mngon par 'dod pa'i don 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes rab tu bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:228b-16: de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi ye shes bslab po zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2510.1E:228b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams ni dkyil 'khor thams cad de /
T02TD2510.1E:228b-18: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig ste /
T02TD2510.1E:228b-19: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rjes su chags shing shin tu zhen pa de'i ye shes la bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:228b-20: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig / ces bya ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i sems ni 'dod chags dang bral ba ste /
T02TD2510.1E:228b-21: de dang 'dra ba'i sdig pa gzhan ni med do //
T02TD2510.1E:228b-23: khams gsum na med ces bya ba ste ;
T02TD2510.1E:228b-26: gzugs med pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi khams gsum pa na'o //
T02TD2510.1E:228b-27: gang gi phyir de ltar bshad pa yin pas /
T02TD2510.1E:228b-28: de bas na 'dod chags dang bral ba khyod kyis kyang ni ma byed cig ces bya ba yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:229a-0: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub @229a * //
T02TD2510.1E:229a-2: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ni /
T02TD2510.1E:229a-3: gdul bya rnams kyis 'dod cing mngon par dga' bar bya ba yin pas na 'dod pa zhes bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:229a-4: de la khyod kyis kyang chags pa dang bral bar ma byed cig ces pa ste de spangs pa ni nyan thogs dang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba ma yin no zhes ston pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:229a-5: ma h'a sa ma ya ha na phat /
T02TD2510.1E:229a-6: ces bya ba ni de ltar dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dam tshig byin nas /
T02TD2510.1E:229a-7: slob dpon gyi slob ma rnams kyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par 'dod pa'i sems dang bral ba'i bsam pas sngags 'di gdon par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:229a-8: de nas mna'i snying po sbyin no zhes bya ba ni khyed kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba la smra bar ma byed cig / dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re /
T02TD2510.1E:229a-9: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02TD2510.1E:229a-10: snying la yang dag zhugs par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.1E:229a-11: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD2510.1E:229a-12: de ma thag tu dral nas gshegs //
T02TD2510.1E:229a-14: de ltar rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi spang ba'i mtshan nyid kyis dam tshig dang sdom pa sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:229a-15: gang gi phyir dngos grub thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems dang 'brel pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:229a-16: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ji skad du bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor du byin gyis brlabs nas bsgrub par bya'o zhes ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:229a-17: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bzhi bcings te bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:229a-20: las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:229a-21: dngos grub kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por phyag rgya bzhis 'grub par 'gyur ba 'dir yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:229b-0: ri mo la sogs pa dang zhes bya ba ni ji ltar sa la bris pa'i dkyil 'khor du ji skad bshad pa'i dngos grub 'di rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba de bzhin du ras ris la sogs pa brtags pa rnams la yang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes brtan par bya @229b ba'i phyir gsungs so //
T02TD2510.1E:229b-1: ji ltar 'dod pa'i cho ga bzhin byas na //
T02TD2510.1E:229b-3: ji skad du bstan pa'i cho ga 'di rnams kyi nang nas /
T02TD2510.1E:229b-4: gang zhig gang la sred pa de la cho ga de nyid kyis byas na dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:229b-5: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas ba ji lta ba bzhin bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:229b-6: de nas ci khyod don 'byung ba'i dngos grub kyi ye shes dang /
T02TD2510.1E:229b-7: rdzu 'phrul gyi don dngos grub kyi ye shes dang zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.1E:229b-8: gshegs su gsol ba'i bar gyi cho ga rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ji lta ba bzhin 'dir yang de bzhin du bya'o ;
T02TD2510.1E:229b-9: / rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'i rtogs pa sangs rgyas kyi gsung nyid yin par bstan pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2510.1E:229b-10: dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol zhing nye bar bsdu bar byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:229b-11: slob dpon gyis rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya bas mnyes par bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:229b-12: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.1E:229b-13: yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas zhes bya ba la yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni slar yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:229b-14: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir gsol ba btab cing 'dus par mdzad nas /
T02TD2510.1E:229b-15: da ni skad du bshad pa'i don gnyis po rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:229b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:229b-17: de nyid kyis na byang chub kyi sems chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:229b-18: stong pa nyid ston par byed pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga de'i phyag na mnga' bas na phyag na rdo rje chen po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:229b-19: de la rdo rje dgyes pa'i legs so zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya snying po 'di zhes bya ba thugs la gnas pas so //
T02TD2510.1E:229b-20: da ni snying po ston te /
T02TD2510.1E:229b-21: legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod //
T02TD2510.1E:229b-22: ces bya ba ni gang rdo rje sems dpa'i tshul gyis bstan pa de ni khyed legs so //
T02TD2510.1E:229b-23: de bzhin du gang rdo rje rin chen dang /
T02TD2510.1E:229b-24: chos dang las kyi tshul gyis bshad pa de kyed legs so //
T02TD2510.1E:229b-25: gang gi phyir thams cad legs shing mdzes pa nyid yin pas na mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:230a-1: pa 'debs pa'i nyes pa dang bral ba yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:230a-2: rdo rje the pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:230a-3: rdo rje theg pa yin pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:230a-5: de yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje las byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kan gnas pa'i sems dpa'i rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rang bzhin las /
T02TD2510.1E:230a-6: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad byung bas /
T02TD2510.1E:230a-7: de'i phyir rdo rje theg pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:230a-8: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang ba zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2510.1E:230a-9: theg pa chen po ni skye po thams cad kyi thun mong ma yin par ston to //
T02TD2510.1E:230a-10: de gtso bor gyur pa 'dir mdor bsdus pas na mdor bsdus pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:230a-11: de bas na theg pa chen po mngon pas bsdus pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:230a-12: rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan gyis kyang //
T02TD2510.1E:230a-13: dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur //
T02TD2510.1E:230a-14: zhes bya ba ni gang gi rdo rje theg pa ston par mdzad pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:230a-15: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa thams cad du rtogs pa'i sku dang /
T02TD2510.1E:230a-17: thugs rdo rje'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nam mkha' thams cad du spros pas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:230a-18: de lta bu'i rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan nyid kyis kyang zhes pa /
T02TD2510.1E:230a-19: mtshan tsam zhig brjod pa dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:230a-20: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad skyed par mdzad pa'i mchog ste /
T02TD2510.1E:230a-21: dam pa yin pas mtshan tsam 'dzin pa yang 'bras bu don yod par stsal ba yin no zhes ston to //
T02TD2510.1E:230a-22: kyang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni sgom par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T02TD2510.1E:230a-23: de ni nges pa kho nar thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:230a-24: kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di nyid kyi don bstan pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:230a-25: dag par byas nas bsgrubs na ni //
T02TD2510.1E:230a-26: sangs rgyas nyid kyang bde ba thob //
T02TD2510.1E:230a-27: ces bya ba yin te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes bya ba 'dis sgrib pa rnam par dag pas na dag par byas pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:230b-0: @230b rdo rje sems dpa' 'ba' zhig bsgrubs shing bsgoms na /
T02TD2510.1E:230b-1: sangs rgyas nyid bde zhing dka' ba spyod pa med par tshe 'di nyid kyis bde ba mi zad cing med par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:230b-2: de yang sgrub pa pos rdo rje sems dpa' bde bas bsgrubs pas na sgrub pa po'i tshe 'di nyid la bri ba med pas mi zad pa dang ;
T02TD2510.1E:230b-3: rgyun chad pa'i 'jigs pa med pas med cing god par mi 'gyur ba'i zag pa med pa'i bde ba 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:230b-4: yang ci'i phyir sgrub pa pos dag ba dang bde ba sgrubs pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:230b-5: ji skad du bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i bde bsgrubs pa po la 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:230b-6: rdo rje chos kyi sbyor ba ni //
T02TD2510.1E:230b-8: gang gi phyir ji skad du bshad pa'i rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje chos kyis 'byor ba 'dis /
T02TD2510.1E:230b-9: 'dod pa kun gyi bde ba'i bde bas sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:230b-10: de la 'dod pa yang yin la kun kyang yin pas 'dod pa kun te /
T02TD2510.1E:230b-12: dbang bskur ba'i mchod pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:230b-15: rnal 'byor dang rjes su mthun pa'i ro la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:230b-16: de rnams las skyes pa'i bde ba rnams ni 'dod pa kun gyi bde ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:230b-17: 'dod pa kun gyi bde ba bde dang /
T02TD2510.1E:230b-18: rdo rje chos kyi sbyor ba dang bcas pas 'grub par 'gyur gyi /
T02TD2510.1E:230b-19: dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'i bde bas sgrub pa pos sangs rgyas thob cing bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gzung ba ni ma yin no zhes bya bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:230b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa bshad zin to //
T02TD2510.1E:230b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs par ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa ston par byed pa ni brtags pa las byung ba yin pa'i phyir rtogs pa zhes bya'o ;
T02TD2510.1E:230b-22: / de yang rtog pa gzhan las shin tu mchog tu gyur pa yin pas rgyal po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:230b-23: rdzogs pa ni rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rang bzhin gyis mthar thug pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:230b-24: rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bu 'di thams cad brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:230b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
T02TD2510.1E:231a-1: rje'i dbyings ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.1E:231a-2: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar re re zhing 'dir skyes pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:231a-3: de rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
T02TD2510.1E:231a-5: thugs rdo rje'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin du bskyed pas 'grub pa'i phyir rdo rje'i dbyings so ;
T02TD2510.1E:231a-6: / de bas na rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bu ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bu ma lus pa de las phyogs gcig ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:231a-7: 'di ni rgyud phyi ma las phyag rgya chen po zhes bya bar yang ston te /
T02TD2510.1E:231a-8: de la phyag rgya yang yin la chen po yang yin pas phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02TD2510.1E:231a-9: mi bskyod ba'i rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems chen po'i phyag rgya ni /
T02TD2510.1E:231a-10: chos bdag med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis 'di ni thams cad du khyab pa'i phyir che ba nyid do //
T02TD2510.1E:231a-11: de las byung ba rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar la nye bar gdags pas phyag rgya chen po zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:231a-12: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las byung bas na /
T02TD2510.1E:231a-13: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs te /
T02TD2510.1E:231a-14: skyes pas rigs zhes bshad pa yin //
T02TD2510.1E:231a-16: sgeg pa rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bshad pas /
T02TD2510.1E:231a-17: 'di ni 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags spang pa'i phyir gsungs so //
T02TD2510.1E:231a-19: shes rab thams kyi de nyid che //
T02TD2510.1E:231a-20: byang chub chen po rab grub phyir //
T02TD2510.1E:231a-21: blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yis //
T02TD2510.1E:231a-22: rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di gsungs so //
T02TD2510.1E:231a-24: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nying bsdus pa las /
T02TD2510.1E:231a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam par 'jug pa nyid kyi sbyor bas /
T02TD2510.1E:231a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin rdo rje dbyings thams cad du thugs su chung pa'i ye shes sems dpa'i tshul de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ngo bo /
T02TD2510.1E:231a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2510.1E:231a-28: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rang bzhin gyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen bo bstan nas /
T02TD2510.1E:231a-29: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka'i rjes su 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ngo bo /
T02TD2510.1E:231b-0: rdo rje'i @231b rigs chen po khro bas khro ba spangs pa'i phyir ston par bzhed pas /
T02TD2510.1E:231b-1: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.1E:231b-2: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ston par byed pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:231b-3: dang po sbyor ba'i rjes thogs la //
T02TD2510.1E:231b-4: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:231b-5: 'dir dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
T02TD2510.1E:231b-6: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po gsungs pa nyid yin la /
T02TD2510.1E:231b-7: khyad par ni 'di yod de 'di ltar rdo rje sems dpa' sprul pa dang lhan cig ces bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:231b-8: yang gcig tu 'dus par gyur te zhes bya ba yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni legs so zhes bya ba'i sbyin pa 'dus par mdzad pa la ltos nas yang thogs par mdzad pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:231b-9: yang gcig tu 'dus par gyur te zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:231b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba la zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2510.1E:231b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo chen po ni rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD2510.1E:231b-12: de rnams dpag tu med pa sprul pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:231b-13: bri ba dag gis bskor zhing rab tu 'jug pa'i dang tshul 'di la mnga' bas na /
T02TD2510.1E:231b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba ste /
T02TD2510.1E:231b-15: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rang bzhin rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:231b-16: yon tan gyi khyad par de lta bu dang ldan pa de la 'og nas bshad pa'i mtshan brgya las rtsa brgyad lhag pa 'dis gsol ba btab pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:231b-17: de ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa de gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:231b-18: de la rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por badzra satva zhes snying po'i sgo nas gang gsungs pa de la khyod ces snying po'i sgo nas bod pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:231b-19: rdo rje che zhes bya ba ni rdo rje yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na rdo rje che ste /
T02TD2510.1E:231b-20: byang chub kyi sems kyi lcags kyu'i tshul gyis thams cad du khyab pa rdo rje rgyal po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:231b-21: 'dis ni don gyis bstan pa'i sgo nas badzra r'a dza zhes snying po gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:231b-22: rdo rje mgon po zhes bya ba la rdo rje ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T02TD2510.1E:231b-23: de rnams kyi mgon po ni chos bdag med pa'i 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin rdo rje chags pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:232a-0: gang gi phyir 'di ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang bzhin @232a * //
T02TD2510.1E:232a-1: gyi gdul bya nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems kyi 'jigs pa las grol bar mdzad pas /
T02TD2510.1E:232a-2: de'i phyir rdo rje mgon po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:232a-3: 'dis kyang badzra r'a gzhes bya ba'i snying po'i don gyi sgo nas ston pa yin la /
T02TD2510.1E:232a-4: gang la khyad par du bstan pa med pa gzhan dag tu yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:232a-5: rab tu legs so zhes bya bas shin tu sgrub par mdzad pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:232a-6: rab bsgrub mdzad ces bya ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa'i ngo bo rdo rje legs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:232a-7: rdo rje dbang bskur zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD2510.1E:232a-8: rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje dbang bskur te /
T02TD2510.1E:232a-10: des na nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i chu'i rang bzhin can gyis gdul bya rnams kyi gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma 'khrud par mdzad pas na dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:232a-11: rdo rje 'od ces bya ba ni rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i 'od de /
T02TD2510.1E:232a-12: 'od zer 'di la mnga' bas na rdo rje 'od dang /
T02TD2510.1E:232a-14: rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba ni badzra he ru ka zhes bya ba'i snying po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:232a-15: rdo rje bzhad pa ni 'dzum pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:232a-16: rdo rje ltar dbyer mi phyed pa'i bzhad pa 'di la mnga' bas na rdo rje bzhad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:232a-17: chos chen po zhes bya ba ni chos chen po 'di la mnga' bas na chos chen po ste /
T02TD2510.1E:232a-18: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rdo rje chos de'i ngo bo thams cad sems can gyi don du ye shes kyis gzigs pas na chos so //
T02TD2510.1E:232a-19: rdo rje ral gri zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:232a-20: rdo rje shes rab kyi ye shes 'di la mnga' bas na rdo rje ral gri ni rdo rje rnon po ste /
T02TD2510.1E:232a-22: de bzhin du mchog chen po zhes bya ba ni mchog kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na mchog chen po ste rdo rje ral gri'o //
T02TD2510.1E:232a-23: dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:232a-24: dkyil 'khor yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:232a-26: rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i gang yin pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad 'di la mnga' bas na rdo rje rgyu'o //
T02TD2510.1E:232a-27: rgyal po mchog la zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor thams cad rang bzhin de nyid kyis gsal zhing /
T02TD2510.1E:232a-28: rgyal po ltar byed pas na rgyal po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:232b-0: mchog ni de bzhin gshegs pa las skyes @232b pas na mchog ste /
T02TD2510.1E:232b-1: rgyal po yang yin pas na rgyal po mchog go //
T02TD2510.1E:232b-2: spros med ces bya ba ni nag gi rnam par rtog pa'i spros pa med pa'i phyir rdo rje bsrung ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:232b-3: rdo rje las zhes bya ba ni rdo rje las kyi snying po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:232b-4: bsrung ba che zhes bya ba ni bsrung ba yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na bsrung ba chen po ste /
T02TD2510.1E:232b-5: phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus kyi bsrung ba'i ngo bo ni rdo rje bsrung ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:232b-6: gnod sbyin gtum pa zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin yang yin la gtum pa yang yin pas na rdo rje gnod sbyin no //
T02TD2510.1E:232b-7: gdon chen po zhes bya ba ni chen po nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis thams cad du song ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:232b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs de yis 'dzin pas na gdon no //
T02TD2510.1E:232b-9: gdon yang yin la chen po yang yin pas gdon chen po ste /
T02TD2510.1E:232b-11: rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:232b-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa thams cad de bzhen nyid kyi ngo bor don gcig tu mi phyed par byang pas na rdo rje khu tshur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:232b-13: phyag rgya che zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:232b-17: chen po ni de bzhin nyid thams cad du song ba las skyes pa ni ngo bo gang yin pa 'di la mnga' bas na phyag rgya chen po ste rdo rje khu tshur de mtshan bcu dang phyag rgya kun la zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2510.1E:232b-18: de bzhin nyid kyi rdo rje khu tshur gyi ngo bo yin pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:232b-19: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya thams cad de yis bsdus pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:232b-20: phyag rgya kun zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur nyid do //
T02TD2510.1E:232b-21: de ltar bshad pa'i don gyis sems dpa' bcu drug gi snying po'i rang bzhin gyi sgo nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang ba la bstod nas /
T02TD2510.1E:232b-22: sku'i gsang ba'i don gyi ngo bo'i sgo nas bstod pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:232b-23: byang chub sems dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:232b-24: de la byang chub kyi ngo bo'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa' ste rdo rje sems dpa'o ;
T02TD2510.1E:232b-25: / byang chub che zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid byang chub chen po ste /
T02TD2510.1E:232b-26: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:232b-27: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas spyan 'dren pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pas na rdo rje rgyal po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:233a-2: rdo rje rgyal po de nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'gugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad las lhag pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
T02TD2510.1E:233a-3: rdo rje rigs zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pas g-yo ba med pa'i mi dmigs pa'i thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid kyi ye shes ni rdo rje ye shes te /
T02TD2510.1E:233a-6: chos bdag med pa'i chags pa 'di //
T02TD2510.1E:233a-7: dgyes pa bsrung ba 'di yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:233a-9: yang dag pa'i lam gyi ngo bo yin pa de bas na rdo rje chags pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:233a-10: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i rgyun thams cad du song ba de'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:233a-11: ye shes che zhes bya ba smos so //
T02TD2510.1E:233a-12: theg pa che zhes bya ba ni theg pa yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na theg pa chen po ste /
T02TD2510.1E:233a-13: pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa'i rang bzhin ni rdo rje legs pa'o / don kun zhes bya ba ni don yang yin la kun kyang yin pas na don kun te /
T02TD2510.1E:233a-14: don kun ni nam mkha'i snying po ste /
T02TD2510.1E:233a-15: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:233a-16: kun gyi de bzhin nyid kyi don //
T02TD2510.1E:233a-17: zhes bya ba ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i mun pa sel bar byed pa'i nyi mar gyur pa'i ye shes te don thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la dmigs pa ni kun gyi de kho na nying rdo rje gzi brjid de mtshan bcu'o //
T02TD2510.1E:233a-18: sems can don zhes bya ba ni byams pa'i sbyin pa chen pos sems can gyi khams kyi don byed pas na sems can don te rdo rje dpal lo //
T02TD2510.1E:233a-19: kun rig pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:233a-20: kun rig pas na kun mkhyen te /
T02TD2510.1E:233a-21: 'dzum pa'i dus gsum pa'i don thams cad ston par mdzad pa'i phyir na rdo rje bzhad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:233a-22: kun mkhyen zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:233a-23: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin brnyes pa'i phyir rdo rje chos ni kun mkhyen pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:233a-24: kun mdzad ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:233a-25: shes rab kyi ye shes kyis byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:233a-26: kun mdzad ni rdo rje rnon pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:233a-27: thams cad de zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir thams cad kyi rgyu'o//
T02TD2510.1E:233b-0: @233b kun gzigs zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:233b-3: nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa so sor yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes ston pas /
T02TD2510.1E:233b-4: chos dang de'i don dang nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa so sor gzigs pa ni kun gzigs te rdo rje bsrung ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:233b-5: rdo rje bdag ces bya ba ni 'khor ba yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyi ngo bo'i rdo rje'o //
T02TD2510.1E:233b-6: de nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid gang yin pa 'di ni rdo rje bdag ste /
T02TD2510.1E:233b-8: rab rdo rje mchog ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:233b-9: rab rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de rnams kyi mchog yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:233b-10: rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus kyi rang bzhin mtshungs pa med pa'i phyir na rdo rje las so //
T02TD2510.1E:233b-11: rdo rje brtson 'grus zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:233b-12: yongs su sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus ni rdo rje lta bur mi phyed pas na rdo rje brtson 'grus te rdo rje bsrung ba'o /
T02TD2510.1E:233b-13: rab rdo rje 'chang zhes bya ba ni so sor rtog pa'i brtson 'grus kyi rab rdo rje 'dzin par byed pas na rdo rje 'chang ba ste /
T02TD2510.1E:233b-14: rdo rje gnod sbyin te mtshan bcu'o //
T02TD2510.1E:233b-15: dam tshig chen po de nyid don //
T02TD2510.1E:233b-16: zhes bya ba ni 'khor gsum rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mkhyen pa ni dam tshig chen po ste /
T02TD2510.1E:233b-17: so sor rtog pa'i brtson 'grus kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD2510.1E:233b-18: de'i de kho na nyid ni de las byung ba'i zag pa med pa'i bde ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:233b-20: lha chen po la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis chags pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:233b-22: rmongs pa la sogs sems can gyi don mdzad pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:233b-23: de skad du yang dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nying gang yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:233b-25: kun du bzang po rab dgyes pa //
T02TD2510.1E:233b-27: dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyi don 'di ni /
T02TD2510.1E:233b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje khu tshur te phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:233b-29: bde chen khyod ces bya ba ni de ma thag pa'i rdo rje khu tshur de nyid de ni dam tshig chen po'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir bde chen nyid do //
T02TD2510.1E:233b-30: de ltar rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa sems dpa' bcu drug gi sku'i gsang ba'i don gyi sgo nas rdo rje 'chang ba chen po la bstod nas /
T02TD2510.1E:233b-31: gzhan yang mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i sgo nas bstod pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:233b-32: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-0: de la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i mtshan ma'i ngo bo gang yin pa de @234a * //
T02TD2510.1E:234a-1: nyid ni dam par gyur pa'i yon tan 'byung ba yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:234a-2: rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-4: 'dod pa che zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-5: rdo rje chags pa'i mda' gzhu'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-6: chen po yang yin la chags pa yang yin pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-7: chags pa chen po ni byang chub chen po mngon sum du byed pa'i ngo bo yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-9: phra bar 'bigs pas mda' yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:234a-11: de kho na nyid mngon sum du mdzad ces bya ba'i don te mtshan lnga'o //
T02TD2510.1E:234a-12: rab tu dga' bzhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-13: rdo rje legs pa'i mgu ba'i phyag rgya de ni bzang po la dga' bas na rab tu dga' ste /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-14: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa las byung ba'i zag pa med pa'i mgu ba ni dga' ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:234a-15: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-16: rdo rje rin chen gyi rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i phyag rgya ni rab tu che ba'i 'od 'di la mnga' bas na rab tu 'od chen po ste /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-17: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:234a-18: rdo rje 'od ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-19: rdo rje gzi brjid kyi rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-20: rdo rje lta bu'i mi phyir pa'i 'od 'di la mnga' bas na rdo rje 'od do //
T02TD2510.1E:234a-21: 'od snang ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-22: rdo rje dpal gyi yi bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-23: byams pa sbyin pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od kyi snang ba'i nus pa 'di la mnga' bas na 'di snang ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:234a-24: sangs rgyas 'od ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-25: bzhad pa'i 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-26: sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dzum pas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i 'od 'di la mnga' bas na sangs rgyas 'od de /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-28: rdo rje rgyal mchog ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-29: chos kyi padma'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-30: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rdo rje de nyid ni /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-31: dag pas na rgyal po yin pa de nyid kyi phyir rgyal mchog go //
T02TD2510.1E:234a-32: rdo rje mchog ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-33: rdo rje rnon po'i ral gri'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-34: shes rab kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje de nyid kyi mchog ni /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-36: rig pa mchog ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:234a-38: sprul pa'i sems de rig pa'i mchog ni /
T02TD2510.1E:234b-1: dkyil 'khor sprul pa la de dang mtshungs pa med ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:234b-3: rdo rje bsrung ba'i lce'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:234b-4: sgra brnyan dang mtshungs pa'i sgra yin pas brjod pa 'di dang mtshungs pa gzhan med pas na mchog go //
T02TD2510.1E:234b-5: mi'i mchog ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:234b-6: las kyi sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:234b-7: mi'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis mi thams cad kyi gzugs las mchog tu gyur pas na mi'i mchog go //
T02TD2510.1E:234b-8: rdo rje dam pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:234b-9: rdo rje bsrung ba'i go cha'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:234b-10: rdo rje rnams kyi dam pa des /
T02TD2510.1E:234b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsungs thugs kyi rdo rje kun du bsrung ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:234b-12: mchog chen mchog ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:234b-13: chen po yang yin la mchog kyang yin pas na mchog chen po ni /
T02TD2510.1E:234b-14: rdo rje gnod sbyin yin pa de'i phyir yang mchog chen mchog ni rdo rje gnod sbyin te /
T02TD2510.1E:234b-15: rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha'i ngo bo des srung zhing yongs su skyong ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:234b-16: rig mchog ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:234b-17: rig pa'i mchog ni rig pa'i mchog ste /
T02TD2510.1E:234b-18: rdo rje khu tshur yin la /
T02TD2510.1E:234b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi sku dang /
T02TD2510.1E:234b-21: thugs kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi khu tshur 'ching ba'i sbyor ba des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya sgrub bar mdzad pa de'i phyir rig pa mchog go //
T02TD2510.1E:234b-22: 'dis ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:234b-23: rdo rje dbyings zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:234b-24: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:234b-25: gsang ba che zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:234b-26: chen po yang yin la gsang ba yang yin pas gsang ba che ste /
T02TD2510.1E:234b-27: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo de 'di yin pas na gsang ba chen po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:234b-29: rdo rje thal mo las byung ba //
T02TD2510.1E:234b-30: phyag rgya chen po zhes su grags //
T02TD2510.1E:234b-33: rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:234b-34: rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i rdo rje yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:235a-1: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:235a-2: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2510.1E:235a-3: rab ni shin tu gsang ba 'dzin pas na rab gsang 'chang zhes bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:235a-4: rang nyid kyi phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rab tu gsang ba'i ngo bo 'chang ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:235a-5: rdo rje phra ba zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:235a-7: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na //
T02TD2510.1E:235a-8: rdo rje phra mo zhes su grags //
T02TD2510.1E:235a-10: bsam gtan che zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:235a-11: chen po yang yin la bsam gtan yang de yin pas na bsam gtan che ste /
T02TD2510.1E:235a-12: phra mo'i rdo rje'i bsam gtan gyis dngos grub thams cad rab tu sgrub pa la /
T02TD2510.1E:235a-13: kun du khyab pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:235a-16: de nas shin tu mnyam par gzhag / gang yang rung ste bsgom bya ba //
T02TD2510.1E:235a-17: de dag thams cad brtan par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.1E:235a-20: rdo rje dgongs pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:235a-21: rdo rje rnams kyi dgongs pa ni rdo rje'i dgongs pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:235a-22: sems can gyi don tshad med pa bzhi bsgoms pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:235a-23: byams pa chen po la sogs pa tshad med pa bzhi'i ngo bo bsgoms pas 'di nyid khyod yin no zhes ston to //
T02TD2510.1E:235a-24: sangs rgyas mchog ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pa'i sems ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:235a-25: de sangs rgyas kyi mchog tu bsgom pa las mtshungs pa gzhan med pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:235a-26: des na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa'i ye shes gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:235a-27: de skad du yang de yi rang bzhin khyod yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:235a-28: zhes 'di gsungs pas bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:235a-29: sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:235a-30: sangs rgyas rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su dran pa'i ye shes rnam pa bzhi'i ngo bo de dag gi mchog ni sangs rgyas kyi mchog go //
T02TD2510.1E:235a-31: zla ba'i gzugs brnyan bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:235a-32: bdag gi snying gar rdo rje yi //
T02TD2510.1E:235a-33: sems dpa'i rdo rje gzugs brnyan bsgom //
T02TD2510.1E:235a-35: gcig nas gcig tu brtan par byed pa'i bsgom pa'i ngo bo mtshungs pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:235a-36: sangs rgyas byang chub ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ste /
T02TD2510.1E:235b-0: de yi @235b rang bzhin khyod yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:235b-2: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa //
T02TD2510.1E:235b-3: sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag nyid ni //
T02TD2510.1E:235b-4: bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya ba //
T02TD2510.1E:235b-5: sangs rgyas byang chub bsgom pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:235b-6: zhes gsungs pa des bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:235b-7: mkhas pa che zhes bya ba ni lha dang gcig tu gyur pa'i shes pa'i ngo bo des ni /
T02TD2510.1E:235b-8: mkhas pa yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na 'di mkhas pa che ste /
T02TD2510.1E:235b-9: bdag ni de bzhin gshegs dang mnyam //
T02TD2510.1E:235b-10: rdo rje'i tshig tu lan cig brjod //
T02TD2510.1E:235b-11: dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas //
T02TD2510.1E:235b-12: sangs rgyas thams cad chags par byed //
T02TD2510.1E:235b-13: ces bya ba la sogs pa 'dis gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes rnam pa bzhi gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:235b-14: sangs rgya ye shes zhes bya ba ni de ba zhin gshegs pa rnam pa lnga ni sangs rgyas te /
T02TD2510.1E:235b-15: de dag gi chos kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po nges pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di yang ;
T02TD2510.1E:235b-16: rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2510.1E:235b-17: rdo rje dbus su bsgom bya ba //
T02TD2510.1E:235b-18: bdag nyid sangs rgyas rgyas sku nying du //
T02TD2510.1E:235b-19: des ni sangs rgyas nyid du bsgrub //
T02TD2510.1E:235b-20: ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ga yin pa nges bshad pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:235b-22: sangs rgyas che zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na sangs rgyas che ste /
T02TD2510.1E:235b-23: sems dpa' bcu drug gi ting de 'dzin to //
T02TD2510.1E:235b-25: rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la //
T02TD2510.1E:235b-26: snying gar rdo rje la sogs 'khor //
T02TD2510.1E:235b-27: bsgoms na rdo rje sems dpa' sogs //
T02TD2510.1E:235b-28: gang gi dngos grub sbyin par byed //
T02TD2510.1E:235b-29: ces gsungs pa 'dis kyang sems dpa'i bcu drug gi ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo khyod yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:235b-30: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:235b-31: chos kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.1E:235b-32: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa de dag ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas te /
T02TD2510.1E:235b-33: chos kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i dam tshig dang chos dang las kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas so //
T02TD2510.1E:235b-34: sangs rgyas mchod pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:235b-35: mchod pa chen po la sogs pa'i mchod pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:236a-0: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de nyi @236a * //
T02TD2510.1E:236a-2: las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'chang chen po yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:236a-4: las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbang du byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phrin las kyi chos kyi dam tshig go zhes gsungs so//
T02TD2510.1E:236a-5: mchod pa che zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs la rjes su chags pa la sogs pa spros pa'i phrin las kyi mchod pas nam mkha' thams cad khyab pa ni mchod pa chen po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:236a-6: sems dpa'i mchod pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa bcu drug gi mchod pa'i ngo bos rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.1E:236a-7: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa la sems dpa'i mchod pa 'di la mnga' bas na sems dpa'i mchod pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:236a-8: rab mchod pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:236a-9: rnam pa bcu drug gi mchod pa de rnams kyi ji skad du gsungs pa'i sems dpa'i mchod pa rab tu mdzad pa na rab mchod byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:236a-10: thabs chen zhes bya ba ni thabs kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na thabs chen te /
T02TD2510.1E:236a-11: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje 'chang chen po ni /
T02TD2510.1E:236a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig tu gyur pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:236a-13: dngos grub thams cad sdud pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:236a-14: dngos grub chen po zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin gyi dngos grub chen po yin pas rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bur gsungs pa de thams cad ni 'dir dngos grub che'o //
T02TD2510.1E:236a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa thams cad kyi rgyur byin gyis brlabs so zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:236a-17: rdo rje dngos grub ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:236a-18: rdo rje ni 'dir rnam par snang mdzad yin la /
T02TD2510.1E:236a-19: de'i ngo bo'i dngos grub 'di la mnga' bas na rdo rje dngos grub ste /
T02TD2510.1E:236a-20: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:236a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs gcig tu bsdus par gyur pa'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor ni /
T02TD2510.1E:236a-22: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku sgrub pa yin pa de'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:236b-0: de ni de @236b bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po'o zhes gsungs te mtshan brgyad cu'o //
T02TD2510.1E:236b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs dbyangs zhes bya ba ni ljags kyi ngo bo'o //
T02TD2510.1E:236b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs chen po ni zla ba rdo rje'i ngo bo'o //
T02TD2510.1E:236b-3: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i ngo bo gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:236b-4: sangs rgyas gtso bo zhes bya ba ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sku'i gsang ba gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:236b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po byed pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:236b-7: rgyal ba'i bka' nyan zhes bya ba ni de nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog sgrub pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pas rgyal pa'i bka' nyan no //
T02TD2510.1E:236b-8: 'dis ni rin chen h'um mdzad kyi rang bzhin gyis kyang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i rang bzhin gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:236b-9: sangs rgyas bshes gnyen zhes bya ba ni chos kyi h'um mdzad kyi sgo nas te /
T02TD2510.1E:236b-10: chos kyi h'um mdzad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab shes rab ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:236b-11: rgyal mchog skyes zhes bya ba ni las kyi h'um mdzad kyi don gyi sgo nas te /
T02TD2510.1E:236b-12: 'khor gsum rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin ba'i phrin las don yod par grub pa'i rang bzhin mchog de las 'di skyes pas na rgyal mchog skyes so //
T02TD2510.1E:236b-13: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba ni dbus kyi rnam par snang mdzad mgon po sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:236b-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:236b-15: khyab ces bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i khro bo de yang byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyis /
T02TD2510.1E:236b-16: dngos po thams cad nas thams cad du song bar bzhed pa de'i phyir na khyab bdag go //
T02TD2510.1E:236b-17: ston pa zhes bya ba ni 'chad pas na ston pa ste khro bo rdo rje rgyal po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:236b-18: gang gis 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'gugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba yin te mtshan dgu bcu'o //
T02TD2510.1E:236b-19: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje chags pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:237a-0: @237a * // chos bdag med pa'i chags pas yang dag pa'i lam gyi ngo bo gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa zhi bas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems zhi bar byed pas na zhi ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:237a-1: khro ba zhes bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje legs par byed pas ma rungs pa drag po'i sems can gsod pa dang sreg pa dang 'tshed pa la sogs pa mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:237a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid che //
T02TD2510.1E:237a-3: zhes bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje khro gnyer te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes las byung ba khro gnyer gyi khro bo 'bar ba'i lta bas sems can thams cad kyi 'dad chags la sogs pa'i sems drangs nas chos thams cad rtogs pa ni de nyid kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na de nyid che'o //
T02TD2510.1E:237a-4: yang dag mtha' zhes bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje nyi ma ste /
T02TD2510.1E:237a-5: de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' de ston par byed pas na yang dag pa'i mtha' ni khro bo rdo rje nyi ma'i ye shes kyis bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i mun pa sel bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:237a-6: che ba'i tshul zhes bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje rgyal mtshan te byams pa'i sbyin pa'i khro bo des stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i don ster bas na che ba'i tshul lo //
T02TD2510.1E:237a-7: pha rol phyin pa kun mkhyen pa //
T02TD2510.1E:237a-8: zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu drug go //
T02TD2510.1E:237a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems bsdus pa'i ye shes kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje sems ma dang /
T02TD2510.1E:237a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i bsdus pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje rin chen ma dang /
T02TD2510.1E:237a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes bsdus pa rdo rje chos nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje chos ma dang /
T02TD2510.1E:237a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi bdag nyid kyi phrin las bsdus pa mchod pa'i phyin las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje las ma dang /
T02TD2510.1E:237a-21: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad dang /
T02TD2510.1E:237a-22: bdud las rgyal ba'i ye shes bya ba mi thub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:237a-23: lhag pa las ches lhag pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam gyi ngo bo shes rab ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:237b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid du mngon par byang chub pa mngon sum du mdzad @237b pa thob pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:237b-1: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i ye shes zhes bya ba chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:237b-2: de ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa drug go //
T02TD2510.1E:237b-3: pha rol tu phyin pa de rnams su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes ni rdo rje khro bo rdo rje bzhad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:237b-4: don dam pa zhes bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje chos ni don dam pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:237b-5: dam pa yang yin la don yang yin pas don dam pa'i chos bdag med pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:237b-6: kun du bzang zhes bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje rnon po ste /
T02TD2510.1E:237b-7: chos thams cad ma skyes par shes rab kyi ye shes kyis sgom pa'i kun du bzang po 'di la mnga' ba de bas na kun du bzang po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:237b-8: spyod pa mchog ces bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje rgyu ste dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i spyod pa la gzhan dang mtshungs pa med pa'i phyir spyod mchog go //
T02TD2510.1E:237b-9: bdud ces bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje smra ba ste /
T02TD2510.1E:237b-10: ngag gi rnam par rtog pa'i bdud byed pas na bdud ces gsungs so //
T02TD2510.1E:237b-11: bdud ni rab tu 'dul bzhes bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje las te rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus kyi ngo bos le lo'i bdud rab tu 'dul bar byed pa'i phyir bdud rab tu 'dul ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:237b-12: kun gyi mchog ces bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje bsrung ba ste /
T02TD2510.1E:237b-13: yongs su spyong pa'i brtson 'grus kyis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la 'jog par byed pas byed pas gzhan las mchog tu gyur pa de'i phyir kun gyis mchog go //
T02TD2510.1E:237b-14: mnyam nyid mkhyen zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba'i chos rnams so sor rtogs pa'i brtson 'grus kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi dngos po'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'dis gsol bar nges pas na /
