T02TD2510.1E:237b-15: mnyam pa nyid mkhyen pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin te /
T02TD2510.1E:237b-17: kun du 'gro zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:237b-18: thams cad du song bas na thams cad du 'gro ba ni khro bo rdo rje khu tshur te /
T02TD2510.1E:237b-19: so sor rtog pa'i brtson 'grus kyi ngo bos dngos grub thams cad grub pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:237b-20: sangs rgyas h'um mdzad ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:237b-21: rdo rje'i rigs sprul nas thog mar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi h'um takki dza zhes bya ba gang yin pa de gsungs pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:238a-2: ces bya ba la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa gang yin pa des kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi h'um mdzad kyi sgra gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:238a-3: h'um zhes pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:238a-4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad la h'um zhes bya ba gang gsungs pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:238a-5: rdo rje h'um zhes pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:238a-8: grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um /
T02TD2510.1E:238a-10: bha ga b'an badzra h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:238a-11: ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:238a-13: aom buddha mee tri badzra raksha h'um zhes bya bas ma h'a de ba 'dul bar byed pa'i sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:238a-14: rdo rje kun yan lag ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:238a-15: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis gsungs pa'i sngags gang yin pa de rdo rje kun te /
T02TD2510.1E:238a-16: de nyid yan lag la 'god pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:238a-17: rdo rje kun yan lag go //
T02TD2510.1E:238a-18: rdo rje drag ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:238a-19: aom badzra aa bi sha ha na pa tram ta ta zhes bya ba lha chen po tshar gcod pa gang gsungs pa ni rdo rje yang yin la drag po yang yin pas na rdo rje drag po ste /
T02TD2510.1E:238a-21: phyag na rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2510.1E:238a-22: zhes bya ba ni yon tan thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi rdo rje 'di la mnga' bas na rdo rje'o //
T02TD2510.1E:238a-23: dad pa'i khyad par phul du byung bas phyag 'tshal bas na /
T02TD2510.1E:238a-25: yon tan thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir phyag 'tshal ba nyid do //
T02TD2510.1E:238a-26: phyi dang nang gi mchod pa 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cang la mchod pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:238a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba ni rjed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:238a-28: khams gsum pa 'dul bar byed pa'i ye shes la de bzhin gshegs pas rim gro bya ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:238a-29: ji ltar bdag nyid la de bzhin gshegs pas phyag bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:238a-30: rim gro bya ba yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:238a-31: gang phyir rdo rje sems bstan pas //
T02TD2510.1E:238a-32: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod bya //
T02TD2510.1E:238a-34: gang gi phyir de bzhin du ro gcig pa'i sems ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod ces bya ba de'i phyir phyag bya ba dang ci snyed pa'i rim gro bya ba yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:238a-35: de bzhin du ro gcig pa'i sems kyi ngo bo rdo rje sems dpa' gang yin pa de ni /
T02TD2510.1E:238b-0: rdzogs pa'i byang chub @238b ni khyod la rag lus te bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:238b-2: tha dad ba'i rim pa ste khyod la rag lus pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:238b-3: kun gzigs yab ni sangs rgyas rnams skyed par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:238b-4: byang chub kyi sems goms pa'i stobs kyis byung ba dang ni 'byung 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:238b-5: thog ma dang tha ma med par de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis bsgrubs shing bsten pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:238b-6: 'di yis zhes bya ba bshad ma thag pa'i bstod pa bstan pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:238b-7: ni zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba'am tha dad pa'i rim pa nyid du'o //
T02TD2510.1E:238b-8: rab tu mos pas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:238b-9: rab tu mos pa 'ba' zhig gis ma yin gyi klu bdun dang lhan cig pa'i bstod pa byas shing bstod pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:238b-10: glur blang gang zhig stod byed pa //
T02TD2510.1E:238b-11: gang zhig glur blangs pa'i bstod pa byed pa de ni rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:238b-12: de ltar yang dag par 'gyur ba'i yon tan brjod pa'i sgo nas bstod pa byas pas sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du ;
T02TD2510.1E:238b-13: rang gi rigs ni bskyed par mdzod //
T02TD2510.1E:238b-14: ces de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don du gnyer ba yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:238b-15: mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02TD2510.1E:238b-17: bsnyen bkur sngon du 'gro ba'i don du gnyer ba ni de nyid 'dir gnang ba ste ba'i mtshan nyid kyi brdar shes par bya ba yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:238b-18: thams cad skyob pa dang sems can sgrol bas na mgon pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:238b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang rang gi ngo bos bzhugs pa la /
T02TD2510.1E:238b-24: rang gi phrin las la sbyor bas na mnga' mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:238b-25: don ni don te dgos ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:238b-26: don kun ni sems can gyi don te /
T02TD2510.1E:238b-28: sems can gyi don thams cad ni sems can gyi don gyi 'bras bu'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:238b-29: rang gi rigs ni bskyed par mdzod //
T02TD2510.1E:238b-31: de ltar mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bstod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir gsol ba btab nas /
T02TD2510.1E:238b-32: da ni pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brangs nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dbye ba'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02TD2510.1E:238b-33: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.1E:238b-34: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa'i don te /
T02TD2510.1E:239a-1: ba'i rjes thogs nyid la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:239a-2: byang chub kyi sems kyi mchan nyid dang 'brel ba'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya yin pa de'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:239a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo'o //
T02TD2510.1E:239a-4: rdo rje de bdag nyid kyi thugs kar bzhag ste zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bskyed pa'i dus su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis stsal ba gang yin pa de rang gi snying gar 'degs pa'i tshul gyis sbyor ba rab tu bzhag ste /
T02TD2510.1E:239a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa de thams cad bos shing spyan drangs nas 'di skad gsungs so zhes bya ba ni gsol ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:239a-6: gang la bos ba yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:239a-7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la'o //
T02TD2510.1E:239a-8: gang zhe na ma 'tshal to zhes bya ba smos so //
T02TD2510.1E:239a-9: ci'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:239a-10: rgyu mtshan nam rnam pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa mi byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:239a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa pa thams cad kyis dris pa na dris pa'i rgyu yod pa ni mchis te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:239a-12: drag po la sogs pa'i ma rungs pa la sgeg pa'i gzugs kyis don mdzad par mi spyod pa de'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:239a-13: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pas /
T02TD2510.1E:239a-14: sgrub pa mi 'gyur ba'i shugs kyis drag po'i gzugs kyis sgrub par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:239a-15: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:239a-16: de dag la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub bar bgyi zhes bya ba'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2510.1E:239a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:239a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2510.1E:239a-19: dkyil 'khor pa rnams 'dul ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis nus pa rtogs pas ting nge 'dzin gyi nus pa mngon du mdzad na /
T02TD2510.1E:239a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:239a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams chen po ste /
T02TD2510.1E:239a-22: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas /
T02TD2510.1E:239a-23: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhugs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:239b-0: ye shes de ni thabs chen po'i ye shes yin pas na des byin gyis brlabs @239b pa'i rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang la ming de skad ces bya ba gang la snyoms par zhugs te /
T02TD2510.1E:239b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs kar zhugs pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:239b-2: nam mkha'i khams ji snyed pa'i rdul phra rab de snyed pa thams cad du kun nas spros pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:239b-4: rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis kun du khyab pa de nyid spros pa de'i ngo bo ni spros pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:239b-5: de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pas spros pa nyid kyi rgyu sngon du song ba des so //
T02TD2510.1E:239b-6: ri rab kyi rtse mo na rtse mo rdo rje dang /
T02TD2510.1E:239b-7: nor bu rin po che las byas ba'i khang bu brtsegs par yang gcig tu 'dus te /
T02TD2510.1E:239b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs so //
T02TD2510.1E:239b-9: ci zhig mdzad nas she na /
T02TD2510.1E:239b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:239b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi don gyi phyir mnyam pa nyid du thugs rtse gcig pa nyid du mngon du mdzad nas so //
T02TD2510.1E:239b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka'i dpal gyi be'u rab zhugs pa ni de dag dgongs pa gcig par bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:239b-13: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2510.1E:239b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su bdag byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2510.1E:239b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje'i ngo bor bdag nyid sems brtan par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:239b-16: thams cad rdo rje ni khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de dag gi'o //
T02TD2510.1E:239b-17: mnyam pa nyid du mtshungs pa ste //
T02TD2510.1E:239b-18: khro bo zhe sdang las byung ba //
T02TD2510.1E:239b-19: rtag tu rdo rje'i rigs zhes grags //
T02TD2510.1E:239b-20: zhes 'byung bas thams cad kyi rdo rje'i mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:239b-21: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su bskyab pa'i don des kyang phan pa dang bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa de 'grub pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:239b-22: ma rungs pa rnams 'dul ba'i phyir //
T02TD2510.1E:240a-0: zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i lha chen po la sogs pa'i gdug pa de dag thams cad 'dul ba'i @240a * //
T02TD2510.1E:240a-2: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa de dag thams cad rdzogs par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:240a-3: ci zhig mdzad nas ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:240a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:240a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying rje chen po ni ji skad bshad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:240a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i thabs ni rdo rje'i rigs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:240a-8: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin te ;
T02TD2510.1E:240a-9: der nges pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD2510.1E:240a-10: de la dmigs pa ni mngon du mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:240a-11: rdo rje'i rigs su sprul par mdzad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:240a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD2510.1E:240a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ji skad du bshad pa'i snying rje chen po'i thabs de'i khro bo ste rdo rje'i rigs so //
T02TD2510.1E:240a-14: de'i dam tshig ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i khro bo skyed par mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas h'um mdzad do //
T02TD2510.1E:240a-15: skyed par byed pa de la dmigs nas rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang la ming de skad ces bya ba 'di la snyoms par zhugs so //
T02TD2510.1E:240a-16: de'i don 'di skad ston ba yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:240a-17: rdo rje'i rigs sprul pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:240a-18: h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje sems dpa' la bskul bar thug sa rtse gcig tu mdzad do zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:240a-19: rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:240a-20: rdo rje'i rigs skyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:240a-21: phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka'i rdo rje las zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rang gi thugs kar bstod pa'i sbyor bas bsnams pa gang yin pa de las so //
T02TD2510.1E:240a-22: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pad de nyid ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2510.1E:240a-23: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid ces bya ba ni //
T02TD2510.1E:240a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas pa'i sems dpa'i rdo rje'i gzugs kyis so //
T02TD2510.1E:240a-25: gang gi gzugs kyis she na /
T02TD2510.1E:240a-26: kun du 'bar pa'i snying po zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:240a-27: kun nas 'bar ba ni kun du 'bar zhing gsal ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:240a-28: de'i snying po'i nang du bzhugs pa de nyid kyis /
T02TD2510.1E:240b-0: phyogs kun nas rang nyid 'bar ba'i nang du chud ces @240b bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:240b-1: smin ma bcum zhing dpral ba bsnyer ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas mos te /
T02TD2510.1E:240b-2: khro bor mtshon par byed pa'i dpral ba'i mtshan ma ni khro gnyer ro //
T02TD2510.1E:240b-3: smin ma bcum zhing dpral ba bsnyer ba ni gang dag gis dpral bar bcum pa de bzhin du de yang yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:240b-4: zhal 'gyur pa so gtsigs pa mche ba lhag ger byung ba'i mche ba dag gis ma mchu mnan nas lhag ge gang yin pa de ni mche ba lhag ger byung ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:240b-5: smin ma bcum zhing dpral ba bsnyer ba yang yin zhing de mche ba lhag ger byung zhing tshems gtsigs pa yang yin la /
T02TD2510.1E:240b-6: de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:240b-7: de nas gzhan yang de dag gi gzugs ni /
T02TD2510.1E:240b-8: rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:240b-9: rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang ral gri dang zhags pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:240b-10: rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang ral gri dang zhags pa dag go //
T02TD2510.1E:240b-11: sogs pa smos pas ni mnga' dang gzhu la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:240b-12: rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang zhags pa la sogs pa de dag gang yin pa de dag go //
T02TD2510.1E:240b-13: rdo rje'i rnam pa'i me lce 'bar ba de bzhin du 'bar ba'i mtshon cha gang yin pa des de bzhin du byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:240b-14: rdo rje la sogs pa nyid rdo rje me lce 'bar ba'i mtshon cha rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang zhags pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag phyag na bsnams pa ni rdo rje me lce 'bar ba'i mtshon cha lag na thogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:240b-15: gzhan yang de dag gi khyad par ni rnam pa du ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:240b-16: ji lta ba'i rnam grangs kyi kha dog dang rgyan sna tshogs kyi chu lugs can no //
T02TD2510.1E:240b-18: rnam pa du ma'i kha dog dang /
T02TD2510.1E:240b-19: rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs shing rnam pa du ma'i cha lugs 'dzin pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:240b-20: rnam pa du ma'i kha dog dang rgyan sna tshogs kyi cha lugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:240b-21: phyag na rdo rje'i sku ni phyag na rdo rje'i lus so //
T02TD2510.1E:240b-22: byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du shin tu ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul bar byas nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:240b-23: gdul bar dka' ba thams cad 'dul bar byas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
T02TD2510.1E:240b-24: ae ma'o zhes bya ba'i sgra ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:240b-25: thams cad 'dul ba bdag yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:240b-27: thabs ni gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i khro bo'i sku de nyid kyis gdug pa can gyi gdul bya 'dul bar byed pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:240b-28: 'dul ba ste gdug pa nyid yongs su spangs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:241a-1: kyis gdug pa 'dul ba'i thabs gang dag yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:241a-2: thabs chen ldan pa bdag yin te //
T02TD2510.1E:241a-4: thabs kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na 'di'i thabs chen po ste /
T02TD2510.1E:241a-5: thugs rje chen po gang la mnga' bde ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs chen po dang ldan pa'o /
T02TD2510.1E:241a-6: gal te khyod thabs chen po dang ldan pa'i thabs kyis 'dul ba 'di ngo mtshar ba ci zhig yod ce na /
T02TD2510.1E:241a-7: gang phyir sems can 'dul thabs phyir //
T02TD2510.1E:241a-9: gang phyir sems can rnams la khro bo'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:241a-10: dri ma med pa'i khro bor gyur pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:241a-11: bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la ngo mtshar ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:241a-12: gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni rigs sprul par bka' stsal pa de'i rjes su 'jug pa gsungs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:241a-13: da ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi bdag por sprul par dbang bskur zhing /
T02TD2510.1E:241a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du byed la sogs pa bka' stsal pa de'i rjes su 'dug pa bstan par bzhed nas /
T02TD2510.1E:241a-15: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:241a-16: ji skad du bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad du rang nyid mdzad nas /
T02TD2510.1E:241a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos bdag med pa ngo bo spros ba med pa'i chos nyid la dmigs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:241a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo chen po rdo rje zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:241a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang 'di yin la khro bo chen po'i rdo rje yang 'di yin pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:241a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo chen po'i rdo rje'o //
T02TD2510.1E:241a-21: rdo rje h'um mdzad du sgrub par mdzad pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas pa'i sems dpa'i rdo rje'i rnam pa rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:241a-22: de'i dam tshig ni phyag na rdo rje'i gzungs las lhag par byin gyis brlabs shing rdzogs par byed pa rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang la ming de skad ces bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon du mdzad nas /
T02TD2510.1E:241a-23: rdo rje h'um mdzad sprul pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:241b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba ni ji skad du rab tu bshad pa de'i ming gang yin pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skul bar byed pa'i snying po sgra'i bdag nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs @241b pa thams cad kyi rdo rje h'um mdzad ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:241b-1: de nyid dang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang nyid kyi rig pa mchog 'di smras pa ni gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:241b-2: de nas byung nas zhes bya ba ni snying po gsungs pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2510.1E:241b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:241b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i ri rab kyi rtse mo na rdo rje dang /
T02TD2510.1E:241b-6: rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i nang du chud pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la zhugs pa las yang de las zhes bya bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:241b-7: de nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjer gyur te zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba gang yin pa de nyid gzhal du med pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad du byung nas so //
T02TD2510.1E:241b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2510.1E:241b-9: rang rang gi ngo bor mdzad nas de rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad nas spyan drangs te /
T02TD2510.1E:241b-10: rdo rje dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng du khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rnam par snang mdzad la sogs par sprul cing gnas pa rnams la bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug gi bar du rab tu bcug ste dam tshig gis bcings nas khro bo ma yin pa yang sems can gyi don du khro bo chen por bstan nas /
T02TD2510.1E:241b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud byed pa'i phyir khyed kyis rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi lus su gyur nas khro bo rdo rje sems dpa'i lus kyis byang chub sems la rab tu 'jog pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:241b-12: khro bo rdo rje rgyal po'i lus kyis spyan 'dren par byed pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:241b-13: khro bo rdo rje chags pa'i lus kyis rjes su chags par byed pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:241b-14: khro bo rdo rje legs pa'i lus kyis legs par byed cing mnyes par byed pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:241b-15: de bzhin du khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i lus kyis mnyes par byed pa'i bar du byas pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:241b-16: de ltar dam tshig gis bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:242a-0: da bzhin du thams cad byas @242a * //
T02TD2510.1E:242a-1: nas yang gcig tu 'dres pa ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sku dpag tu med pa thams cad kyi tshogs gcig tu gyur pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:242a-2: dbyer mi phyed pa'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid khro bo chen po'i lus rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar zhugs nas 'dug ste /
T02TD2510.1E:242a-3: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2510.1E:242a-4: kun du bzang zhing sdig med de //
T02TD2510.1E:242a-5: zhes bya ba ni khro po la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis sems can gyi don mdzod pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:242a-6: kun du nyon mongs pas ma gos pas bzang zhing ngo //
T02TD2510.1E:242a-7: 'di nyis la rab tu gcod pa med pas na sdig med pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:242a-8: ngo mtshar ba ci zhig yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:242a-9: gang zhig sems can 'dul don du //
T02TD2510.1E:242a-11: gang gi phyir ma rungs shing gdug pa'i sems can 'dul bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:242a-13: mi mdzes pa'i khro bo'i gzugs kyis so //
T02TD2510.1E:242a-16: yid du 'ong ba dang 'dod par gyur pas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:242a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:242a-18: mi bskyod pa'i gnas na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la mngon du phyogs pas gnas pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:242a-19: yang smos pa ni sngar rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur bas bka' nod cing bzhugs pa yin la /
T02TD2510.1E:242a-20: da ltar ni gdug cing ma rungs pa'i sems can 'dul ba'i don du'o //
T02TD2510.1E:242a-21: de'i don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:242a-22: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD2510.1E:242a-23: sngags kyi rdo rje rigs kyi bdag po rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi skur mdzad nas /
T02TD2510.1E:242a-24: de nyid kyis de la rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyir gsang ba'i dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:242a-25: des na de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i zhi ba'i nyams 'phos nas khro bo'i nyams ba skyed pas spro bsdu byas te /
T02TD2510.1E:242a-26: de nas rang gi ngo bor byas nas spyan drangs te /
T02TD2510.1E:242b-0: rnam par snang mdzad nas bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug gi bar du gnas pa rnams la rnam par snang mdzad @242b la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.1E:242b-1: bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa'i gzugs kyis khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po la /
T02TD2510.1E:242b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa rab tu bcug ste /
T02TD2510.1E:242b-3: aom badzra dzv'a la aagne pra ti pa ta la a'a karsha ya sarbba ta th'a ga ta ta na /
T02TD2510.1E:242b-4: ma h'a badzra sa ma ya h'um dza: zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2510.1E:242b-5: aom badzra a'a be sha ya sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba'i bar gyi sngags dang /
T02TD2510.1E:242b-6: skal ba bzang po rnams ni rang gi rig pas gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:242b-7: de nas sa ma ya stvam zhes ji skad du bshad pa'i phyag rgya bcings la ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gyis dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sku gcig tu gyur nas ;
T02TD2510.1E:242b-8: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sku rdzogs par mdzad de /
T02TD2510.1E:242b-9: rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la phyogs bcu na gnas pa rnams bzhugs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byung nas /
T02TD2510.1E:242b-10: rang rang gi gnas la gnas te /
T02TD2510.1E:242b-11: 'jig rten gsum bkug nas bka' bsgo ba mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:242b-12: da ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02TD2510.1E:242b-13: bka' bsgo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par mdzad pa de ni /
T02TD2510.1E:242b-14: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:242b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig khams gsum pa la bka' stsal nas /
T02TD2510.1E:242b-16: khro bo takkis 'gugs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:242b-17: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khams gsum pa bkug nas /
T02TD2510.1E:242b-18: bka' bsgo ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs te /
T02TD2510.1E:242b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dam tshig gis 'gugs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad de /
T02TD2510.1E:242b-20: khro bo takki bskyed par bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:242b-21: de'i phrin las rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:242b-22: thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:242b-23: snyoms par zhugs nas ci zhig mdzad ce na /
T02TD2510.1E:242b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:242b-25: 'di nyid ces bya ba'i thugs la gnas pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:242b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2510.1E:242b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu ni khro bo takki'o //
T02TD2510.1E:242b-28: de zhes bya ba ni yang gi sgra gsal bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:243a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu zhes bya ba de bzhin @243a * //
T02TD2510.1E:243a-1: gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dang /
T02TD2510.1E:243a-2: rang gi thugs kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje ye shes las khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal po nges par skyed par mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:243a-3: phyung ba ni 'byin par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:243a-4: de nas phyung ma thag tu 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po'i tshogs kyis /
T02TD2510.1E:243a-5: bskor zhing gnas pa rdo rje lcags kyus bkug nas 'khod par gyur to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2510.1E:243a-6: 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang po ji snyed pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:243a-9: sa steng gi 'jig rten gsum yin pas 'jig rten gsum mo //
T02TD2510.1E:243a-10: 'jig rten gsum po nyid 'jig rten gsum ste /
T02TD2510.1E:243a-11: 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.1E:243a-12: chu lha'i mthar thug pa de thams cad 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi cha byad can gyi tshogs kyis bskor bas zhes bya ba ni grong dang /
T02TD2510.1E:243a-15: pho brang na gnas pa'i 'jig rten pa'i skye bo de dag thams cad kyi cha byad 'dzin pa ni 'jig rten pa thams cad do //
T02TD2510.1E:243a-16: tshogs ni de dag gi bdag po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:243a-17: 'khor rnams 'jig rten pa'i cha byad kyi tshogs so //
T02TD2510.1E:243a-18: bskor ba ni gnas dang bcas pa yongs su bskor zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:243a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:243a-20: bshad ma thag pa bka' bsgo ba de nyid kyi gzugs ni zhal bzhi pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:243a-21: phyag brgyad pa sangs rgyas kyi phreng bas brgyan pa /
T02TD2510.1E:243a-22: khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal po rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs can /
T02TD2510.1E:243a-23: rang gi thugs kar bsnams pa'i rdo rje gsor ba gang yin pa de rang gi snying gar 'degs pa'i tshul gyis bsnams pa de snying gar yang yang 'phen zhing 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:243a-24: khams gsum pa ji snyed pa thams cad ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:243a-25: phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i 'jig rten pa'i 'khor lo ri rab ri'i rtse mo gang na ba der bkug pa der gzigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:243a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' yang nyon cig ces bya ba de nyid gsungs pa bka' nyon cig ces bya ba ni nan tan du bya ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:243a-27: kun mkhyen ye shes thob pa'i phyir ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa'i don du'o //
T02TD2510.1E:243a-28: byed pa po zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:243a-29: 'jigs pa po zhes bya ba ni 'jigs par byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:243b-0: @243b 'byung po thams cad kyi dbang po zhes bya ba ni 'byung bas na 'byung po ste /
T02TD2510.1E:243b-1: de dag thams cad kyi dbang phyug ni mnga' bdag go //
T02TD2510.1E:243b-2: lha rnams shin tu gnon par byed pa'i lha ni lha'o //
T02TD2510.1E:243b-3: de nyid lha chen po yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:243b-4: gnod sbyin khyod kyi ngag de nga ci'i phyir nyan zhes bya ba ni khro bo lha chen po yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:243b-5: khyod pas rdzu 'phrul chen khyod kyi ngag khro bos ci'i phyir nyan te /
T02TD2510.1E:243b-6: mi nyan no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:243b-7: chen po yang yin la gtum zhing khro ba yang yin pas na khro zhing gtum pa chen po ste /
T02TD2510.1E:243b-8: de'i dngos po ni khro zhing gtum pa chen po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:243b-9: de nyid 'jigs pa chen po'i gzugs dang ldan pas rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs su gyur pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:243b-11: 'bar ba yin la chen po yin pas na 'bar ba chen po ste nam mkha' khyab pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:243b-12: de gyen du gtong bas na gtong zhing ngo //
T02TD2510.1E:243b-13: dgod pas na dgong pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:243b-14: chen po yang yin la ma rungs pa rtag tu dgong pa yang yin pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:243b-15: ma rungs pa chen pos rtag tu dgong pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:243b-16: kye lus srul po'o zhes bya ba ni mi'i sha za ba la sogs pa'i ro langs so //
T02TD2510.1E:243b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ni thugs rje chen po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:243b-18: de las byung bas na skyed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:243b-19: rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig ni rdo rje yang yin la chen po yang de yin pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:243b-20: rdo rje chen po de'i dam tshig ste /
T02TD2510.1E:243b-21: rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:243b-23: khro bo gnod mdzes kyi lus so //
T02TD2510.1E:243b-24: lha chen po la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo thams cad kha dog tu bstan nas /
T02TD2510.1E:243b-25: zhabs kyis gnon pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sku de ni rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig ces bshad do //
T02TD2510.1E:243b-26: mkhyen bzhin du zhes bya ba ni nyid kyi gsung gi sa mi 'jigs pa stsol bar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:243b-27: ma bsad cig ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:243b-29: gsod par ma byed cig ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:243b-32: dge 'dun dang phyag rgya'i tshogs dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:243b-33: gzhal du med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02TD2510.1E:243b-34: de'i chos dang dge 'dun zhes bya ba'i den to //
T02TD2510.1E:243b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni byang chub chen po'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:243b-36: longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku'i ngo bos bdag po yin pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:244a-1: de'i bdag por gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:244a-2: 'di nyid rgyu yin pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab bo //
T02TD2510.1E:244a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bkas rang gi rigs thams cad bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:244a-4: gdug pa thams cad 'dul bar byed pas na bka' bzhin byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:244a-5: rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa rnams la sngar bskyed pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:244a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thu bo'o //
T02TD2510.1E:244a-7: sems can thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:244a-8: gdug cing gtum pa'i sems can thams cad 'dul bas na 'dul byed do //
T02TD2510.1E:244a-9: lam ngan pa las bzlog nas lam bzang po la rab tu 'jog pa'i 'bras bu de nyid kyi rgyu de las bzlog pa'i dngos po ni sems can thams cad gdul bar bya ba'i don gyi phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:244a-10: de nas khro bo'i rgyal por dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:244a-11: sdig pa can gyi sems can rnams sbyang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang zhes sdang dang gti mug med par snga nas mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis sdig pa rnams yongs su spangs shing zad pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:244a-12: de ltar khyab 'jug la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa rnams gdul ba'i phyir 'khor la bka' stsal pa de'i rjes su 'jug pa gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:244a-13: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:244a-14: dbang phyug chen po de gso bar bka' stsal pa de'i rjes su 'jug pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:244a-15: yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir zhabs 'og tu dgug pa gsungs pa ni rkang pas dgug pa'i khro bo'i phyag na lcags kyu yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:244a-16: da ni de nas phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:244a-17: dbang phyug chen po yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2510.1E:244a-18: tshar gcod par bka' stsal pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:244a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po la thugs rje chen po bskyed de zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T02TD2510.1E:244a-21: dbang phyug chen po la dbab pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:244a-22: sdug bsngal kun zhi ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:244a-23: bla na med pa'i bde ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:244a-24: yid bde ba myong bar byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:244a-25: bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:244a-26: bla na med pa grub pa'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:244a-27: de la bla na med pa'i dngos grub ni sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:244a-28: de'i don du dbang bskur ba ni bla na med pa grub pa'i dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:244a-29: ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid dang /
T02TD2510.1E:244b-0: mtshan ma med pa dang @244b smon pa med pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:244b-1: rnam par thar pa ni brgyad do //
T02TD2510.1E:244b-2: gzungs ni tshig dang don rtog pa dang sngags so //
T02TD2510.1E:244b-3: ye shes ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i'o //
T02TD2510.1E:244b-4: mngon par shes pa drug go //
T02TD2510.1E:244b-5: bla na med pa'i grub pa'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:244b-10: rnam par shes pa ni bla na med pa bsgrub pa'i dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par thar pa'i gzungs kyi ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa de thob nas /
T02TD2510.1E:244b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'grub pa'i bar du gyur to //
T02TD2510.1E:244b-12: de nas zhes bya ba ni dbang phyug chen po la phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyis reg par gyur pa'i de ma thag pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:244b-13: lha chen po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhags kyi mthil gyis reg pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'brel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD2510.1E:244b-15: rnam par thar pa'i bde ba myong ste /
T02TD2510.1E:244b-16: ting nge 'dzin ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:244b-17: gzungs ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:244b-18: rnam par thar pa'i sgo ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:244b-19: myong ste zhes bya ba ni mngon sum brjod do //
T02TD2510.1E:244b-20: bcing ba byas zhes bya ba ni brjod te mi zad pa dang 'jig pas na yi ge'o //
T02TD2510.1E:244b-21: de'i tshig gis de la nas byang chub sems dpar gyur pa des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
T02TD2510.1E:244b-22: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:244b-23: ni zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir gyi don to //
T02TD2510.1E:244b-24: ngo mtshar ba gang yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:244b-25: sangs rgyas ye shes ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes so //
T02TD2510.1E:244b-27: bla na med pas na bla na mad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:244b-28: de'i ngo mtshar ba gang yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:244b-30: yi ge'i tshig gis mnan nas su //
T02TD2510.1E:244b-31: zhes bya ba smos te mi zad pa dang 'jig pas na yi ge'o //
T02TD2510.1E:244b-32: de'i tshig gis de la mnan pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i go 'phang gis mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas su gzhag pa de ni 'dir ngo mtshar bar gyur pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:244b-33: de ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:244b-34: don dam par na bdag ni 'dir gzugs kyi sku'i ngo bor phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyis mnan du yongs pa ma yin gyi /
T02TD2510.1E:245a-0: 'on kyang byang chub sems kyi mchan nyid kyi yi ge'i tshig de rtogs pas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par @245a * //
T02TD2510.1E:245a-1: rtog pa thams cad bcom nas gdul bar bya ba spangs su zin kyang gzugs kyi sku'i rang bzhin gyi zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan pa 'di ni ngo mtshar ba'o snyam du sems so //
T02TD2510.1E:245a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02TD2510.1E:245a-3: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo thams cad dkyil 'khor du bcug nas dbang bskur zhing bka' stsal pa la sbyor ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:245a-4: byang chub sems ni rim bzhin du //
T02TD2510.1E:245a-7: snying po byang chub la mthang thug gi bar du byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste /
T02TD2510.1E:245a-8: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02TD2510.1E:245a-9: rdzogs pa'i byang chub nge mdzad pa //
T02TD2510.1E:245a-10: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
T02TD2510.1E:245a-11: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi /
T02TD2510.1E:245a-12: zhes bya bas byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:245a-13: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin pa dang tshul khrims la sogs pa /
T02TD2510.1E:245a-14: ji ltar nus par byang chub chen po thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa /
T02TD2510.1E:245a-17: sems rtse gcig pas de ltar byang chub kyi sems yang dag par bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02TD2510.1E:245a-18: de nas gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa de rnams bzhugs pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:245a-19: dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya thams cad kyi thun mong par khro bo ste /
T02TD2510.1E:245a-20: ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgyal dam tshig chen po zhes brjod do //
T02TD2510.1E:245a-21: bcing ba byas zhes bya ba ni brjod cing bcing ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:245a-22: dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya'i snying po 'chang par 'gyur ba 'di brjod cing bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:245a-23: lag tu bab ces bya ba ni lag pa gnyis la bab pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:245a-24: dbab pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.1E:245a-25: des 'chad par 'gyur pa'i slob ma gzhug pa'i cho gas thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu bcug pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:245a-26: de ltar tshul bzhin du btsud nas dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad kyi go rims bzhin du bstan te /
T02TD2510.1E:245a-27: rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams nas rnam par snang mdzad la mthar thug gi bar du bstan to //
T02TD2510.1E:245a-28: rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:245a-29: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas cod pan gyi dbang bskur nas /
T02TD2510.1E:245a-30: sems can gyi don ji snyed pa la bkod do //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-0: phyag bzhi sngon du 'gro ba 'jug pa'i cho gas dbab pa byas la me tog @245b dor nas /
T02TD2510.1E:245b-1: phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba byin la gdong g-yogs bkrol te /
T02TD2510.1E:245b-2: rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams nas dkyil 'khor bstan zhing dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:245b-4: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas rin po che'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba de dag thams cad kyang de rnams la rdo rjes mtshan pa'i mdung rtse gsum pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:245b-5: rdo rje rtse gsum pa la /
T02TD2510.1E:245b-6: aom badzra aa bhi shanytsi sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dh'a t'vi badzra p'a ni hi ha ha ha ha zhes pa'i sngags 'dis sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-7: de nas de rnams la ming gi dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-8: de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po thams cad kyi ming rnams yin no zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:245b-9: gsal bar bshad par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-13: dbang po ni ji ltar grags pa kho na'o //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-14: sgra gzhon nu ni gdong drug go //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-15: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ni nyi ma'o //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-16: dbyig pa chen po ni sben pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-17: ser smug ni mig dmar ro //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-18: sogs pa smos pa ni gza' lag la sogs pa gza' dang /
T02TD2510.1E:245b-19: nye ba'i gza' rnams shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-20: sbrang rtsis myos pa ni stobs bzangs so //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-21: sbrang rtsir byed pa ni dpyid do //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-23: rgyal bar byed pa ni ral gri 'chang ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-24: tshogs kyi bdag po ni pa ba sangs so //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-25: sogs pa'i sgra ni me tog gi so la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-26: mdzod skyong ni nor sbyin no //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-27: gzhan dag ni sa'i lha ste /
T02TD2510.1E:245b-28: tsu li ka zhes bya ba'i tshogs kyi bdag po zhes zer ro //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-29: de ni rgyal po'i btsun mo la sogs pa lha mo rnams kyi ming la au ma ni khro bo rdo rje me zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:245b-30: de la au ma ni lha chen po'i chung ma'o //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-31: rug ma ni khyab 'jug gi chung ma'o //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-32: gdong drug ma ni gdong drug gi'o //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-34: dbang mo ni brgya byin gyi'o //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-37: dbyug pa 'dzin ma ni spen pa'i'o //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-38: skye ba 'phrogs ma ni mig dmar gyi'o //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-39: gsod ma ni stobs bzangs kyi'o //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-40: za ba ma ni dpyid kyi'o //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-42: dga' ba ma ni 'dod pa'i lha'o //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-43: zhi ba ma ni nor sbyin gyi'o //
T02TD2510.1E:245b-46: ku be ra ma ni ku be ra'i'o //
T02TD2510.1E:246a-0: @246a * // sna chen ma ni log 'dren gyi'o //
T02TD2510.1E:246a-1: ba ru na ma ni chu lha'i'o //
T02TD2510.1E:246a-2: de nas zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i de ma thag pa nyid do /
T02TD2510.1E:246a-3: phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba bslabs te zhes bya ba ni lha rang gi phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes so //
T02TD2510.1E:246a-4: rdo rje dam tshig ma'i snying po 'di sbyin no zhes bya ba ni las mi phyed cing mi 'da' ba'i mna'i snying po 'di byin no //
T02TD2510.1E:246a-5: rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che //
T02TD2510.1E:246a-6: zhes bya ba ni de ma thag tu bstan pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:246a-7: rang gi lag na gnas pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyis kyi rdo rje ni /
T02TD2510.1E:246a-8: sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD2510.1E:246a-10: khro bo'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i gzugs su grub pa'o ;
T02TD2510.1E:246a-11: / des ci zhig byed ce na /
T02TD2510.1E:246a-14: sngags pa'i bka' las 'das na myur ba nyid du khyed kyi rigs rnams thal bar byed ces bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:246a-15: aom ha na sa ma ya h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:246a-16: ces bya ba ni sngags dang lhan cig tu sngags pas rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:246a-17: aom ha na sa ma ya h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:246a-18: ces bya ba ni sngags cig tu sngags pas rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:246a-19: sngags pa dam pa'i bka' las 'das na khyed cag gi rigs rnams rdo rje 'dis mdzad par byed pa de'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:246a-20: khyed cag gis de'i bka' bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:246a-21: lha la sogs pa dang ma mo'i tshogs kyi thun mong gi mna'i snying po gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:246a-22: de nas thun mong gi mna'i snying po lha rnams kyis byin pa ;
T02TD2510.1E:246a-23: snying po gzung bar bya ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di byin no //
T02TD2510.1E:246a-24: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te //
T02TD2510.1E:246a-25: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:246a-26: mdzub mo'i lcags kyu bcings nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:246a-28: mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyu lcags sgrog tu bcings nas g-yas pa dang g-yon pas 'dren par byed pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:246a-29: lha rnams 'dren pa'i phrin las la sbyor ba 'dis lha chen po nas brgya byin gyi bar du rig pa'i rgyal po rnams rang gi las la nges par sbyar par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:246a-30: des pa des kyang lha rnams bkug nas bka' bzhin byed pa'i phyag rgya'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur te /
T02TD2510.1E:246a-31: lha rnams 'gugs pa dang lha rnams kyi sems dbang du byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:246a-32: rdo rje bcings pa dam byas te //
T02TD2510.1E:246a-33: mdzub mo bkug nas rab tu mnan //
T02TD2510.1E:246a-34: mthe bong gnyis ka mtshams sbyar bas /
T02TD2510.1E:246a-35: dbus su gnyis ka rab tu mnan //
T02TD2510.1E:246b-0: rdo rje bcing ba bcings @246b la mdzub mo gnyis ka bsgrengs te bkug nas gzhag pa mthe bo gnyis ka dbus su gnas pa rab tu mnan pa gang yin pa de ni bkug pa'i rtse mo mnan pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:246b-1: rdo rje bcing ba de bcings nas dbus su gnyis ka rab tu mnan pa de nyid kyi mdzub mo gnyis ka'o //
T02TD2510.1E:246b-2: ji ltar de mnan par bya zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:246b-3: mtshams sbyar ba zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:246b-4: de nyid dbus su sbyar ba zhes bya ba'i ming gis mdzub mo gnyis nye bar byas pa dang sbyar bar byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:246b-5: mthe bong gnyid po des de bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:246b-6: phyag rgya das nyi ma la sogs pa'i khro bo rang gi las la nges par sbyor ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:246b-7: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis ka yi //
T02TD2510.1E:246b-8: mthe'u chung so sor bcings nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:246b-9: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas kha steng du bstan te /
T02TD2510.1E:246b-10: mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lcags sgrog tu sprel ba bcings nas bzlog ste bteg nas mgo bor gzhag pa 'dis stobs bzangs la sogs pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i las la sbyor ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:246b-11: rdo rje bsrung ba dam bcings la //
T02TD2510.1E:246b-13: rdo rje bsdams pa'i rdo rje las kyi mthe'u chung dang mthe bong gi rtse mo sbyar la /
T02TD2510.1E:246b-14: de nyid kyi mdzub mo sbyar ba brkyang nas /
T02TD2510.1E:246b-15: snying gar gzhag pa de ni rdo rje bsrung ba dam du bcings pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:246b-16: rdo rje bsdams pa des mnan pas //
T02TD2510.1E:246b-17: zhes bya ba ni de nyid rdo rje bsrung ba'i phyag rgya'i gzugs kyi rdo rje bcing bar 'dod pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:246b-18: de nyid snying ga'i phyogs su mnan pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:246b-19: nor sbyin la sogs pa'i pho nya de dag las la nges par sbyor ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:246b-20: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:246b-22: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te //
T02TD2510.1E:246b-23: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo las //
T02TD2510.1E:246b-24: zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo'o //
T02TD2510.1E:246b-25: mthe'u chung gis sor mo de bsdams nas /
T02TD2510.1E:246b-26: sor mo gcu zhing slar gcus te drag tu bkrol nas snying ga'i phyogs las g-yas phyogs su gcu ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:246b-27: g-yas phyogs nas g-yon phyogs su gcu bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:246b-29: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mo brkyang ba la g-yas pa'i mthe'u chung des bsdams pa gcu zhing slar gcus nas /
T02TD2510.1E:247a-0: drag tu bkrol ba zhes bya ba 'di ni sa la gnas pa'i bran rnams kyi las @247a * //
T02TD2510.1E:247a-1: la nges par sbyor ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:247a-2: rdo rje bcings pa sprel ba ni //
T02TD2510.1E:247a-3: mdzub mo gnyis ni dam par bya //
T02TD2510.1E:247a-4: zhes bya ba ni lag pa gnyis ka kha thur du bstan nas /
T02TD2510.1E:247a-5: mdzub mo lu gu rgyud du sprel nas /
T02TD2510.1E:247a-6: gung mo dang mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar la bskor nas mthe bo gnyis dpral ba'i phyogs su sbyar nas 'dzin pa 'di ni lha mo au ma la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.1E:247a-7: rdo rje chu lha'i chung ma'i bar du ma mo'i tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa /
T02TD2510.1E:247a-8: rdo rje he ru ka'i phyag rgya 'dis de'i las la nges par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:247a-9: de ltar 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo thams cad dkyil 'khor du bcug pa dang ;
T02TD2510.1E:247a-11: bka' bsgo ba la nges par sbyar ba bstan nas /
T02TD2510.1E:247a-12: da ni 'byung po'i gdon thams cad dgug par dka' stsal nas /
T02TD2510.1E:247a-15: de dag de bzhin du bsad pa la sogs pa bsrung ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:247a-16: rdo rje lcags kyu gnyis bcings te //
T02TD2510.1E:247a-17: snying gar yongs su bskor bar bya //
T02TD2510.1E:247a-18: mdzub gnyis lcags kyu phyi rol gyi //
T02TD2510.1E:247a-19: dkyil 'khor dgug pa'i mchog yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:247a-20: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:247a-21: de'i mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyur byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:247a-22: snying ga'i phyogs su yongs su bskor la /
T02TD2510.1E:247a-23: lcags kyu'i rtse mo gnyis rang gi snying gar bzhag ste ;
T02TD2510.1E:247a-24: ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'gugs par bsams pas khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu'i rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba snying ga nas phyung la phyogs bcu nas gdon gyi dkyil 'khor dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:247a-25: rdo rje khro mdzub legs par ni //
T02TD2510.1E:247a-26: sen mo sprad de dkris nas kyang //
T02TD2510.1E:247a-27: rtse mo gnyis ni dam sbyar ba //
T02TD2510.1E:247a-29: zhes bya ba ni khu tshur gnyis rgyab legs par sbyar la /
T02TD2510.1E:247a-31: sen mo gnyis sprad nas dkris te /
T02TD2510.1E:247a-32: rtse mo gnyis dam por sbyar ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:247a-33: bcom ldan 'das khro bo stobs po che las ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad phye mar mdzad par dgos pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:247a-34: rdo rje chen po ma rungs pa'i //
T02TD2510.1E:247a-35: khro bo chen po 'di gsungs so //
T02TD2510.1E:247a-36: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das khro bo stobs po che /
T02TD2510.1E:247a-37: phyag stong mnga' ba dbu stong mnga' ba ni rdo rje ma rungs pa'i khro bo chen po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:247a-38: de ltar 'byung po thams cad 'gugs pa bstan nas /
T02TD2510.1E:247b-0: da ni mkha' @247b 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gdon dgug par bka' stsal nas /
T02TD2510.1E:247b-1: de dgug pa dang rang gi bka' la nges par sbyar ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:247b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.1E:247b-3: ma rungs pa thams cad dgug pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2510.1E:247b-4: khro bo chen po rdo rje lcags kyus gdug pa dgug pa'i snying po ni /
T02TD2510.1E:247b-5: ma rungs pa dgug pa'i snying po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:247b-6: sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i mtshan ma shes pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i snying po zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba'i phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ni 'chi ba'i ltas so //
T02TD2510.1E:247b-7: de shes pa de'i phyag rgya ston te de'i snying po gsungs pa yin te ;
T02TD2510.1E:247b-8: zla ba phyed na 'chi ba gang yin pa de yongs su shes pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:247b-9: snying gar rdo rje lag ngar gnyis //
T02TD2510.1E:247b-10: shin tu dam por bcings nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:247b-11: rdo rje mdzub mo'i rtse mo yis //
T02TD2510.1E:247b-12: rang gi mchan khung brud par bya //
T02TD2510.1E:247b-13: zhes bya ba ni rang gi snying ga'i phyogs su lag dar gnyis rdo rje bcings nas shing tu dam por bsdams pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo'i lcags kyu gnyis kyis mtshan khung brud pa'i 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi snying 'byin pa'i 'chi ba shes pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:247b-14: dga' ba'i sgra bton mchongs rgyal te //
T02TD2510.1E:247b-15: zhes bya ba ni rab tu dga' ba'i sgra dang bcas pas gar byed pa ni rab tu dga' ba'i sgra bton nas mchongs rgal ba ste gar byed cing mchongs rgal zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:247b-17: mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams 'gugs pa la sogs pa gsungs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:247b-18: da ni rims la sogs pa'i nad thams cad dgug par bka' stsal nas /
T02TD2510.1E:247b-20: gzhom pa ni de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:247b-21: rims la sogs pa'i nad thams cad dgug pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba ni rims la sogs pa thams cad 'gugs pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:247b-22: bcom ldan 'das spyi ba'i gtsug tor gzhon nu ma spyan gsum ma rtse gsum pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:247b-23: lcags kyu phyag na bsnams pa de'i snying po gsungs pa ni brjod pa'o /
T02TD2510.1E:247b-24: snying po gsungs pa'i rjes thogs la /
T02TD2510.1E:247b-25: bcom ldan 'das spyi gtsug nas phyung nas /
T02TD2510.1E:247b-26: rims la sogs pa'i nad thams cad kyi gnas su song ste /
T02TD2510.1E:248a-1: des bkug nas ri rab ri'i rtse mo rdo rje nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i phyi rol du de yis bskor zhing 'khod do //
T02TD2510.1E:248a-2: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rang gi las rnam par dag par gyur pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di gsungs pa ni rims la sogs pa'i nad kyis zin pa'i sems can rnams kyi bdag nyid kyi las ni rang gi las te /
T02TD2510.1E:248a-3: gang gis de dag rims la sogs pas gzir bar gyur pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:248a-4: de rnam par dag par gyur pa ni yongs su zad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:248a-5: de shes pa ni las rnam par dag par gyur pa'i ye shes de nges pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:248a-6: de rims la sogs pa'i nad kyis gzungs ba rnams la /
T02TD2510.1E:248a-7: spyi bo nas brtsams nas rkang mthil gyi bar du spyi gtsug gi phyag rgya bsgoms pas /
T02TD2510.1E:248a-8: rims dang bral bar 'gyur ro zhes dgongs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:248a-9: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de'i snying po gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:248a-10: rdo rje thal mo dam sbyar te /
T02TD2510.1E:248a-11: mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug nas kyang ;
T02TD2510.1E:248a-12: / mthe bo mnyam ste sbyar nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:248a-14: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo dam du sbyar te /
T02TD2510.1E:248a-15: mdzub mo gnyis bkug nas mthe bong nyis gdong sbyar ba byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:248a-16: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD2510.1E:248a-18: bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la khro bo spyi gtsug gis gang bar bsams shing sngags dang phyag rgya 'dis bya bas pas myongs bar nges pa'i las kyi nad rnams sel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:248a-19: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD2510.1E:248a-20: aom badzra karma bi sho dha ya /
T02TD2510.1E:248a-21: sarba a'a pa ra na shuddha /
T02TD2510.1E:248a-22: saddhe nas ma ya h'um / zhes bya ba'i sngags 'bum bzlas pa'am /
T02TD2510.1E:248a-23: stong phrag bcu bzlas pas 'grub bo //
T02TD2510.1E:248a-24: de ltar rims la sogs pa'i nad thams cad dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:248a-25: bka' bsgo ba la sogs pa gsungs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:248a-26: da ni ngan song gsum dgug pa'i phyir bka' bsgo ba dang de dgug cing rnam par sbyang ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:248a-27: de nas phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:248a-30: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i slad du zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:248a-31: de la sgrib pa thams cad ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:248a-32: chod pa ni 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:248b-1: las kyi sgrib pa ni mtshams med pa lnga dang /
T02TD2510.1E:248b-2: dam pa'i chos spong ba la sogs pa myong bar nges pa'i las rnams te /
T02TD2510.1E:248b-5: las kyi sgrib pa de dag thams cad rnam par sbyong ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:248b-6: yongs su zad pa'i slad du'o //
T02TD2510.1E:248b-7: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bas bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pas bsgrubs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:248b-8: rdo rje bcings ba dam byas nas //
T02TD2510.1E:248b-9: gung mo gnyis ka sbyar nas su //
T02TD2510.1E:248b-10: tha ma bzhi yi rtse mo sbyar //
T02TD2510.1E:248b-11: sdig pa 'joms par grags pa yin //
T02TD2510.1E:248b-13: rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar nas phan tshun yang dang 'dral ba ni sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:248b-14: sdig pa thams cad 'joms pa'i phyag rgya 'di bcings pas ngan song gi 'khor lo thams cad bcom pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:248b-15: ngan song gi sems can de yang tshe 'phos nas /
T02TD2510.1E:248b-16: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs drung du /
T02TD2510.1E:248b-17: byang chub sems dpar gyur nas /
T02TD2510.1E:248b-18: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra mo thams cad dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas yongs su gang zhing /
T02TD2510.1E:248b-19: rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin lag mthil ltar mnyam pas ri rab la sogs pa'i snang ba dang bral zhing stong gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur te /
T02TD2510.1E:248b-20: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.1E:248b-21: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi lha'i 'od zer gyi snang bas nyi ma dang zla ba yang mi mngon par gyur nas /
T02TD2510.1E:248b-22: 'gro ba lnga'i snang ba yang nub nas /
T02TD2510.1E:248b-23: rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyi sgras nam mkha'i khams gang bar gyur to zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa'i rgyud rnams las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:248b-24: gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:248b-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu bar byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:248b-26: rdo rje se gol gyi mtshan mdzad nas /
T02TD2510.1E:248b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsdu ba byin gyis brlab pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so//
T02TD2510.1E:249a-1: de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad se gol gyi mtshan mas bskul ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:249a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam sprin gyi rgya mtsho ji snyed thams cad nas /
T02TD2510.1E:249a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i rigs chen po'i gzugs dang bcas te /
T02TD2510.1E:249a-4: 'dus nas khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu rin po che las byas pa gang na ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:249a-5: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams par snang mdzad gang na ba der gshegs pa nas /
T02TD2510.1E:249a-6: ched du aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'a da bandha nam ka ro m'i zhes brjod do //
T02TD2510.1E:249a-7: rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgar bzlas shing /
T02TD2510.1E:249a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas /
T02TD2510.1E:249a-9: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
T02TD2510.1E:249a-10: ae ma'o byang chub sems dpa' yi //
T02TD2510.1E:249a-11: kun du bzang po'i spyod pa mchog / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi //
T02TD2510.1E:249a-12: dbus nas de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes /
T02TD2510.1E:249a-13: de nas de skad ces gsungs pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:249a-14: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te /
T02TD2510.1E:249a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par sang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so //
T02TD2510.1E:249a-16: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te phyung nas /
T02TD2510.1E:249a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i phyogs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur nas snyoms par zhugs te /
T02TD2510.1E:249a-18: zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
T02TD2510.1E:249a-19: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2510.1E:249a-20: rgya chen gdod nas skye ba med ;
T02TD2510.1E:249a-21: / rdul phran thams cad ji snyed kyi /
T02TD2510.1E:249a-22: sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu gyur //
T02TD2510.1E:249a-24: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje h'um mdzad la dbang bskur bar mdzad nas /
T02TD2510.1E:249a-25: des thams cad dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:249b-0: dbang du byas la phyag rgya bzhis @249b rgyas btab ste /
T02TD2510.1E:249b-1: dbang bskur zhing phrin las la nges par sbyar bar bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:249b-2: las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:249b-3: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dngos grub ni /
T02TD2510.1E:249b-4: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por dam tshig dang dbang bskur bas bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:249b-5: de nas phyag na rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.1E:249b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bstan pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba de'i slad du ma k'a mandalam pra be sha ya zhes bya ba ni ;
T02TD2510.1E:249b-7: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:249b-8: dushta ro dhan ni ba r'a ya pra be bha zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2510.1E:249b-9: gdug pa ni zhe sdang la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:249b-10: bsam pa ma dag pa ni ma rungs pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:249b-12: de ltar gyur pa de dag dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs nas sdig pa'i dbang du gyur pa rnams dang bral ba yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:249b-14: dur drishtha parya pan na ma zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:249b-15: gang log par lta ba can gang yin pa de ni lta ba ngan par zhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:249b-16: des kyang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa dang //
T02TD2510.1E:249b-17: dbab pa'i ye shes bskyed pas yang dag pa'i lta ba la sbyor ba ni so sor grol ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:249b-18: bi sho dha ya bi n'a sha ya zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:249b-19: skal ba dang mi ldan pa gang yin pa de rnam par sbyang zhing rnam par 'jig pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:249b-20: gang dag shi ba nyid rnam par sbyong ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:249b-21: ha ha ha he he zhes bya ba ni thog ma med pa nas skye ba'i rgyu dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to ;
T02TD2510.1E:249b-22: / h'um zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bde ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:249b-23: yid bde ba la zhugs pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:249b-24: bde ba dang yid bde ba'i ngo bo rnal 'byor pa la yang gyur pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:249b-25: bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2510.1E:249b-26: mi rnams ji ltar bgyi ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsol cig ces bya ba'i bar du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad las dngos su bka' nod pa'i tshig yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:249b-27: de nas aom badzra p'a ni ma h'a mandalam /
T02TD2510.1E:249b-28: pra be sha ya zhes bya ba nas ha ha ha ha h'um zhes bya ba'i bar ni /
T02TD2510.1E:250a-2: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag par ste /
T02TD2510.1E:250a-3: bka' mnos pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2510.1E:250a-4: phyag na rdo rjes yongs su bskyab pa dang 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2510.1E:250a-5: rdo rje chen po dam tshig las byung ba //
T02TD2510.1E:250a-7: rdo rje yang de yin la chen po yang de yin pas na rdo rje chen po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:250a-8: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa de nyid dam tshig gi rgyu yin pas de las byung ba ni skyes pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:250a-9: de gang zhig yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:250a-10: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:250a-11: de nas rab tu bsad bya ba //
T02TD2510.1E:250a-12: zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa med na /
T02TD2510.1E:250a-13: gdug cing ma rungs pa lta ba ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can skal ba med pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub tu mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu de'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:250a-14: dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste rab tu bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:250a-15: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba'i zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:250a-16: sprul pa'i khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2510.1E:250a-17: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pas na ;
T02TD2510.1E:250a-18: dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog go //
T02TD2510.1E:250a-20: 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:250a-22: sa stengs dang sa bla'i mtshan nyid can las rgyal ba 'di la mnga' bas na /
T02TD2510.1E:250a-23: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:250a-24: dam tshig ni mnga' bar bya ba ma yin pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:250a-25: gdug cing ma rungs pa rnams 'dul ba'i dngos grub sgrub pa nyid kyi rdo rje'o //
T02TD2510.1E:250a-26: 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni rdo rje las skyes pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:250a-27: de nyid kyi phyir 'di rdo rje'i rigs su brjod do //
T02TD2510.1E:250a-28: sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub ni //
T02TD2510.1E:250a-30: de 'byin par byed pa ni 'jug pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:250a-31: gdug pa ma rungs pa thams cad ji skad bshad pa de dag gis rnam par 'jig par byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:250a-32: 'di skad du ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:250a-33: thog mar bdag dang gnas bsrung ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:250a-34: de nas khrus bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:250a-35: yang bdag dang gnas bsrung ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-0: mchod pa @250b rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-3: de la phyag btsal ba sngon du songs bas sdom pa gzung ba'i bar du bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-4: thal mo sbyar la de nas rdo rje thal mo dang /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-5: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-6: de nas bsdams pa dral bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-7: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid la dbab pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-8: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbab pa bsdu ba nye bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-9: rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-10: sdig pa 'dral ba'i phyag rgyas sdig pa dral ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-11: yang dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-12: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la de'i sngags dang /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-13: aom badzra mu: zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod la rang gi snying gar rnam par snad mdzad la sogs pa gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:250b-14: de ltar phyag rgya gzhug pa byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-16: rang gi snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba'i dbus su yi ge h'um yid kyis bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:250b-17: de nyid yid kyis brjod pas chos thams cad bdag med par bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-18: yang yi ge h'um de nyid dang /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-19: dbyangs yig bcu drug las gyur pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-20: de nas de'i steng du yi ge h'um dang /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-21: yi ge ka la sogs pa skar ma'i rnam pa lta bu las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa bsams nas yi ge h'um de nyid rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba stong gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad dang mnyam par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:250b-22: de nas rdo rje'i dbus su yi ge h'um bsams la /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-23: de nyid yid kyis brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:250b-24: ya tha badzra h'um k'ar sta tha badzra ya tha badzra tashta aa ham zhes bya ba bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-25: rdo rje de las rdo rje'i rigs sprul nas /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-26: des sems can thams cad btul ba byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-27: de thams cad rdor je la zhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:250b-28: de nas badzra satva aa ham zhes yid kyis brjod cing /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-29: rdo rje de rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-30: bsnyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor zhing slar yang badzra satva aa ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:250b-31: rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du bskyed cing bsgoms nas /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-32: h'um badzra h'um ka ra aa ham zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:250b-33: de nas ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva ham zhes bya ba spyi'i sngags brjod cing /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-0: byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan gyi bdag nyid @251a * //
T02TD2510.1E:251a-1: rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-2: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-3: sa ma ya ham zhes bya bas /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-4: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sku dang /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-6: thugs kyi gsang ba'i rang bzhin bdag yin no zhes bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:251a-7: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-8: sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes bya bas snying ga dang /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-11: spyi gtsug tu byin gyis brlab par byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:251a-13: de nas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas rang gi snying gar zhugs te /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-14: stong gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad dang mnyam pa'i khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po khro bo rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas sprul la /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-15: phyag bzhi sngon du 'gro ba la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-16: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi bar du bdag nyid 'jug pa'i cho gas zhugs la /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-17: rang gi lus kyi nang na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor der zhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:251a-18: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-19: rang gi lus la lha thams cad kyi gnas su sa ma ya aa zhes bya bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:251a-20: de nas yang nam mkha'i phyogs su lha thams cad kyi gnas su sa ma ya aa zhes bya bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-21: de nas rang gi gnas su yid kyis rnag gi skus gnas te /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-22: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings nas /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-23: gzhi'i lus la phyi rol du ji skad bshad pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-24: aom sum bha ni sum bha h'um /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-26: grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-28: bha ga b'an badzra h'um pat aa zhes bya bas rdo rje 'bar ba bsam mo //
T02TD2510.1E:251a-29: de nas badzra h'um ka ro& ham zhes bya bas rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-30: de ltar khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings pa'i bar du byas te /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-31: rang gi sku rang gi gnas su gnas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-32: gzhi'i lus las phyi rol du gyur pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-33: aom badzra a'a be sha ma h'akro dha /
T02TD2510.1E:251a-34: a'a be sha ya sarba sa ma ya h'um aa:aa: zhes bya bas rdo rje dril bu sprul la badzra ghanda hozhes bya bas dril bu'i brgyal bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:251b-0: rdo rje dril @251b phu de nyid badzra a'a be sha kro dha ham zhes bya bas khro bo rdo rje 'bebs par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:251b-1: de nas khro bo rdo rje lcags khus las kyi phyag rgya thams cad dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-2: rdo rje zhags pas rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa mdun na gnas pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i sku la gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-3: de nyid rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcings nas /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-4: khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas dbang du byas ba yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:251b-5: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-6: aom sum bha ni sum bha h'um /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-8: gri hn'a pa ya gri hn'a pa ya h'um a'a na ya ho //
T02TD2510.1E:251b-9: bha ga b'an badzra h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-10: dri shya zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das la lta ba byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-11: de nyid gzhi'i lus kyi nang du chud pa'ai rang gi lus la dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod pas /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-16: sa ma ya stvam ho zhes bya bas gsas zhing rab tu 'bar bas bskor ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed nas /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-17: sa ma ya stvam aa ham dang /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-18: rang gi sngags lan gsum brjod cing bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-19: bdag nyid lhan cig tha mi dad par bsgom par byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-20: khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-21: gzhi'i lus la yid kyis rang gi gnas su gnas te /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-22: aom badzra a'a be sha ya sarba sa ma ya h'um ;
T02TD2510.1E:251b-23: a'a be sha dri shya zhes bya bas /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-24: mdun na gnas pa'i rdo rje 'bebs pa la bltas te /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-25: de bzhin du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:251b-26: de nas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-27: sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-28: aom badzra a'a be sha ma h'a kro dha a'a be sha ya sarbba sa ma ya h'um aa: zhes lan gsum gyi bar du brjod cing ;
T02TD2510.1E:251b-29: rdo rje 'bebs pa dang bdag nyid lhan cig tha mi dad par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:251b-30: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i chos dang /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-32: phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab nas /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-33: yid kyi legs pa'i sbyor ba yis /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-34: dza: h'um bam ho: sa gzhugs par bya /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-35: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i rten dang brten pa'i sku la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad bcug nas /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-36: de nas de la dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-37: badzra dh'a tu dri shya dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
T02TD2510.1E:251b-38: badzra dh'a tu zhes bya ba lan gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:252a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi @252a * //
T02TD2510.1E:252a-2: de nas de la chos dang /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-4: phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab pa rnams ni /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-5: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bstan zin to //
T02TD2510.1E:252a-6: de ltar rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas ;
T02TD2510.1E:252a-8: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-12: spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:252a-13: de nas snying gar sems ma rdo rje ma'i rdo rje 'bar ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-14: mdzod spur rdo rje rin chen ma'i rdo rje rin po che dang /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-15: lkog mar rdo rje chos ma'i rdo rje padma dang /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-16: spyi gtsug rdo rje las ma'i sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:252a-17: de nas sems dpa' rdo rje gtsug tor gyi gtsug tor bskyed la /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-18: de'i steng du gzi brjid phung po bskyed nas /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-20: rdo rje phreng bas kyang dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:252a-21: de la de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bstan pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-22: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-23: aa bhi shanytsim'am zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-24: rdo rje ti r'i nti ri'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-26: phyogs bzhir rdo rje'i phreng bas dbang bskur /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-27: dpral ba'i steng du bcings pa gnyis su byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-28: go cha'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-29: mnyam pa'i thal mos ji lta ba bzhin mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:252a-30: de la rdo rje ti r'i nti ri 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-31: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bong gnyis bsnyams te bsgrengs nas khu tshur spyi bor gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:252a-32: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la ;
T02TD2510.1E:252a-33: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-34: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02TD2510.1E:252a-35: sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgrub phyir //
T02TD2510.1E:252a-36: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
T02TD2510.1E:252a-37: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-39: badzra karma ka rodbha ba zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis dril bu dang bcas pa'i 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:252a-40: de nas rdo rje spyi bor bzhag nas /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-41: ming gi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-42: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyang blangs la /
T02TD2510.1E:252a-43: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad dang /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-0: las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rig ma bcu drug gi mchod pas bdag nyid mchod @252b de ;
T02TD2510.1E:252b-2: de nyid kyis rdo rje gzung ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-3: chos kyi dril bu dkrol ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-4: dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-5: h'um bzhi brjod cing phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-6: lha thams cad kyi sku dang /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-8: thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid yin no zhes bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:252b-9: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes la na gsum brjod pa dang des sgyu ma lta bur bsams la /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-10: aom sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham zhes lan gsum brjod pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-11: sems can thams cad bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid du mtshungs par bsams la /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-12: aom sarba sa mo& ham zhes la na gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:252b-13: de ltar rnal 'byor chen po rdzogs par gyur pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:252b-14: de la gnas kyi nges pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-15: sgrub pa po'i snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du rdo rje h'um mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-16: khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' gnas so //
T02TD2510.1E:252b-17: g-yas phyogs su khro bo rdo rje rgyal po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:252b-18: g-yon du rdo rje chags pa /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-19: rgyab tu rdo rje legs pa /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-20: dpral bar rdo rje rin chen h'um mdzad dang khro bo rdo rje khro gnyer /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-21: mgo bo'i rgyab tu nyi ma /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-22: phrag pa gnyis su dpa' so'i phreng ba gnyis la bzhad pa /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-23: lkog mar chos kyi h'um mdzad dang khro bo rdo rje chos /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-24: nu ma'i bar du rnon po /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-27: spyi gtsug tu las kyi h'um mdzad dang khro bo rdo rje las /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-28: nam tshang gnyis su srung ba /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-30: rked par rdo rje khu tshur /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-31: khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-34: las rnams kyi g-yo phyogs su rim pa ji lta ba bzhin sgeg mo la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams so //
T02TD2510.1E:252b-35: yang rnal 'byor ba'i mdoms bar du bdug pa ma /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-37: mig gnyis su mar me ma /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-38: snying ga dang nu ma gnyis kyi bar dang /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-42: rje ngar g-yas par lcags sgrog / rje ngar g-yon par khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i gnas yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:252b-43: de bzhin gshegs pa ni yan lag thams cad la bzhugs te /
T02TD2510.1E:252b-44: phyag rgya dgrol ba'i dus su rnam par snang mdzad ni spyi gtsug tu dgrol lo //
T02TD2510.1E:252b-45: mi bskyod pa ni h'um mdzad kyi gnas su'o //
T02TD2510.1E:252b-46: rin chen 'byung ldan ni rin chen h'um mdzad kyi gnas su'o //
T02TD2510.1E:252b-47: 'od dpag tu med pa ni chos kyi h'um mdzad kyi gnas su'o //
T02TD2510.1E:253a-0: don yod par grub pa ni las kyi h'um mdzad kyi gnas @253a * //
T02TD2510.1E:253a-2: de ltar rnal 'byor chen po rdzogs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:253a-3: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:253a-4: yid kyis nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas la /
T02TD2510.1E:253a-5: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la yi ge h'um las 'bar ba'i rdo rje /
T02TD2510.1E:253a-6: rdo rje'i lte ba la yi ge ba bsam bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:253a-7: de nas rdo rje de las rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'khrugs pa /
T02TD2510.1E:253a-8: bskal pa'i me chen po lta bus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad thal bar byas par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:253a-9: de nas nam mkha'i phyogs su stong gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad dang mnyam pa'i yi ge lam rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin kha dog dkar po bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'dzin pas bsregs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams bkrus nas /
T02TD2510.1E:253a-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa de dag thams cad 'o ma can gyi rgya mtsho dang mtshungs par dba' rlabs 'khrugs pa'i phreng ba can gyi bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho chen po gnas par bsam mo //
T02TD2510.1E:253a-11: de nas rgya mtsho chen po de la yi ke ram bkod nas ;
T02TD2510.1E:253a-12: de nas yi ge ram gyi mes rgya mtsho chen po de bskol ba'i lhag mar gyur pa'i yi ge bam las padma chen po padma chung du dpag tu med pas bskor bar gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:253a-13: yang padma de'i rtsa bar yi ge pra gser gyi mdog can bsams la /
T02TD2510.1E:253a-14: gser gyi rul sbal tshad gzhal du med pa padma thams cad kyi gzhir gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:253a-15: yang padma'i lte bar yi ge pra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin bsams la /
T02TD2510.1E:253a-16: nam mkha'i phyogs kyi yi ge kham dkar po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin can 'ongs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:253a-17: padma'i lte ba la gnas par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:253a-20: yi ge kham gcig tu gyur pa las /
T02TD2510.1E:253a-21: ri'i rgyal po ri rab bskyed par bsam bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:253a-22: aom dri dho me bha ba /
T02TD2510.1E:253a-23: raksha sarbam s'va h'a zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:253a-24: rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang ba sa la reg pas rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:253a-25: ri rab kyi steng du rdo rje rgyu'i phyag rgya ji lta bas rtse mo rdo rje dang /
T02TD2510.1E:253a-26: nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa sprul la /
T02TD2510.1E:253a-27: der aa sim aa las rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su seng ge'i gdan /
T02TD2510.1E:253a-28: h'um goo h'um las mi bskyod pa'i gnas su glang po che'i gdan /
T02TD2510.1E:253a-29: tr'am bam tr'am las rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rta'i gdan /
