T02TD2510.1E:253a-30: hr'a: mim hr'i: las 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su rma bya'i gdan /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-0: aa: gam aa: las @253b don yong grub pa'i gnas su nam mkha' lding gi gdan bsam par bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-1: seng ge'i gdan la sogs pa de rnams la yi ge pr'i: las padma de rnams kyi steng du yi ge aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:253b-2: de nas bdag nyid nam mkha'i phyogs nas seng ge'i gdan gyi steng du yid kyis babs te /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-3: ting nge 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:253b-4: de nas bsdu ba sngon du 'gro ba'i tshog thams cad spyad la /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-5: nyin re bzhin thun bzha' sbyor bas zla ba drug gam /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-6: lo gcig gi bar du khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bsgom par bya ba'am /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-7: rnal 'byor chen po tsam byas la //
T02TD2510.1E:253b-8: 'chang par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas rang gi snying gar 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ji srid mngon sum du gyur pa de srid du bsgom par bya ba'am /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-9: bsgom par mi nus pa des ni nyin re zhing rnal 'byor chen po lan cig byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-10: de srid du dkyil 'khor ba thams cad kyi sngags bzlas pa byed pa de srid kyi tshe /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-11: re re zhing bzlas pa'i grangs 'bum rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:253b-12: de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ting nge 'dzin gsum nas brtsams nas /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-13: gzhag bdun gyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:253b-14: de ltar sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-15: de nas ji skad gsungs pa'i sa sbyang ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-17: khang ba brtsegs mar chud pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-18: dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi ji skad bshad pa bzhin byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-19: khrus byas shing gdong dri zhim pos byugs la /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-20: me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-21: shin tu sngo ba'i gos kyis stod g-yogs dang /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-24: dpal rdo rje'i rigs su bshad pa'i chod phan dang /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis bdag nyid brgyan par byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-29: sngar bshad pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-30: rnal 'byor chen po nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-31: sngar bshad pa'i cho gas ri rab kyi bar du bskyed la /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-32: rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po de re rab kyi rtse mor ba skyod de /
T02TD2510.1E:253b-33: deng ge'i gdan la sogs pa gdan thams cad bskyed nas /
T02TD2510.1E:254a-0: @254a * // dkyil 'khor sa'i dbus su sems dpa'i skyi la mo krung gis 'dug ste /
T02TD2510.1E:254a-1: deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02TD2510.1E:254a-2: ces bya ba la sogs pas spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:254a-3: de nas yan lag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal te /
T02TD2510.1E:254a-4: sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2510.1E:254a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:254a-6: de nas ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bsgoms la rdo rje'i bdag nyid dang /
T02TD2510.1E:254a-7: rang bzhin gyis dag pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:254a-8: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsgom mo //
T02TD2510.1E:254a-9: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings nas /
T02TD2510.1E:254a-10: rdo rje dang dril bu bzung nas /
T02TD2510.1E:254a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa las /
T02TD2510.1E:254a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dkyil 'khor chen po bri ba'i gnang ba nod pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:254a-13: aom badzra p'a ni ma h'a manta la pra be sha ya zhes bya ba nas ha ha ha ha h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis gnang ba byin par bsams te /
T02TD2510.1E:254a-14: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya h'um bzhi pas dkyil 'khor de bteg la nam mkhar bkod nas /
T02TD2510.1E:254a-15: de nyid kyis bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2510.1E:254a-16: phyag rgya de nyid snying gar bzhag nas /
T02TD2510.1E:254a-17: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i khro bo'i lta bas dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams nas bltas pas bgegs med pa'i rjes la /
T02TD2510.1E:254a-18: rang gi rkang pa'i mthil du yi ge aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed de /
T02TD2510.1E:254a-19: rlung gi dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.1E:254a-20: rkang pa'i mthil gyi bar du yongs su bzung bas /
T02TD2510.1E:254a-21: ji srid ri rab kyi rtse mo nas /
T02TD2510.1E:254a-22: stong gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad tsam rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur par mos shing bskor ba byas pas rim gyis rkang pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje sna tshogs rdo rjer byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:254a-23: h'um bzhi pa gdon par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:254a-24: khro bo'i lta bas phyogs dang /
T02TD2510.1E:254a-29: yang h'um zhes brjod cing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo dang shing tu phra mo'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas phyung nas /
T02TD2510.1E:254a-30: 'jig rten gyi khams su rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'khrugs pa'i sgra sgrogs pa /
T02TD2510.1E:254b-0: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs @254b pa'i khro bos h'um zhes bya ba'i sga 'jigs pas /
T02TD2510.1E:254b-1: lkog ma'i phyogs kun gang ba /
T02TD2510.1E:254b-2: padma'i sdong bu ltar g-yo zhing 'gul ba'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD2510.1E:254b-3: rdo rje babs pa'i tshul gyis nam mkha' las babs te /
T02TD2510.1E:254b-4: gar byas la me tog gi thal mos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod la /
T02TD2510.1E:254b-5: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su g-yon brkyang bas 'dug ste /
T02TD2510.1E:254b-6: bskal ba'i me'i phung po ltar 'jigs pa'i khro bo spros pas /
T02TD2510.1E:254b-7: bdud thams cad skrag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:254b-8: de nas rnal 'byor pas dga' ba yongs su bsgyur ba'i 'gros kyis shar phyogs su songs la g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas der 'dug nas /
T02TD2510.1E:254b-9: bgegs thams cad bskrad par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:254b-10: de nas gnas der gnas nas gnod sbyin gyi 'gros kyis lho phyogs su song la /
T02TD2510.1E:254b-11: de bzhin du bgegs rnams yongs su bskrad par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:254b-12: de nas gnas der gnas nas g-yas brkyang ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:254b-13: g-yon brkyang ba dag gis nub phyogs su songs la /
T02TD2510.1E:254b-15: de bzhin du bgegs rnams bskrad par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:254b-16: de nas gnas de nas nam mkha'i ma lus par khyab par gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams g-yo bar byed pa'i rdo rje'i 'gros kyis byang phyogs su 'gro bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:254b-17: de nas g-yas brkyang ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:254b-22: rnam pa lngas shar phyogs su songs la bgegs thams cad bskrad par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:254b-23: de ltar bgegs thams cad stang stabs rnam pa bzhis bcom par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:254b-24: cing lta ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa tha dad pa yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:254b-25: de ltar 'khrul 'khor la sogs pas kyang bgegs bcom par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:254b-26: stang stabs byed pa'i dus su rgyun mi 'chad par h'um zhes bya ba khro bo'i tshig gdon par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:254b-27: de nas khro bo ti r'i nti ri'i phyag rgya bcings ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.1E:254b-28: bzhin bzangs langs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag gis shig / dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:254b-29: ji skad gsungs pa'i bsrung ba'i cho ga dang /
T02TD2510.1E:254b-30: lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:255a-0: de nas nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su dkyil @255a * //
T02TD2510.1E:255a-1: 'khor gyi gnas thams cad rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags bzlas pa'i spos chus byugs la /
T02TD2510.1E:255a-2: me tog la sogs pas kyang nye bar mdzes par byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:255a-7: dkar po dru zhim pos bsgos pas srad bu so sor kha bsgyur la go rims 'di nyid kyis bzhag nas /
T02TD2510.1E:255a-8: h'um tr'am hr'i: aa: aa zhes bya ba rang gi sa bon 'di las byung ba'i thig gi 'od zer gyis mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rang gi phyogs na bzhugs pas yang dag par btang ba dang 'bar ba'i lcags kyus drangs te /
T02TD2510.1E:255a-9: rang gi lag na gnas pa'i srad bu legs par dgang bar bya zhing /
T02TD2510.1E:255a-10: aa n+yo n+y'a nu ga ta /
T02TD2510.1E:255a-12: pa ras pa r'a nu pra bishta sarba dharm'a /
T02TD2510.1E:255a-13: aa tyant'a nu pra bshti sarba dharm'a h'um zhes zlos shing bsgril bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:255a-14: de nas srad bu de dri zhim pos bsgos te /
T02TD2510.1E:255a-15: gser gyi snod la sogs par bzhag la /
T02TD2510.1E:255a-17: rdo rje bsdams pas bzung la thig gi sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:255a-18: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa bdag po snga po rnams kyi sngags kyang bzla'o //
T02TD2510.1E:255a-19: de nas nam mkha'i phyogs na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor pa thams cad la mchong pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la phyag bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:255a-20: de la sngags 'dis srad bu bre bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i cho ga 'di yin no zhes bya bar de la zhes bya ba'i sgras ston pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:255a-21: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:255a-22: ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su sbyang nas mchod pa thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor yang dag par mchod la phyag byas te /
T02TD2510.1E:255a-23: rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la ;
T02TD2510.1E:255a-24: phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka'i rdo rje las grogs po h'um zhes bya ba 'dis khro bo rdo rje las kyi gzugs su dbyung bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:255a-25: yang de nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du gyur pa las /
T02TD2510.1E:255a-26: mig g-yas g-yon gnyis su yi ge dza: las zla ba dang nyi ma ser por snang ba bskyed la /
T02TD2510.1E:255a-27: dza: zhes pa lan gsum brjod pas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gi lag tu g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis srad bu de btang la /
T02TD2510.1E:255a-28: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tra m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i srad bu bre bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:255a-29: gru bzhir bya zhing zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas /
T02TD2510.1E:255b-0: dkyil 'khor phyi rol srad @255b bu bre //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-1: zhes bya ba'i bar du sngar bshad zin to //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-2: shes rab can gyis de nang du //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-3: zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor de'i nang du yang dkyil 'khor gnyis pa /
T02TD2510.1E:255b-5: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las byung ba bzhin du rdo rje rin po ches brgyan pa /
T02TD2510.1E:255b-7: ka ba brgyad dang rtab bas bzhis brgyan pa /
T02TD2510.1E:255b-12: don yod par grub pa'i gnas rnams su rdo rje'i ri mo zlum po bris la /
T02TD2510.1E:255b-13: de la yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga lnga dang ldan par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-15: rdo rje ka ba'i gnas mchog tu //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-16: dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa ste //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-18: de ltar zhes bya ba ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la lha thams cad kyi gzugs kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-20: sgo rnams skyong bar bzhag nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-21: sgo rnams dbye bar bya ba yin //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-23: de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-24: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas khro bo ti r'i nti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:255b-25: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba blangs la /
T02TD2510.1E:255b-26: aom badzra be ga aa kra ma h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2510.1E:255b-28: dkyil 'khor gyi lhag pa dang ma tshang ba nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yang bltas la /
T02TD2510.1E:255b-29: rdo rje dang dril bu dkrol zhing lan bdun bskor ba byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:255b-30: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste /
T02TD2510.1E:255b-31: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi dbye bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-33: dkyil 'khor mchog ni bris nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-34: khro bo ti r'i nti ri bcings //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-35: yang dag lta ba byas nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-36: lan bdun bar du bskor bar bya //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-37: rdo rje dril bu rab dkrol bas //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-38: mkhas pas mtshang yongs su bskang /
T02TD2510.1E:255b-39: lhag pa gang yin 'dor mdzad pa //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-41: yid kyis rdo rje ri mo ni //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-42: bteg nas kyang ni dbye bar bya //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-43: 'khor lo yi ni dbus zhugs nas //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-44: rdo rje slob dpon mnyam bzhag nas //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-45: rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi po //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-46: yid kyis su ni dbye bar bya //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-47: de nas sgo rnams thams cad du //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-48: lcags kyu la sogs las rnams bya //
T02TD2510.1E:255b-50: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi steng du lha'i gzugs bris nas /
T02TD2510.1E:256a-0: sgo dbye ba la sogs pa bshad @256a * //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-2: da ni lha dgod pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:256a-3: gser ram dngul las byas pa'am //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-4: sa yang rung ste legs bris la //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-5: pha gu gru bzhi byas pa la //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-6: sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzhag par bya //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-8: mngon spyod kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor yin pa de bas na /
T02TD2510.1E:256a-9: rnam par snang mdzad lugs ma'am /
T02TD2510.1E:256a-10: brkos pa'i gzugs sra ba'i gdan la gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:256a-11: dgod par bya ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-12: spyan drang ba'i snying po'i zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i phyogs na bzhugs ba bkug ste /
T02TD2510.1E:256a-13: gzugs brnyan dang gcig tu byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:256a-14: spyan drang ba'i snying pos spyan drang ngo //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-15: sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdo rje ni //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-16: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi shar phyogs kyi cha la /
T02TD2510.1E:256a-17: sems ma rdo rje ma'i gnas su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 'bar ba'i dbus su h'um satva badzra dzva la manta la h'um phat ces bya ba brjod cing /
T02TD2510.1E:256a-18: nam mkha'i phyogs nas bkug par gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-19: de bzhin du thams cad kyang sngags kyis dgug cing gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-20: rdo rje dam tshig phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-22: rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi rigs bsdus par gyur pa'i rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-23: yid kyis rim mo bteg nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-25: tshon rtsi'i ri mo bteg ste 'og nas 'dzul bar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-26: rdo rje srad bu'am gzhan yang rung //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-28: tshon rtsi lnga'i skud pa'i ri mo bteg nas /
T02TD2510.1E:256a-29: 'og nas 'dzul bar yang bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-30: de'i dbus su sems dpa' che //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-31: zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i gnas su'o //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-32: rdo rje h'um zhes bya bar 'dus ;
T02TD2510.1E:256a-34: phyag gnyis khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcing ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-35: mche ba cung zad mngon pa ni mche ba cung zad phyung ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-36: de dag gi mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal gang la mnga' ba de ni mche ba cung zad rtsigs pa'i zhal mnga' ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-37: khro dang bcas pas 'dzum pa'i zhal //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-38: zhes bya ba ni khro ba dang bcas pa ni zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i zhal gang la mnga' ba de ni khro ba dang bcas pas 'dzum pa'i zhal lo //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-39: g-yon brkyang tshul du gnas pa ni //
T02TD2510.1E:256a-41: g-yon brkyang zhing g-yas pa bskum pa ni g-yon brkyang ba yin la /
T02TD2510.1E:256b-0: bzlog pa ni g-yas @256b brkyang ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-1: rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du mtho lnga'i tshad dang ldan par lus tshad kyi nges pa bshad pa ni gnyis ka la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-2: rdo rje khro bo gzhag pa ni //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-3: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rigs kyi khro bo'o //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-4: khros pas mche ba phyang ba ste //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-6: khro bo de mche ba gtsigs pa ni khros pas mche ba phyung ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-9: 'bar ba can gyi 'bar pa'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa de las 'od 'phro ba de'i 'od ni dkrigs pa'i 'od gang la mnga' ba de ni 'bar ba'i phreng ba dkrigs pa'i 'od mnga' ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-10: der ni rdo rjes dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-12: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rdo rje'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin chen h'um mdzad do //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-13: rdo rje sde ni bri bar bya //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-15: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su rdo rje sde /
T02TD2510.1E:256b-16: chos kyi gnas su h'um mdzad gzhon nu'i gzugs bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-17: rdo rje dbab pa bri bar bya //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-18: zhes bya ba ni don yod grub pa'i gnas su las kyi h'um mdzad rdo rje las kyi gzugs can ni 'dir rdo rje dbab pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-19: rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul bzhin du //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-20: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por rdo rje sgeg mo dang /
T02TD2510.1E:256b-23: gar ma ji ltar bri ba de bzhin du 'dir bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-24: dkyil 'khor dam pa'i phyi rol du //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-25: zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang de ni dam pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-26: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams la ltos pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:256b-27: phyi rol dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-28: phyi yi rdo rje'i rigs rnams so //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-29: zhes bya ba ni khyams ni phyi rol la'o //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-31: khyams kyi nang du byams pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:256b-32: khyams la brten nas khyab 'jug la sogs pa bri bar bya zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-34: rdo rje thig gis yongs su bskor ba ni nang gi dkyil 'khor yin no zhes bya ba de ni mi rigs te /
T02TD2510.1E:256b-35: gsungs pa med pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2510.1E:256b-36: gang dag gis dam pa zhes smos pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:256b-37: 'og nas kyang phyi'i dkyil 'khor zhes smos pa nas /
T02TD2510.1E:256b-38: rdo rje srad bu'i phyi rol la phyi rol zhes gsungs so zhes zer ba de yang bshad ma thag pa nyid kyis spangs pas mi rigs so //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-40: sgrub pa'i grogs po'i lag tu dza: //
T02TD2510.1E:256b-41: zhes bya bas thig skud gtad la /
T02TD2510.1E:257a-0: @257a * // aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes pa rdzogs su bltas la tshangs pa'i thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257a-1: de nas lho phyogs nas byang du bltas la tshangs pa'i thig gnyis pa gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257a-2: de nas me'i phyogs su gnas te /
T02TD2510.1E:257a-3: byang du bltas la shar phyogs kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257a-4: rlung gi phyogs la gnas la /
T02TD2510.1E:257a-6: nub kyi phyogs kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257a-7: de nyid du gnas nas shar du bltas te /
T02TD2510.1E:257a-8: byang gi phyogs kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257a-9: de nas yang me'i phyogs su gnas te /
T02TD2510.1E:257a-11: lho'i phyogs kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257a-12: de bzhin du lha'i snam bu dang /
T02TD2510.1E:257a-16: lho yang snga ma bzhin du thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257a-17: de nas phyi'i kha khyer la phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyams kyi phyed kyi tshad kyi thig btab nas nye ba'i kha khyer du bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257a-18: slar yang me'i phyogs su 'dug nas /
T02TD2510.1E:257a-19: rlung gi phyogs su bltas te /
T02TD2510.1E:257a-20: mtshams kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257a-21: de nas bden bral du gnas la /
T02TD2510.1E:257a-23: yang mtshams kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257a-24: de la kha khyer spangs pa'i sgo ni brgyad cha'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257a-25: lha'i snam bu dang kha khyer ni sgo'i phyed kyi tshad do //
T02TD2510.1E:257a-26: sgo khyud dang sgo 'gram ni kha khyer gyi tshad do //
T02TD2510.1E:257a-27: de'i phyir sgo khyud dang sgo 'gram ni tshad mnyam pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257a-28: rta babs ni sgo'i sum 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:257a-29: tshon sna lnga'i sa ni khyams kyi phyed kyi tshan du blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257a-30: de ltar phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad nges par bshad nas /
T02TD2510.1E:257a-31: nang gi dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:257a-32: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad la zur bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa kha khyer gyis yongs su bskor ba rta babs bzhi dang bcas pa /
T02TD2510.1E:257a-33: khya khyer la rdo rje rin po ches brgyan pa /
T02TD2510.1E:257a-34: ka ba brgyad dang ldan pa cha dgu dang ldan pa mnyam par byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:257a-35: dbus ma'i cha la rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i phreng bas zlum por bskor bar byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:257a-36: mi bskyod pa'i gnas su rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2510.1E:257a-37: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rin chen h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2510.1E:257a-38: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su chos kyi h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2510.1E:257a-39: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su las kyi h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor zlum po rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257b-0: de la slob @257b dpon gyis ka ba brgyad kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257b-1: thog mar lho phyogs su gnas nas byang gi phyogs su bltas te /
T02TD2510.1E:257b-2: shar sgo'i thad ka'i gdung gi thig gdab pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:257b-3: de nas byang gi phyogs su gnas te lhor bltas nas nub kyi sgo'i thad ka'i gdung gi thig gdab pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:257b-4: de nas nub tu gnas te shar du bltas nas byang gi sgo'i thad ka'i gdung gi thig gdab pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:257b-5: de nas shar du gnas te nub tu bltas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:257b-6: lho'i sgo'i thad ka'i gdung gi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257b-7: thams cad du slob dpon dang slob ma thig 'dzin pa skor phyogs su 'gro bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257b-9: phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs la //
T02TD2510.1E:257b-10: mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig btab ste //
T02TD2510.1E:257b-11: shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor //
T02TD2510.1E:257b-12: thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad //
T02TD2510.1E:257b-14: de nas mig g-yas pa dang g-yon par yi ge hi las nyi ma dang zla bar bskyed de /
T02TD2510.1E:257b-15: kun nas khro bo'i lta bas bltas la sgo rnams bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257b-16: de ltar tshon gyi rim pa rdzogs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:257b-17: lha rnams dgod par bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:257b-18: de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ni zhal bzhi pa zla ba'i mdog can /
T02TD2510.1E:257b-19: rin po che'i chod pan dang /
T02TD2510.1E:257b-20: dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur ba /
T02TD2510.1E:257b-21: ji skad bshad pa'i pha gu'i steng du seng ge dang padma'i gdan la /
T02TD2510.1E:257b-22: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD2510.1E:257b-23: phyag gnyis kyis byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa zhal dang po shar du gzigs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257b-24: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa yang shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257b-25: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad ni mi bskyod pa'i gnas su glang po che'i gdan la au ma khyo shug zhabs kyis mnan pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257b-26: de'i snying po ni gnyis te /
T02TD2510.1E:257b-27: aom h'um badzra tri sh'u la /
T02TD2510.1E:257b-28: aom sum bha ni sum bha badzra bidya au ttam h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:257b-30: aom kro dha badzra agne dzva la tri sh'u lam /
T02TD2510.1E:257b-31: bandha hri da yam badzre na h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:257b-32: ces bya ba ni au ma'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257b-33: de la dbang phyug ni phyag g-yas pas rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:257b-34: g-yon pas mdung rtse gsum pa bsnams pa /
T02TD2510.1E:257b-35: rgyan dang kha dog ni ji ltar grags pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257b-36: au ma ni gser gyi mdog can /
T02TD2510.1E:257b-37: dbang phyug bzhin du rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:257b-38: khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog sngon po /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-1: bo'i rgyal po ni gser gyi mdog can /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-3: legs pa ni mar gad kyi mdog can /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-5: khro bo khro gnyer ni gser gyi mdog can /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-6: nyi ma ni nyi ma'i kha dog //
T02TD2510.1E:258a-7: dpal ni nam mkha'i mdog can /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-10: rdo rje khro bo chos ni dkar dmar /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-12: rgyu ni gsar gyi mdog can /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-13: smra ba ni zangs kyi mdog can /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-15: khro bo rdor rje las ni sna tshogs pa'i mdog can /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-16: srung ba ni gser gyi mdog can /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-17: gnod sbyin ni kha dog nag po /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-18: khu tshur ni kha dog ser po /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-22: gar ma sna tshogs pa'i mdog can /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-26: byug pa ma sna tshogs pa'i mdo phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-27: nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgo'i dbus kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dag ni sngon po /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-28: phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lho'i sgo'i rdo rje zhags pa ni ser po /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-29: phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi nub sgo'i rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dag ni dmar skya /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-30: phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi byang gi sgo'i dbus kyi rdo rje 'bebs pa dag ni sna tshogs pa'i mdog can bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:258a-31: shar phyogs kyi khyams kyi nang du byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa dgu po rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba bsnams pa /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-32: lho phyogs kyi chal rdo rje rin po che bsnams pa /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-33: nub phyogs su rdo rje padma bsnams pa /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-34: byang phyogs su sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa dgu bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:258a-35: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-36: bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa de dag thams cad g-yon brkyang pa'i rnams pas gnas pa /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-37: g-yon pa snying gar khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sdigs mdzub mdzad pa /
T02TD2510.1E:258a-38: g-yas pas khro bo'i khu tshur gyis rang gi mtshan ma bsnams nas tsham dam mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:258a-39: sgeg mo la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad kyang g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:258b-0: de la byams pa la sogs @258b pa'i rig pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-1: aom sarbba sam sk'a ra ba ri shuddha dha rma te ga ga nas mung+ga te /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-2: ma h'a na ya pa ri b'a re sv'a h'a /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-3: de nas khyab 'jug la sogs pa chu lha'i mthar thug pa chung ma dang bcas pa ni nye ba'i khyams la bzhon ba dang bcas pa /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-4: phyag g-yas na rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsnams ba /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-5: g-yon na rang gi mtshan ma 'chang ba rang gi snying po'i rig pas bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:258b-6: de nas shar phyogs su sgyu ma rdo rje dang /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-9: rdo rje mtshon cha rnams rang gi chung ma dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-10: lho phyogs su bdud rtsi 'khyol pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-14: nub phyogs su rdo rje myos pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-17: rdo rje rgyal bar byed pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-23: byang phyogs dang nye ba'i khyams la rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-25: rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso bo dang /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-27: chung ma dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:258b-28: nye ba'i khyams de'i me'i phyogs su lha mo 'jigs ma dang /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-29: bden bral du lha mo dpal mo dang /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-30: rlung du dbyangs ca na ma dang /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-31: dbang ldan du dka' bzlog ma bri ba bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:258b-32: de la khyab 'jug la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-33: dka' bzlog ma'i snying po'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-35: aom badzra he me tstshinda tsa kre na baddzri ni h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-37: aom badzra koo m'a ri sh'i ghram a'a be sha ya /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-38: ghanta shbbe na badzra p'a ni pr'i ye badzra sa ma ya ma nu sm'a ra ra na ra na h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-40: aom badzra sha'nti dza pa dza pa aa ksha ma m'a ya sarbba na m'a ra ya sh'a nti dri sh+ya h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-41: aom bazdra aa yu dha h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-42: aom badzra aa yu dha h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-43: aom badzra mushti ha na ha na badzre na bindha bindha p'i da ya p'i da ya /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-45: aom sum bha ni su bha h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-46: aom pra dzv'a li ta d'ipta badzra h'um /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-47: aom badzra aa mri ta sarbba du shtan gri hna ba ndha ha na da ha pa tsa bi dhvansa ya bi n'a sha ya tstshindha bhinda bhasmim ku ru murdha n'am ta da ya badzra na ye ke ci tam /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-48: aa mu ka s+ya bi bhnam bi n'a ya ka stvam dha ma ya d'ibta kro dha badzri ni h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-49: aom badzra soo mya h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-50: aom badzra kanti m'a ra ya soo mya dh'u pe bra d'ipta r'a ge na sh'i ghram spho ta ya hri da yam /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-51: badzra dha ra sa t+ye na ma dhya dzyod sna ka r'a le shi ta ra shim badzri ni h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-53: aom badzra danda yang gh'a ta na ya h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:258b-54: aom badzra bi kri ta h'um /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-0: aom badzra me kha li kha na kha na @259a * //
T02TD2510.1E:259a-1: shabde na ba shi ku du tri sh'u la m'a ra ya bhi sha ni h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-3: aom badzra bi la sa ye h'um /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-4: tstshinda a'a sa ni bhndi badzre na m'a ra ya audm'a da ya pi ba pi bah'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-6: aom badzra aa sha na bha ksha ya sarba du shta badzra da sha ni sha ktri dha ra ni ma nu sha m'ansa a'a ha re /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-7: na ra ru dhi ru aa sa ba pri ye madzdza ba sa nu le pa na ba li bta gha te /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-8: a'a na ya sarbba dha n+ya dha n+ya hi ra n+dya su pa aa d'i ni sam kra ma ya ba ra de bhakshi ni h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-9: aom badzra ba she a'a na ya ba shi ku ru sarba stri ya sarba pu ru sh'a d'a si ku ru kung dha ma pra s'a dha ya bya ba ha re bhyo /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-10: bu t'a ya bi dza yam ka ri badzra p'a ta ka dh'a ri ni h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-11: aom badzra aa ka si h'um /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-13: a'a na ya sarbba ba tvam /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-14: anna p'a n'a d'i t+yu pa ka ra n'a ni sh'i ghrim bshi ku rban ai dam me pra yatstsha a'a be sha sat+yam ka ta ya badzra ko sha dha ri ni h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-15: aom badzra mu sa la h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-16: aom badzra du shti a'a na yam sarbba mandalam /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-17: pra be sha ya bandha ya sarbba karmma ni me ku ru sh'i ghram la ghu tr'a sa ya m'ar ya r'a pe ne badzra kha tv'am ga dha ri ni h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-18: aom badzra pa ta h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-19: aom badzra be ga badzri ni ghu ghu ghu ghu shabde na manda ya bi ka ra bi dhvansa ya /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-20: badzra pa ta dha ri ni h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-22: aom badzra dzra la dzva la ya sarbba badzra dzva la ya ha ha da ha bha smi ku ru h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-24: aom badzra bi ka de pra bi ka da damshta ka r'a la bhi sha na bagtre sh'i ghi gri hna a'a be sha ya bha ksha ya /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-25: ru dhi ra na pi pa ma h'a ya kshi ni badzra ya ksha ni badzra pa sha dha ri ni h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-27: aom badzra mu khi aa na ya badzre damshta bha ya ni ke pa ta la b'a si ni kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-28: sarbba mu khe pra be sha ya spho ta ya spho ta ya /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-29: m'a ra na sarbba du shtha n'am /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-30: badzri ni siddham aa siddha ri ni h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-31: aom badzra ma ra na h'um /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-32: aom badzra k'a li ma h'a pre ta r'u pi ni ma nu sha m'ansa ru dhi ra pr'i ye ae hye hi gri hna gri hna bha ksha ya /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-33: badzra d'a ki ni badzra sham ka le /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-34: sarbba de baga na ma tri bh'u te h'a ra ha ra pra nan /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-35: aa mu ka s+ya ka p'a la m'a l'a lam kr kri ta sarbba k'a ye ki nytsi ra ya sa /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-36: badzra kha tv'am ga dha ri ne pre ta ma nu sha shashi re sh'i ghram /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-37: a'a be sha ya pra be sha ya bandha ya ba shi ku ru m'a ra ya badzra raksha si h'um h'um h'um h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-39: aom badzra pu ta ne ma nu sha m'ansa ba sa ru dhi ra mu tra pu risha kle sham shim ghra na /
T02TD2510.1E:259a-40: kam re to garbba ha re n+ya ai dam ya hi sh'i ghrim ai dam aa mu ka s+ya ku ru badzra sho dha ni k'a dh'a ri ni sarba ka karmma ni sarba karmma me ku ru h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:259b-0: aom badzra ha ra @259b ni h'um /
T02TD2510.1E:259b-1: aom badzra ma ka re gra sa gra sa sh'i ghram sh'i ghram pra be sha ya /
T02TD2510.1E:259b-2: ba ta lam bhaksha ya badzra ma ka ra dhva ri ni h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:259b-3: ces bya bas khyab 'jug la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.1E:259b-4: chu lha'i mthar thug pa'i bar du chung ma dang bcas pa rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du snying po dang rig pa rnams su rigs par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:259b-5: aom sarbba badzra ga mi ni sarbba bha kshe /
T02TD2510.1E:259b-6: s'a dha guhya badzri ni h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:259b-7: ces bya bas 'jigs pa nas brtsams nas dka' bzlog ma'i bar du rig pa yin no /
T02TD2510.1E:259b-8: yang na drag po la sogs pa gdan las lus phyed phyung pa phyir rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi lha rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:259b-9: de skad du yang rdo rje rtse mo las drag po la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyi shar phyogs su bdud rtsi 'khyil pa la sogs pa'i khro bo rnams dag lho'i phyogs su rdo rje myos pa la sogs pa tshogs kyi bdag po rnams dang /
T02TD2510.1E:259b-10: rdo rje thob ba la sogs pa'i phog nya rnams nub kyi phyogs su bran gyi tshogs rnams kyams la brten pa byang gi phyogs su bri ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:259b-11: ma mo'i tshogs kyang bri bar bya'o zhes gsungs pas de la the tshom mi bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:259b-12: de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud chen po 'di nyid las kyang /
T02TD2510.1E:259b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi rtse mo rdo rje dang /
T02TD2510.1E:259b-14: nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa thams cad du yangs su bskor te gnas pa yin no zhes gsungs pa yin la /
T02TD2510.1E:259b-15: nang gi dkyil 'khor du gnas par ni ma gsungs te /
T02TD2510.1E:259b-16: phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs rnams 'jig rten pa'i lha'i gzugs kyis bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:259b-17: gdon la sogs pa ni 'dir bshad pa med de /
T02TD2510.1E:259b-18: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du gnas pa rnams la phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs zhes pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:259b-19: phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi sgras gdon la sogs pa gzung ba yin no zhes brjod par nus pa ma yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:259b-20: de rnams kyi phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi dbang bskur ba rnams kyi dbang bskur ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:259b-21: khro bo'i rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyi dus su kha cig ni bsad pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:259b-22: kha cig ni ma bas dbar song ba de'i phyir yang bri bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:259b-23: de la thog mar re zhig drag po'i shar gyi phyogs su glang khyu mchog la zhon pa /
T02TD2510.1E:259b-24: phyag bzhi pa sku mdog dkar po /
T02TD2510.1E:259b-25: nor bu rin po che'i chod pan dang /
T02TD2510.1E:259b-26: zla ba phyed pas dbang bskur ba /
T02TD2510.1E:259b-27: g-yas pa'i phyag gcig gis au ma la 'khyud pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-0: gnyis pas rdo rje rtse gsum dang bcas pas mchog @260a * //
T02TD2510.1E:260a-2: g-yon pa'i phyag gcig gis mdud rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-3: gnyis pas ral gri 'dzin pa sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs 'chang ba /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-5: aom pa shu pa ti n'i la kantha au ma pri ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-6: zhes bya ba 'di bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260a-7: de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-8: lag pa g-yas ba'i khu tshur bcings nas /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-9: mthe bos mthe'u chung mnan te /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-10: sor mo lhag ma rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas te /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-11: srin lag dang mdzub mo gnyis cung zad ci ga bskums pa ni phyugs bdag gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260a-12: khyab 'jug ni nam mkha' lding la chibs pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-13: mdog nag po phyag bzhi pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-14: phyag g-yas pa dag gis dbyug to dang rdo rje 'dzin pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-15: g-yon pa dag gis mdung dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260a-16: rdo rje gser ni gser gyi mdog can /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-17: gdan dang phyag mtshan ni khyab 'jug yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:260a-18: rdo rje dril bu ni rma bya ba la zhon pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-19: mdog dmar po dong drug pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-20: phyag g-yas pa dag gis mdung dang rdo rje 'dzin pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-21: g-yon bdag gis khyim bya dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260a-22: rdo rje gzhon nu ma ni rdo rje dril bu bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260a-23: thub pa rdo rje ni ngang pa la zhon pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-24: gser gyi mdog can gdong bzhi pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-25: phyag g-yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang bgrang phreng 'dzin pa //
T02TD2510.1E:260a-28: rdo rje zhi ba ni tshangs pa bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260a-29: rdo rje mtshon cha ni glang po che dkar po la zhon pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-30: mdog dkar ser g-yas pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-31: g-yon pas rang gi rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260a-32: rdo rje khu tshur ni rdo rje mtshon cha bzhin du blta bar bya'o//
T02TD2510.1E:260a-33: khro bo rdo rje 'khyil ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-34: mdog dmar po rtas drangs pa'i shing rta la zhon pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-35: phyag g-yas pas rdo rje dang bcas pa'i padma 'dzin pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-36: g-yon pas ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260a-37: rdo rje bdud rtsi ma ni khro bo rdo rje 'khyil pa bzhin du'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260a-39: mdog dkar po dang pa la zhon pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-40: phyag g-yas pa na rdo rje /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-41: g-yon pa na zla ba dang bcas pa'i padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260a-42: rdo rje mdangs ma ni khro bo rdo rje 'od bzhin no //
T02TD2510.1E:260a-43: khro bo rdo rje dbyug pa ni rus sbal la zhon pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260a-44: mdog sngon po phyag g-yas na rdo rje /
T02TD2510.1E:260b-0: rdo rje dbyig mchog @260b ma ni khro bo rdo rje dbyig pa dang mthun pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260b-1: khro bo rdo rje ser skya ni ra la zhon pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260b-2: mdog dmar po phyag g-yas na rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260b-3: g-yon na mi mgo ba zung nas za zhing gnas pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260b-4: rdo rje rked bcings ma ni khro bo rdo je ser skya dang mtshungs so //
T02TD2510.1E:260b-5: tshogs kyi bdag pi'o rdo rje myos ma ni mdog dkar po glang po la zhon pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260b-6: phyag g-yas pan rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260b-7: g-yon na thong gshol bsnams shing bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260b-8: rdo rje 'dzum ma ni rdo rje myos ma dang mtshungs pa la /
T02TD2510.1E:260b-9: khyad par ni 'di yod de g-yon na ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260b-10: tshogs kyi bdag po rdo rje phreng ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:260b-11: mdog sngo bsangs khu byug la zhon pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260b-13: g-yon na me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260b-14: rdo rje za ba mo ni rdo rje phreng ba dang mtshungs pa las khyad par ni 'di yod de g-yon na mdud rtse gcig pa thogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260b-15: rdo rje dbang ni mdog ser skya rtas drangs pa'i shing rta la zhon pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260b-17: g-yon hu srin gyi rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260b-18: rdo rje bgo ba ma ni rdo rje dbang po dang mtshungs pa las khyad par ni 'di yod de //
T02TD2510.1E:260b-19: 'di ltar mdog dmar po yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:260b-20: tshogs kyi bdag po rgyal ba'i rdo rje ni mdog dkar po sbal pa la zhon pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260b-21: g-yas na rdo rje g-yon na ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260b-22: rdo rje dbang mo ni rgyal ba'i rdo rje dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260b-23: phogs nya rdo rje thob ni /
T02TD2510.1E:260b-24: mdog ser skya me tog can gyi khyogs la zhon pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260b-25: phyag g-yas na rdo rje 'dzin pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260b-27: rdo rje pho nya ma ni rdo rje gtun shing dang mtshungs pa las /
T02TD2510.1E:260b-29: 'di ltar lag pha g-yon pa na kha tr'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260b-30: pho nya rdo rje rlung ni mdog sngon po ri dags la zhon pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260b-31: lag pa g-yas na rdo rje /
T02TD2510.1E:260b-32: lag pa g-yon na ba dan bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260b-33: rdo rje mgyogs ma ni pho nya rdo rje rlung dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260b-34: pho nya rdo rje me ni mdog dkar po ra skyes la zhon pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260b-35: 'od zer gyen du 'bar ba'i rtse mo gsum pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260b-36: lag pa g-yas pa dag na rdo rje dang dgang gzar bsnams pa /
T02TD2510.1E:260b-37: g-yon pa gnyis na shing gi dbyig pa dang ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:260b-38: rdo rje 'bar ba mo ni pho nya rdo rje me dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:261a-1: pa ni mdog sngon po ro langs la zhon pa /
T02TD2510.1E:261a-2: phyag g-yas pa na rdo rje /
T02TD2510.1E:261a-3: g-yon pa na pe con bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:261a-4: rdo rje 'khyor ma ni pho nya rdo rje 'jigs pa dang mtshungs pa las khyad bar ni 'di yod de /
T02TD2510.1E:261a-5: phyag g-yon na zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:261a-6: bran rdo rje lcags kyu ni mdog sngon po /
T02TD2510.1E:261a-7: klu'i rgyal po she sha la zhon pa /
T02TD2510.1E:261a-8: phag gi gdong can phyag g-yas na rdo rje /
T02TD2510.1E:261a-9: g-yon na rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:261a-10: bran mo rdo rje kha ni mdog sngon po skyes pa la zhon pa /
T02TD2510.1E:261a-11: phyag gi gdong can phyag g-yas na rdo rje g-yon na ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:261a-12: bran rdo rje dus ni mdog sngon po ma he la zhon pa /
T02TD2510.1E:261a-13: phyag g-yas na rdo rje g-yon na gshin rje'i dbyug pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:261a-14: bran mo rdo rje dus ni mdog nag po ro langs la zhon pa phyag g-yas na rdo rje g-yon na kha t'vam ga bsnams ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:261a-15: bran rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso bo ni mdog ser skya byi ba la zhon pa /
T02TD2510.1E:261a-16: phyag g-yas dag na rdo rje dang dgra sta /
T02TD2510.1E:261a-17: phyag g-yon pa dag na rtse gsum pa dang glang po che'i mche ba bsnams pa /
T02TD2510.1E:261a-18: sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs 'chang ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:261a-19: bran mo rdo rje rul pa ma ni mdog sngon po /
T02TD2510.1E:261a-20: phyag g-yas na rdo rje g-yon na phyags shing bsnams pa byi ba la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:261a-21: bran klu rdo rje ni mdog ser skya /
T02TD2510.1E:261a-22: rdo rje chu srin la zhon pa sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka brgyad dang ldan pa /
T02TD2510.1E:261a-24: g-yon na sprul gyi zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:261a-25: bran mo rdo rje chu srin ma ni mdog dkar po chu srin la zhon pa /
T02TD2510.1E:261a-26: gdengs ka brgyad pa phyag g-yas na rdo rje /
T02TD2510.1E:261a-27: phyag g-yon na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan rdo rje mtshan pa bsnams pa'o 'jigs ma ni mdog sngo bsangs phyag g-yas na rdo rje /
T02TD2510.1E:261a-28: g-yon na ral gri dang phub bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:261a-29: dpal mo ni mdog ser skya /
T02TD2510.1E:261a-30: phyag g-yas na rdo rje g-yon na padma bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:261a-31: dbyangs can ma ni mdog dkar mo /
T02TD2510.1E:261a-33: phyag g-yon na pi wang bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:261a-34: dka' bzlog ma ni mdog sngo bsangs seng ge la zhon pa /
T02TD2510.1E:261a-35: phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang 'khor lo bsnams pa /
T02TD2510.1E:261a-36: phyag g-yon pa dag na ldan men ti sya dang mdung bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:261a-37: drag po la sogs pa nas chu lha'i mthar thug ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:261a-38: ma mo thams cad kyi lag pa g-yas kyi rdo rje bshad pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:261b-0: @261b rdo rje rtse gsum par blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:261b-1: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha thams cad kyang rnam par snang mdzad la mdun bltas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:261b-2: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste bris pa'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:261b-3: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin no zhes bya ba las /
T02TD2510.1E:261b-4: de la khro bo ti r'inti ris 'dir 'jug pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:261b-5: des dang po nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs su 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.1E:261b-6: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi chog rgyas pa'i bar du ni 'jug ba'i chog rgyas pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:261b-7: 'jug ba dang por byas pha gang la yod pa ni 'jug ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:261b-8: de la rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyis khro bo ti r'i nti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te bzhugs shig ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:261b-9: de la rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i rdo rje khro bo de dag phan tshun mtha' med bar gyur pa ni ti r'i nti ri'o //
T02TD2510.1E:261b-10: de mtshon pa'i phyag rgyal ni ti r'i nti ri zhes gdags te /
T02TD2510.1E:261b-11: rdo rje'i rigs thams cad bsdus pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:261b-12: de nyid kyi phyir phyag rgya 'dis 'dir 'jug pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:261b-13: rdo rje'i rigs su lha thams cad sku dang /
T02TD2510.1E:261b-15: thugs rdo rje mos pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:261b-16: de'i rang bzhin du rtogs nas mos pa spyod pa'i sa nas bzung ste /
T02TD2510.1E:261b-17: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rang bzhin rtogs pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:261b-19: phyag rgya bcings nas sngags brjod cing gang gi lus kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa ni phyi'i 'jug pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:261b-20: 'jug pa de dag gis zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi slob dpon du gyur pa des thams cad bya ba yin par blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:261b-21: de ltar 'jug pa de dag gis zhugs nas ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:261b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:261b-23: ji ltar gsol ba gdab ce na /
T02TD2510.1E:261b-24: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i dbang du ma chis te zhes bya ba ni khro bo'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:261b-25: des ci zhig byed pa yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:261b-26: char gcad par rigs pa rnams ni tshar gcod do zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:261b-27: gdug cing ma rungs pa tshar gcad par 'os pa rnams tshar gcod pa /
T02TD2510.1E:262a-0: gang chos dang mthun par rjes su gzung ba'i rigs pa rnams ni bsdu ba'i dngos po @262a * //
T02TD2510.1E:262a-2: de ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi /
T02TD2510.1E:262a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal du gsol zhes bya ba ni rgyu mtshan des na /
T02TD2510.1E:262a-4: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi /
T02TD2510.1E:262a-6: gdug pa rnams gang gis tshar gcad par bgyi /
T02TD2510.1E:262a-7: chos dang mthun pa rnams thabs gang gis rjes su gzung bar bgyi zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:262a-8: de skad du gsol ba 'debs par byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:262a-9: khro bo rdo rje ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya snying gar ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag ste zhes bya ba ni dbab pa bdag nyid la dbab pa byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:262a-10: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02TD2510.1E:262a-11: phyag rgya rang gi snying gar dgrol bas dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:262a-12: lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:262a-13: bsdu ba byas nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod do //
T02TD2510.1E:262a-14: rdo rje lcags kyu las kyi phyag rgyas sgo dang nye bar bzhag la /
T02TD2510.1E:262a-15: rdo rje zhags pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas sgor gnas pa rab tu bcug nas rdo rje lcags sgrog gi las kyi phyag rgyas bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:262a-16: khro bo chen po rdo rje 'bebs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas dbang du byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:262a-17: yang dam tshig gi phyag rgyas thams cad chings shig dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:262a-18: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2510.1E:262a-20: phyag rgya chen po rnams rnam par snang mdzad nas brtsams nas /
T02TD2510.1E:262a-21: phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi du bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:262a-22: dam tshig gi phyag rgya phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi ji ltar yin par shes she na /
T02TD2510.1E:262a-23: de skad du yang rgyud phyi ma las bstan te /
T02TD2510.1E:262a-24: dam tshig phyag rgya mchog bcings pas //
T02TD2510.1E:262a-25: las rnams thams cad sgrub pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:262a-26: zhes bya ba de nyid bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:262a-27: de nas yang gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:262a-28: bdug pa la sogs pa'ang de bzhin no //
T02TD2510.1E:262a-29: de nas cho ga 'dis rdo rje slob ma chug cig ces bya ba ni slob ma rdo rje h'um mdzad du byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:262a-30: cho ga 'dis rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:262a-31: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho gas sangs rgyas su byed pas so //
T02TD2510.1E:262a-32: rang gis zhes bya ba ni rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyis khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:262b-0: slob ma yang snying po 'di dang 'ching du chug cig ces bya @262b ba ni go sla'o //
T02TD2510.1E:262b-1: rdo rje dbab pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:262b-2: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas slob ma la dbab pa bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:262b-3: de nas mna'i snying po byin cig ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:262b-4: 'jug pa byas pa'i de ma thag pa nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs su zhugs kyis /
T02TD2510.1E:262b-5: ngas khyod la rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya zhes bya ba na /
T02TD2510.1E:262b-6: khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:262b-8: de nas gdong g-yogs bcings pa bkrol te dkyil 'khor chen po ji lta ba bzhin ston cing zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:262b-9: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:262b-10: pra t'i tstsha badzra ho zhes bya bas me tog dor ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:262b-11: aom pra ti grihna sva mi m'am satvam ma h'a ba la zhes bya bas me tog gi phreng ba bcing ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:262b-12: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02TD2510.1E:262b-13: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad ;
T02TD2510.1E:262b-14: / rdo rje mig ni bla na med //
T02TD2510.1E:262b-15: de ring nyid du 'byed par byed //
T02TD2510.1E:262b-16: ces bya bas gdong g-yogs bcings pa dgrol bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:262b-17: rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams nas /
T02TD2510.1E:262b-18: rnam par snang mdzad kyi mthar thug gi bar du rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:262b-19: des dkyil 'khor mthong bas cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:262b-20: sdig pa thams cad las dgrol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smos so //
T02TD2510.1E:262b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:262b-22: dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i stobs kyis sems phul du byung bar gyur te /
T02TD2510.1E:262b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mthus phul du byung ba'i ye shes skyes so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:262b-24: de nas de la rdo rje'i dbang bskur te zhes bya ba la rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i gzungs su de byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:262b-25: chu'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba dang rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:262b-26: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um /
T02TD2510.1E:262b-27: aa bhi shinyts'a mi zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:262b-28: rdo rje ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas /
T02TD2510.1E:262b-29: rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:262b-30: rang gi mtshan ma'i rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:263a-0: lcags sam zangs las byas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga @263a * //
T02TD2510.1E:263a-1: pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi 'bar ba'i rdo rje rnon po de ni rdo rje rigs kyi rang gi mtshan ma de nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don du bshad do //
T02TD2510.1E:263a-2: ji skad du bshad pa'i cho gas nyi ma 'char kar dkyil 'khor thig btab la /
T02TD2510.1E:263a-3: mig g-yas pa dang g-yon par yi ge hi las nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la /
T02TD2510.1E:263a-4: khro bo'i lta bas kun nas bltas te sgo rnams dbye bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:263a-5: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya bas /
T02TD2510.1E:263a-7: tshon sna lnga la lan bdun gyi bar du bzlas la /
T02TD2510.1E:263a-8: yi ge his sbar bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:263a-9: yang aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2510.1E:263a-10: rdo rje dril bu bzung ba'i g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis dbang ldan nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.1E:263a-11: g-yas phyogs nas bri ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:263a-12: phyi nas ni ci bde bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:263a-18: thams cad kyi nang du dkar por bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:263a-19: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sa gzhi ni kha dog dkar po rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi kha dog sngon po /
T02TD2510.1E:263a-20: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi kha dog ser po /
T02TD2510.1E:263a-21: chos kyi h'um mdzad kyi kha dog dmar po /
T02TD2510.1E:263a-22: las kyi h'um mdzad kyi kha dog ljang gu'o //
T02TD2510.1E:263a-24: shar phyogs su ni sngon po che //
T02TD2510.1E:263a-25: lhor ni ser po dang ldan pa //
T02TD2510.1E:263a-26: nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste //
T02TD2510.1E:263a-27: byang ni ljang gu dang ldan pa //
T02TD2510.1E:263a-28: dbus kyi cha yi sa nyid ni //
T02TD2510.1E:263a-29: shel ltar snang ba bla na med //
T02TD2510.1E:263a-31: de la rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor zlum po rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ba byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:263a-32: de la rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.1E:263a-36: rdo rje las ma rnams kyi gdan rnams kyang bri bar bya'i //
T02TD2510.1E:263a-37: de ltar rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor zlum por byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:263a-38: de la rdo rje h'um mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.1E:263a-42: khro bo legs pa rnams kyi gdan yang bri bar bya'o ;
T02TD2510.1E:263a-43: / de bzhin du rin chen h'um mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.1E:263a-45: las kyi h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor zlum por byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:263a-46: de rnams la gdan lnga lnga bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:263a-47: sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad kyi gnas rnams su zlum por byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:263a-48: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga lnga byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:263b-0: @263b lhag ma rnams ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re re bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:263b-1: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa gdan de rnams la bkod la /
T02TD2510.1E:263b-2: sgeg mo la de las gzhan yang khar dkrol brdung ba'i lha mo bzhin bskor ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:263b-3: glu ma de las gzhan pa'i gling bu ma bzhi dang /
T02TD2510.1E:263b-4: phreng ba ma la rang gi gnas su de las gzhan pa rnga zlum brdung ba bzhi dang /
T02TD2510.1E:263b-5: gar ma la de las gzhan pa'i rnga rked nyag rdung ba bzhi dang /
T02TD2510.1E:263b-6: bdug pa ma la de las gzhan pa'i zang dung 'bud pa bzhi dang /
T02TD2510.1E:263b-7: me tog ma la de las gzhan pa rnga bo che brdung ba bzhi dang /
T02TD2510.1E:263b-8: mang me ma la de las gzhan pa rnga dra ba can brdung ba bzhi dang /
T02TD2510.1E:263b-9: byug pa ma la de las gzhan pa rnga 'da' ka brdung ba'i lha mo bzhis bskor ba bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:263b-10: 'khor rnams kyang rang rang gi gnas su bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:263b-11: de nas brdung ba'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:263b-12: badzra h'um ha khar dkrol gyi snying po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:263b-13: badzra ghu ghu rnga zlum gyi snying po'o ;
T02TD2510.1E:263b-14: / badzra h'um aom gling bu 'bud pa'i'o //
T02TD2510.1E:263b-15: badzra h'um stam rnga rked nyag brdung ba'i'o //
T02TD2510.1E:263b-16: badzra ti ti zangs dung 'bung pa'i'o //
T02TD2510.1E:263b-17: badzra ta ta ta rnga bo che brdung pa'i'o //
T02TD2510.1E:263b-18: badzra ha du ha rnga dra ba can brdung ba'i'o //
T02TD2510.1E:263b-19: badzra ha du rnga 'da' ka brdung ba'i ste lhag ma ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2510.1E:263b-20: de ltar rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor bris nas /
T02TD2510.1E:263b-21: dgongs ka'i dus su dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas rdo rje khro bo ti r'i nti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:263b-22: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba blangs la /
T02TD2510.1E:263b-23: rdo rje shugs kyi h'um bzhi badzrod cing dkyil 'khor du zhugs la lan bdun bar du bskor pa byas te /
T02TD2510.1E:263b-24: lhag ma dor ba dang ma tshang ba bskang ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:263b-25: rdo rje dang dril bu dkrol zhing blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:263b-26: de nas phreng ba de bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad la phul te /
T02TD2510.1E:263b-27: gar bya zhing blangs la yi ge h'um bzhis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:263b-28: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'jug ste /
T02TD2510.1E:263b-29: rnal 'byor pas legs par mnyam par byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:263b-30: aom badzrod gha ta sa ma ya pra be sha ya h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di dang phyag rgya dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sgo rnams dbye bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:263b-32: yang na sa las byas pa'i bum pa rtsa ba mi gnag pa /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-6: 'bru thams cad kyis yongs su bkang ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i ldum bus kha brgyan pa /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-7: mgrin pa ras bzang pos bcings pa /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-8: khro bo rdo rje srung ba bzlas pa'i skud pa btags pas bsrung ba /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-9: phyi rol kun nas dri zhim pos nye bar byugs pa /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-10: me tog gi phreng ba btags pa /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-11: rdo rje phreng ba rtse lnga pa 'bar ba'i steng du bzhag nas phyin gyis brlabs pa /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-12: khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin lan brgya bzlas pa'i mchod yon phul la /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-13: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-14: rdo rje khro bo dam tshig gi phyag rgyas me tog gi lcug ma la de'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-15: de nyid la rdo rje me dang /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-16: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis de bzhin du mchod yon phul nas /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-17: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyas me tog gi lcug ma bzung la bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:264a-18: de nas khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgyas me tog gi lcug ma bzung la /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-19: aom badzra au da ka h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa slar yang /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-20: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-21: dri dho me bha ba dza:h'um bam ho: phat /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-22: ces bya ba'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:264a-23: de nas bum pa de bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi spyan sngar gzhag par bya zhing bum pa gnyis pa la yi ge h'um bzhi'i sngags bzla zhing 'jug pa'i sgor mngon par phyogs par bzhag ste /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-24: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dus su khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-25: bdag dang slob ma des dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:264a-26: khro bo rdo rje ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-29: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i bum pa dbul zhing bum pa gang ba yang rang gi rig pas dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:264a-30: de nas me tog gi shing brgya'am /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-31: ma rnyed na rnam pa bzhi dbul ba bya zhing /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-32: mchod pa rnam par lnga dang /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-33: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod cing /
T02TD2510.1E:264a-34: mchod pa rnam pa brgyad kyis yang mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:264b-0: de ltar dkyil 'khor mchod nas gos sngon po la khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags lan gsum @264b bzlas pa'i bdag nyid la stong g-yogs dang smad g-yogs byas te /
T02TD2510.1E:264b-1: gtsug tong dang gdong g-yogs bcings la /
T02TD2510.1E:264b-2: sngags de nyid dang sgo rnam pa bzhi'i sngags yongs su bzlas pas gdong g-yogs bcings la /
T02TD2510.1E:264b-3: phyag bzhi sngon du 'gro bas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa'i chog rjes su spyad nas sdom pa gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:264b-4: de nas phi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid la dbang bskur ba byas te /
T02TD2510.1E:264b-5: bdag nyid la mchod pa bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:264b-6: lag na me tog thogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:264b-7: khro bo ti'i nti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:264b-9: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba blangs te /
T02TD2510.1E:264b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i dbang du mchis te /
T02TD2510.1E:264b-11: tshar gcad par rigs pa rnams ni tshang gcad do //
T02TD2510.1E:264b-12: rjes su gzung bar rigs pa rnams ni rjes su bzung nas de ji ltar bsgrub bar bgyi /
T02TD2510.1E:264b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal du gsol du gsol zhes brjod do //
T02TD2510.1E:264b-14: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs la bdag nyid la dbab par bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:264b-15: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis g-yas pa'i rdo rje sems ma dral zhing yi ge aa: zhes brjod do //
T02TD2510.1E:264b-16: de nas phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor la /
T02TD2510.1E:264b-17: de nas phreng ba de blangs te rang gi spyi bor bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:264b-18: de nas gdong g-yogs bkrol la /
T02TD2510.1E:264b-19: snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor bltas te /
T02TD2510.1E:264b-20: dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:264b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:264b-23: rdo rje khro bo ti r'i nti ri'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:264b-24: yang dang dbyangs kyi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:264b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang /
T02TD2510.1E:264b-27: rdo rje dang bdag po dang ming gi dbang bskur ba'ang blang bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:264b-28: rdo rje thal mo bskor bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te /
T02TD2510.1E:264b-29: me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba blangs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:264b-30: bcom ldan 'das slob dpon du gyur pas chag rgyas pa thams cad rim pa bzhin du bdag la mdzad par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:264b-32: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje bzung //
T02TD2510.1E:264b-33: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02TD2510.1E:264b-34: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
T02TD2510.1E:264b-35: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas //
T02TD2510.1E:265a-0: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul @265a * //
T02TD2510.1E:265a-2: me tog dang sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pas phad ga nyid la yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.1E:265a-3: bcom ldan 'das la h'um bzhi zhes bya ba'i sngags blang ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:265a-4: phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes dang /
T02TD2510.1E:265a-5: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na khro bo'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar gyi rjes su gnang ba blang ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:265a-6: de nas gzengs bstod pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:265a-7: dbugs dbyung ba blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:265a-8: de nas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:265a-9: ji ltar 'dod pa'i bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:265a-10: rdo rje h'um mdzad ni bdag yin no zhes brjod nas /
T02TD2510.1E:265a-11: slar yang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:265a-12: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas de nyid du /
T02TD2510.1E:265a-13: aom badzra dzva la aa gha pra d'ipta /
T02TD2510.1E:265a-15: sarba ta th'a ga tam ma h'a badzra sa ma ya h'um dza aa zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:265a-16: de nas badzro& ham zhes bya bas rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:265a-17: de nyid badzra dh'a du ra ham zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad bsgom par bya ba nas /
T02TD2510.1E:265a-18: de bzhin du khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2510.1E:265a-19: aom badzra a'a be sha ma h'a kro dha a'a be sha sarba sa ma ya h'um aa: aa: zhes bya bas khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje dril bu'i gzugs su bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:265a-20: de nas dril bu de rdo rje dril bu bdag yin no zhes bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:265a-22: badzra a'a be sha kro dha ham zhes bya bas khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i gzugs su bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:265a-23: de ltar na dkyil 'khor rdo rje sgrub par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:265a-25: rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi //
T02TD2510.1E:265a-26: rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:265a-27: se gol mang po brdab bgyis pas /
T02TD2510.1E:265a-28: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi //
T02TD2510.1E:265a-29: aom badzra sa ma dza:dza:h'um bam ho: zhes bya bas /
T02TD2510.1E:265a-30: de myur du rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing //
T02TD2510.1E:265a-31: rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje che //
T02TD2510.1E:265a-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:265a-33: ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
T02TD2510.1E:265a-34: lan cig bar du brjod par bgyi //
T02TD2510.1E:265a-35: de nas khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:265a-36: rdo rje zhags pas gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:265a-37: rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcing ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:265a-38: khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas dbang du byas te /
T02TD2510.1E:265a-39: khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi las kyi phyag rgyas bskrad pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:265a-40: rab dang dra ba yang byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:265b-0: rdo rje @265b khu tshur gyi las kyi phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bcings la /
T02TD2510.1E:265b-1: khro bo rdo rje srung ba la sogs pa yang dag par bsrung te /
T02TD2510.1E:265b-2: yi ge h'um bzhis dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la mchod yon phul nas /
T02TD2510.1E:265b-3: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.1E:265b-4: phyi'i rdo rje rigs kyi mthar thug pa rnams phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab la /
T02TD2510.1E:265b-5: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:265b-6: de la rdo rje dbyings su bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.1E:265b-7: byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po pa rnams dang /
T02TD2510.1E:265b-8: phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs rnams dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:265b-9: dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa rdo rje'i rigs chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi sku lnga'i phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2510.1E:265b-10: rdo rje ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:265b-11: yang phyag bzhi byas la mchod yon phul nas /
T02TD2510.1E:265b-13: dkyil 'khor pa'i lha thams cad la mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod do //
T02TD2510.1E:265b-14: de nas bdag nyid chen po yis //
T02TD2510.1E:265b-15: gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:265b-16: sangs rgyas dngos grub thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD2510.1E:265b-17: sems can don kun gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2510.1E:265b-19: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la /
T02TD2510.1E:265b-21: sbyin sreg gi cho gas sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:265b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag gis shig ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:265b-23: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis /
T02TD2510.1E:265b-24: rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches //
T02TD2510.1E:265b-25: sems can kun la sman slad du //
T02TD2510.1E:265b-26: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD2510.1E:265b-27: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'jug pa la snod du gyur pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:265b-28: ma gyur pa 'dir brtag mi 'tshal lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bshad zin pa de nyid 'dir brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:265b-29: de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02TD2510.1E:265b-30: slob ma rnams gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:265b-31: rdo rje dang dril bu bzung la gos sngon po'i stod g-yogs dang /
T02TD2510.1E:265b-33: ze'u dag bcing ba de bzhin du slob ma la ji skad bshad pa bzhin du gos sngon po'i stod g-yogs dang /
T02TD2510.1E:265b-36: ji skad bshad pa bzhin du phyag bya ba'i cho ga rnam pa bzhi bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-0: snga ma bzhin du sdom pa gzung ba don du gnyer bas @266a * //
T02TD2510.1E:266a-2: aom sarbba yo ga tsitta autp'a da y'a mi zhes bya bas slob ma rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-3: lag pa g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis de'i snying ga'i phyogs su rdo rje bzhag pas /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-4: de'i snying la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bskyed par bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-5: su ra te sam ya stvam ho /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-6: badzra siddhi ya th'a su kham zhes brjod do //
T02TD2510.1E:266a-7: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-8: me tog la sogs pas mchod de /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-9: me tog gi phreng ba btags la /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-10: gdong dri zhim par byas te /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-11: phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-12: de nas slob dpon bdag nyid khro bo ti r'i nta ri'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-13: slob ma yang 'ching du bcug la /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-14: aom badzra gri hna badzra sa ma ya h'um bam zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis 'ching du gzhug go //
T02TD2510.1E:266a-15: de nas slob ma las yon gyi mchog blangs la /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-16: de nas phyag rgya de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug ste /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-17: aom badzra sa ma ya pra be sha ya mi zhes bya ba'i snying bo 'di dang /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-18: rdo rje shugs kyis slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:266a-19: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-20: shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dgug par bya zhing /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-21: de nas lho phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du bcug cing rdo rje zhags pas gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-22: de nas nub phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du bcug la rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcing ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-23: yang byang phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du bcug la /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-24: khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas dbang du bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:266a-25: yang shar phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du bcug la /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-26: de nas deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs su zhugs kyi ngas khyod la rdo rje'i ye shes bskyed par byas kyi ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyang thob na /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-27: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-28: de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par byas kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar ma byed cig / khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re ;
T02TD2510.1E:266a-29: de nas slob dpon rang nyid kyis khro bo ti ri'i nta'i ri'i phyag rgya kha thur du bltas pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-30: gyen du bltas pa bcings la /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-31: slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:266a-32: 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje dam tshig yin gyis /
T02TD2510.1E:266a-33: gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-0: de nas dam tshig @266b gi phyag rgya de nyid dang /
T02TD2510.1E:266b-1: mna'i snying po 'di lan cig bzlas pa'i chu slob ma de nyid 'thung du bcug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-2: de la mna'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:266b-3: rdo rje sems dpa' der khyod kyi //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-4: snying la yang dag zhugs par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-5: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-6: de ma thag tu dral nas gshegs ;
T02TD2510.1E:266b-7: / aom badzra au da ka tha:/
T02TD2510.1E:266b-8: de nas slob ma la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:266b-10: khyod kyis phyag na rdo rje ni nga yin gyi ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-11: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig / khyod yang ba ma spang bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:266b-12: sems can dmyal bar lhung bar gyur ta re zhes brjod do //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la /
T02TD2510.1E:266b-14: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par gyur cig ces smros shig ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-15: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du khro bo ti r'i nti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:266b-16: 'di skad ces brjod du gzhug go //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-17: 'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig ste //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-18: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-19: rdo rje ye shes bla med ni //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-20: de ring nyid du 'bab par shog / aom badzra a'a be sha aa: zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:266b-21: yang g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis g-yas pa'i sems rdo rje ma dral zhing h'um aa:aa:aa: zhes bya ba 'a na brgya'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-22: yang dril bu dang bcas pas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2510.1E:266b-23: g-yon pas de'i rkang pa g-yas pa mnan nas /
T02TD2510.1E:266b-24: sum badzra a'a be sha ya h'um sum zhes dbab par bya zhing /
T02TD2510.1E:266b-25: de nas de'i lus la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad gzhug bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-26: de nas de'i lus la lha'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-27: de nas phreng ba de pra t'i tstsha dza ho: zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor chen por dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-28: de nas phreng ba de aom bra ti grihna sva mi m'am satva ma h'a ba la zhes bya ba'i snying pos de'i mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-30: aom sems dpa'i rdo rje deng khyod kyi //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-31: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-32: rdo rje mig ni bla med pa //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-33: de ring nyid ni 'byed par shog //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-34: ces bya ba 'dis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-35: de nas he badzra pa shya zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor chen po bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:266b-36: yang khro bo ti ri'nti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:266b-37: tshhthi badzra dri dho me bha ba /
T02TD2510.1E:266b-38: sh'a sho tva me bha ba /
T02TD2510.1E:267a-2: aa dhi ti shtha sarba siddhim me pra yatstsha h'um ha ha ha ha ho: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis /
T02TD2510.1E:267a-3: de nas de'i snying gar dgrol du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:267a-4: de nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor las khru do'i tshad tsam dor la shar gyi phyogs su dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad tsam gru bzhi ba nub tu sgo btod pa dkyil 'khor gyi sgo la phyogs pa /
T02TD2510.1E:267a-5: chen sna lnga sa dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:267a-6: de'i dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02TD2510.1E:267a-7: de'i steng du rdo rje tse lnga ba 'bar ba bris la /
T02TD2510.1E:267a-8: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:267a-9: de'i dbus su glang po'i gdan gyi steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02TD2510.1E:267a-12: dar gyis g-yogs nas gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:267a-13: glang po che'i gdan gyi steng du bla re bres pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:267a-14: g-yas phyogs su kha dog lnga pa me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i gdan dang /
T02TD2510.1E:267a-15: gdugs dkar po rin po che'i tog can /
T02TD2510.1E:267a-16: g-yon du kha dog sna tshogs pa'i ba dan bzhag la /
T02TD2510.1E:267a-17: glang po che'i gdan la khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
T02TD2510.1E:267a-19: bla re dang ba dan la yi ge aom bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:267a-20: de nas slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa /
T02TD2510.1E:267a-21: rdo rje h'um mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2510.1E:267a-22: de'i lus la khro bo rdo rje h'um mdzad nas /
T02TD2510.1E:267a-23: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar du gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dam tshig gi phyag rgya bkod la slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang lus la bkod nas /
T02TD2510.1E:267a-24: de glang po'i gdan la g-yon brkyang bas bzhag ste /
T02TD2510.1E:267a-26: me tog la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod la /
T02TD2510.1E:267a-29: zangs dung la sogs pa rnams rol mo'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs nas glu la sogs pa blang zhing brdung bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:267a-30: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.1E:267a-31: de nas bum pa gang ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:267a-32: aom badzra am ku sha ma h'a kro dha a'a kasha ya sarbba sa ma ya h'um dza:/
T02TD2510.1E:267a-33: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2510.1E:267a-34: aom badzra dzva la aagne pra d'i pta a'a karsha ya sarbba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a badzra sa ma ya h'um dza:/
T02TD2510.1E:267a-35: aom badzra aa bhi shihtsa zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:267a-36: de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las /
T02TD2510.1E:267a-37: rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu blangs la dbang bskur zhing 'thung du gzhug pa'i phyir yang sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-0: aom badzra aa dhi ba ti stvam aa bhi shinytsa mi dri tho me bha ba dza: @267b dza: h'um bam ho: aom h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:267b-1: aom badzra aa bhi shinyts'a mi zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba 'dis chu'i dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-3: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-4: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-5: dam tshig bsrung na dngos grub ni //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-6: rdo rje bdud rtsi chus 'grub bo //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-7: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams /
T02TD2510.1E:267b-8: gang zhig dkyil 'khor ma mthong gnas //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-9: gang tshe skye bo 'dus ma smra //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-10: dam tshig med bas dgod par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-12: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:267b-13: rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya'i dbang gis dbang bskur bar gyur te /
T02TD2510.1E:267b-14: sangs rgyas lnga'i dbang bskur bar blta bar bya'o /
T02TD2510.1E:267b-15: rdo rje ti r'i nti ri bcings nas /
T02TD2510.1E:267b-17: phyogs bzhir de'i dbang bskur ba'i tshul du byas te /
T02TD2510.1E:267b-19: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'a rka h'um zhes bya ba 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-20: de nas lag pa gnyis kyis dar dpyangs bcings ba'i tshul du byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:267b-21: badzra tu shya ho zhes bya ba 'dis mthar mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-22: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lnga'i rin po che'i cod pan rdo rje phreng ba dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:267b-23: dar dpyangs bcings pa sngon du 'gro ba'i dbang bskur bas /
T02TD2510.1E:267b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lnga dang rigs rnams dang /
T02TD2510.1E:267b-25: rdo rje nyi ma me dang /
T02TD2510.1E:267b-26: rdo rje rin chen yang cod pan la bzlas shing dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-27: de la rdo rje ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:267b-28: rdo rje bsdams pa dam bcings la //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-29: yid kyis khros nas dbab bya ba'i //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-30: rdo rje mthe bong dam po ste //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-31: rdo rje ti r'inta rir bshad //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-32: de nas rdo rje 'bar ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:267b-34: ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-35: yi ge h'um las rdo rje 'bar ba de rdo rje h'um mdzad du bskyed la /
T02TD2510.1E:267b-36: rtag tu chags pas 'dul byed pa //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-37: rdo rje khro bo sems dpa' ste //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-38: gang gis rdo rje nyi ma mes //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-39: 'jig par byed pa dam pa yin //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-40: zhes bya ba dang de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-41: yi ge a'a: las dril bu khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i lha mor bskyed la /
T02TD2510.1E:267b-42: chos gsung ba'i bdag po yin no zhes brjod cing de la /
T02TD2510.1E:267b-43: 'di ni rdo rje chos yin te //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-44: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-45: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
T02TD2510.1E:267b-46: nam mkha' mnyam par sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-1: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyas phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab bo //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-2: de la dam tshig ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:268a-3: thams cad nam mkha'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-4: thams cad nam mkha' zhes su brjod //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-5: rdo rje'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pas //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-6: khams gsum pa yang bza' bar bya //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-7: de nas yang de la me tog ma dang /
T02TD2510.1E:268a-8: sgeg mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.1E:268a-9: yi ge pras byin gyis brlabs pa'i rin po che'i mig thur byin la /
T02TD2510.1E:268a-10: aom badzra ni tra aa pa ha ram pa tra lam hr'i: zhes ba rjod cing /
T02TD2510.1E:268a-11: des mig sman byugs pa bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:268a-12: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-13: 'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-14: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-15: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-17: de nas las thams cad pa rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i me long byin la /
T02TD2510.1E:268a-18: chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:268a-19: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-20: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-21: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-22: rgyu dang las las kun du byung //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-23: ngo bo nyid med gnas med pa //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-24: de ltar chos ni shes byas nas //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-25: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-26: 'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-27: de nas yi ge ho: sa byin gyis brlabs pa'i mda' gzhu byin la//
T02TD2510.1E:268a-28: 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyis shig ces brjod de /
T02TD2510.1E:268a-29: yi ge ho:sa phyogs bzhi steng dang 'og tu mda' 'phen du gzhug par bya'o //
