T02TD2510.1E:268a-30: yang aa badzra satva zhes me long la bzlas la /
T02TD2510.1E:268a-31: de bzhin du sngags brjod cing me long byin la 'di skad brjod do //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-32: rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-33: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-34: sangs rgyas kun bdag rang bzhin ni //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-35: bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-36: gang 'di di bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po byang chub kyi sems 'di yin no zhes shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-37: badzra he tu mam zhes bya bas 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2510.1E:268a-38: rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du bzhag ste /
T02TD2510.1E:268a-39: badzra bha sha tam zhes bya bas dung byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2510.1E:268a-40: de'i lag par byin la 'di skad ces brjod de /
T02TD2510.1E:268a-41: deng nas brtsam te byang chub sems bskyed pa dang bcas pas chos kyi 'khor lo skor cig //
T02TD2510.1E:268a-42: chos kyi dung ni bla med pas //
T02TD2510.1E:268b-0: ma lus kun du gang @268b bar gyis //
T02TD2510.1E:268b-1: som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing //
T02TD2510.1E:268b-2: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su //
T02TD2510.1E:268b-3: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog /
T02TD2510.1E:268b-5: de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas la //
T02TD2510.1E:268b-6: phan thogs drin du gzo zhes bya //
T02TD2510.1E:268b-7: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang //
T02TD2510.1E:268b-8: khyod la kun du srung bar byed ;
T02TD2510.1E:268b-10: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nga rgyal gyis /
T02TD2510.1E:268b-11: 'jig rten kun la thams cad du //
T02TD2510.1E:268b-12: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2510.1E:268b-14: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2510.1E:268b-15: rjes su gnang ba'i khyad par ni /
T02TD2510.1E:268b-16: rdo rje mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing te /
T02TD2510.1E:268b-17: 'jig rten kun la thams cad du //
T02TD2510.1E:268b-18: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2510.1E:268b-20: khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2510.1E:268b-21: zhes bya bas khro bo'i rjes su gnang ba byin nas /
T02TD2510.1E:268b-25: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig / sdig las lhag pa gzhan med do //
T02TD2510.1E:268b-26: zhes gsang ba'i ye shes bslab pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:268b-27: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sngags byin la /
T02TD2510.1E:268b-28: de'i phyag rgya bzhir ye shes man'i snying po byin nas bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:268b-29: de nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs la sogs pa slob ma'i thun mong gi cho ga rgyas pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:268b-30: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa nyid kyis shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:268b-31: slob mas dbang bskur ba thob nas /
T02TD2510.1E:268b-32: slob dpon la 'dud cing phyag bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:268b-33: yon gyi mchog phul nas sngags blangs te /
T02TD2510.1E:268b-34: 'byor pa dang ldan pas rgyun mi 'chad par yon dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:268b-35: rdo rje thal mo bskor nas slob dpon la 'dud cing phyag byas te /
T02TD2510.1E:268b-36: des me tog kyang gzung bar bya'o// slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgya pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:268b-37: de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2510.1E:268b-38: slob ma 'jug pa'i chos rgyas par bstan nas /
T02TD2510.1E:268b-39: da ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:268b-40: de nas ye shes rnams bskyed de //
T02TD2510.1E:268b-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.1E:268b-42: rdo rje dbyings ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:269a-0: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor @269a * //
T02TD2510.1E:269a-2: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la yi ge h'um las rdo rje lnga pa 'bar ba bsam la /
T02TD2510.1E:269a-3: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi bdag nyid ji srid du snying gar rdo rje 'bar ba zla ba gnyis kyi bar du bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.1E:269a-4: de nas de las nam mkha'i khams gang bar bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.1E:269a-5: skyo bar gyur na yang bsdu bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:269a-6: rang gi lus la bcug la /
T02TD2510.1E:269a-7: badzra dhi ti shtha zhes bya ba brjod nas ldang bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:269a-8: de ltar ji srid du zla ba drug gi bar de srid du bsgoms nas /
T02TD2510.1E:269a-9: de nas mtshan thog thag nam mkha'i khams gang bar bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.1E:269a-10: de nas 'gro ba thams cad rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dbab pa phab pas rdo rje h'um mdzad du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:269a-11: dpral bar rdo rje rin chen yang //
T02TD2510.1E:269a-12: de bzhin du ni bsam byas nas //
T02TD2510.1E:269a-13: zhes bya ba ni rin chen h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor du byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:269a-14: dpral ba'i phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od can gyi rdo rje rin chen de bzhin du bsams nas /
T02TD2510.1E:269a-15: snga ma bzhin du dpral ba'i rdo rje rin chen h'um mdzad du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:269a-16: mthar mtshan thog thag byas pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:269a-17: de nas des nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang mnyam par song bas sems can gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa la sogs pa'i rin chen h'um mdzad du bskyed pas dbang du byed do //
T02TD2510.1E:269a-18: rdo rje padmo mgul du bsam //
T02TD2510.1E:269a-20: chos kyi h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:269a-21: yi ge hri sa rang gi lkog ma'i phyogs su rdo rje padma'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa bskyed nas de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:269a-22: de nas mtshan thog thag de bzhin du byas pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:269a-23: de nas sems can gyi khams thams cad chos kyi h'um mdzad du byas pa'i lta bas bltas pas rlag par byed do //
T02TD2510.1E:269a-24: rdo rje thams cad spyi bor gzhag / ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:269a-25: las kyi h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:269a-26: rang gi mgo bor yi ge aa las sna tshogs rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba 'khrugs par bskyed de /
T02TD2510.1E:269a-27: zla ba gnyis kyi bar du bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.1E:269a-28: de nas spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba zla ba gcig byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:269a-29: de nas mtshan thog thag bsgoms pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:269b-0: des sems can gyis khams thams cad las kyi h'um mdzad du byas pas gnod pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad @269b las bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:269b-2: rdo rje lcags kyu bris nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:269b-4: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i cho gas rang nyid rdo rje khro bo'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:269b-5: lag pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mo la yi ge h'um las lcags kyu bsams te /
T02TD2510.1E:269b-6: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2510.1E:269b-7: sngags kyis bskul zhing zla ba gnyis bsgoms nas /
T02TD2510.1E:269b-8: spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig rdo rje lcags kyu bsgom mo //
T02TD2510.1E:269b-9: de nas mtshan thog thag de bzhin du byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:269b-10: des sor mo de bskul zhing 'gugs pa'i bsam pas lha thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:269b-11: rang gi rkang mthil dbus su ni //
T02TD2510.1E:269b-12: rdo rje lcags kyu bris nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:269b-14: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la gzugs brnyan mnan na /
T02TD2510.1E:269b-15: lha thams cad nges par 'gugs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:269b-16: rdo rje lcags kyu nyid phyag rgya //
T02TD2510.1E:269b-17: legs par phye ste bzhag nas su //
T02TD2510.1E:269b-18: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:269b-20: mtshan thog thag bsgoms pa des /
T02TD2510.1E:269b-21: au ma la sogs pa'i bud med rnams bkug pa'i nang nas /
T02TD2510.1E:269b-22: gcig chung mar bsgrubs na 'dod pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:269b-23: lcags kyus bkug la yid kyis nang du bcug na rang nyid brtan par 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.1E:269b-24: des bud med rnams bkug par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:269b-25: rdo rje lcags kyu gzhag pa ni //
T02TD2510.1E:269b-26: mjug do nyid du de bzhin te //
T02TD2510.1E:269b-28: gsang ba'i gnas kyi mjug do ni sna logs so //
T02TD2510.1E:269b-29: de la yi ge h'um las lcags kyu bskyed la /
T02TD2510.1E:269b-30: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.1E:269b-31: mtshan thog thag bzlas shing bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:269b-32: de nas lha'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:269b-33: gzugs brnyan de la mnan te /
T02TD2510.1E:269b-34: bzlas shing bsgrub pa byas na /
T02TD2510.1E:269b-35: lha de 'ongs nas bka' bzhin du byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:269b-36: de nas phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslabs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lus dang /
T02TD2510.1E:269b-38: lta ba dang yin gyi dbye ba'i phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02TD2510.1E:269b-39: de'i ye shes bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:269b-40: g-yon brkyang bar ni gnas nas su //
T02TD2510.1E:269b-42: g-yon brkyang ba'i mtshan nyid ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2510.1E:269b-44: rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul gyis te//
T02TD2510.1E:270a-0: @270a * // zhes bya ba ni sems brtan por 'grub par gyur nas /
T02TD2510.1E:270a-1: phyis thams cad rdo rje khro bo'i bdag nyid bsams pas 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:270a-3: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor byas nas sgu phyag rgya'i snying po bzlas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:270a-4: zla ba gnyis rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi bdag nyid du bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.1E:270a-5: de nas spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rnal 'byor zla ba gcig tu byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:270a-6: de'i mthar mtshan thog thag bsgom pa byas na /
T02TD2510.1E:270a-8: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sku'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i yid kyis rang gi lus las byung la /
T02TD2510.1E:270a-9: bsgrub par bye ba'i lus bkang la //
T02TD2510.1E:270a-10: khro bo rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
T02TD2510.1E:270a-13: rdo rje ngag ni legs par smra //
T02TD2510.1E:270a-15: rdo rje ngag gis rdo rje dbyangs su brjod pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:270a-16: rdo rje ngag ni mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2510.1E:270a-17: des brjod pa dang bzlas pa phyin ci ma log pa ni legs pa'o ;
T02TD2510.1E:270a-18: / h'um zhes bya ba bzhi ldan pa //
T02TD2510.1E:270a-19: sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po yis //
T02TD2510.1E:270a-20: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi'o //
T02TD2510.1E:270a-21: rdo rje h'um mdzad ming du byas pa'i snying por bshad pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje ngag tu brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:270a-23: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor byas nas zla ba gsum du ngag gis phyag rgya'i snying po bzlas te /
T02TD2510.1E:270a-24: mtshan thog thag tu bsgom pa byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:270a-25: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sku zhal bzhi pa /
T02TD2510.1E:270a-27: phyag na lcags kyu dang zhags pa la sogs pa bsnams pa rang gi zhal bzhi las sprul la /
T02TD2510.1E:270a-28: h'um bzhi brjod cing bsgrub par bya ba drangs na /
T02TD2510.1E:270a-29: rang gi dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:270a-30: rdo rje khro bo'i lha mchog gis //
T02TD2510.1E:270a-32: bzhin 'gyur ba'i khro gnyer bcums nas khro bo'i lta stangs bzhis bltas pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:270a-33: rdo rje khro bo lha mchog ste //
T02TD2510.1E:270a-34: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor bar thams cad gsod par byed do //
T02TD2510.1E:270a-36: rang nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du byas la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi ye shes sems dpa' dang gcig tu gyur par bsgom nas /
T02TD2510.1E:270a-37: yi ge h'um las mig tu rdo rje 'bar ba gnyis bskyed la /
T02TD2510.1E:270a-38: lta ba'i phyag rgya'i snying po bzlas te /
T02TD2510.1E:270b-0: @270b bsu ba yang byas pa gcig bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.1E:270b-1: de'i mtshan thog thag bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:270b-2: de nas rang gi mig las byung ba'i rdo rje de bsgrub par byas ba'i lus la rdo rje h'um mdzad shugs par bsgoms na thal bar byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:270b-3: yid kyis ni yid kyi chos kyi bdag gam pha rol po rnams kyi lus la go cha bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:270b-5: cho ga chen po'i sbyor bas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:270b-7: rang ngam gzhan la go cha bskon nas /
T02TD2510.1E:270b-8: aom ma no dri dho me zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:270b-9: bdag gam gzhan la rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya bskyed pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:270b-10: sems kyi chos yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:270b-11: sbyor ba 'di yang snga ma bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:270b-12: de nas sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:270b-13: sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:270b-14: rdo rje h'um mdzad du gyur pa'i ye shes ni /
T02TD2510.1E:270b-15: gzugs brnyan byas la de dang bsgrub par bya ba de lhan cig tu gyur par mos pa ni phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:270b-16: des nges pa'i ye shes de bslab pa ni bstan pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:270b-17: rdo rje khro bo mnyam bzhag nas //
T02TD2510.1E:270b-19: bdag nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.1E:270b-20: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mdzad de rang gi lus la dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:270b-24: de dang lhan cig tu gyur par mos pa ni rdo rje khro bo mnyam par gzhag pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:270b-25: gang dag gang la kun du zhugs pa ni rang gi lha'i gzugs brnyan gyis sems can gang dang la bskyed pas 'grub par 'gyur te snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.1E:270b-26: rdo rje h'um zhes bzlas pa yis //
T02TD2510.1E:270b-28: aom sum bha ni sum bha h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ge h'um bzhis bzlas pa dang ldan pa ni phyag rgyar 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.1E:270b-29: rdo rje mdzad kyi gzugs brnyan gyis rdo rje h'um mdzad du byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:270b-31: rdo rje sbyor ba 'di dang ni //
T02TD2510.1E:270b-32: rdo rje rnal 'byor phyag rgya yis //
T02TD2510.1E:270b-33: sems can gang la yongs su chags //
T02TD2510.1E:270b-34: de yi nyon mongs rnam par nyams //
T02TD2510.1E:270b-36: sgra chen dung ni brjod bya ba //
T02TD2510.1E:270b-37: ta kki h'um phat khros nas su //
T02TD2510.1E:270b-39: yang dag par brjod par bya bas na brjod par bya ba ste /
T02TD2510.1E:270b-40: gsal bar brjod ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-0: de ji ltar brjod ce na @271a * //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-1: sgra chen dung zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:271a-2: khro bo'i ngag gis gang la rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pas 'gugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-3: rdo rje 'bar bas de mngon bkug / rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gcig / ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:271a-4: bcom ldan 'das khro bo 'dod pas mngon sum du bkug ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-5: 'ching bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-7: bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i rgyal pos bkug nas /
T02TD2510.1E:271a-8: rnal 'byor pa rang gi lus la sogs pa rnams la 'dir 'jug par 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.1E:271a-9: des na bcug pa des de'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-11: sgra chen du nga ni brjod bya ba //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-12: takki h'um phat lan cig brjod //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-13: gang yin de la bcug ba ni //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-14: kun nas nyon nongs zhi zhing g-yo //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-16: rdo rje lta bas bltas pa ni //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-18: rdo rje lta ba'i mtshan nyid ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-19: de yis bltas pa ni gzigs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-20: rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-22: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-23: sems can gang dang gang yin pa //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-25: bsgrub par bya ba'i lus su blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-28: sems can de dang de la rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD2510.1E:271a-29: log bar lta ba'i lam dang bral nas /
T02TD2510.1E:271a-30: bltas pas 'chi bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:271a-31: nyams zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-33: bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i sku'i gzugs brnyan du bskyed nas /
T02TD2510.1E:271a-34: bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la 'dod pa'i rgyal po bkug ste bcug nas /
T02TD2510.1E:271a-35: rnal 'byor pas rdo rje lta bas bltas pa'i bsgrub par bya ba de dang des byin gyis brlabs pa 'grub bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-36: des 'di'i sdug bsngal zhi bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.1E:271a-37: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ye shes skye ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-39: sems can gang gi rgyud la yang //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-40: rdo rje lta bas bltas na ni //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-41: rdo rje rnal 'byor spyan chen pos //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-42: de yi sdug bsngal nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-44: bsod snyoms yid la bsams nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:271a-45: snying la rdo rje bsgom par bya //
T02TD2510.1E:271b-0: rang gis khro bo de nyid kyi ring nge 'dzin gyis gdon la sogs pa bskyed pa de'i sdug bsngal yid la @271b bsams nas /
T02TD2510.1E:271b-1: gdon la sogs pa de bsad pa dang gzhom par bya'o zhes sems bskyed de /
T02TD2510.1E:271b-2: snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba bsgreng ba bsgom pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:271b-3: gang gi snying gar zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:271b-4: bsgrub par bya ba mngon par 'dod pa de dag mdun na gnas pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:271b-6: lus dang ngag rdo rje lta bas rgyas btab nas /
T02TD2510.1E:271b-7: bsgrub par bya ba gzhan dag thams cad yid kyis mdun na bzhag la /
T02TD2510.1E:271b-8: gdon la sogs pa de dag gis bar du gcod pa'i skyon rdo rje thal bar byas par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:271b-9: de'i snying gar bsrung ba'i don du ji skad bshad pa'i rdo rje bsgoms pa des de'i sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi nas /
T02TD2510.1E:271b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi gdul byar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:271b-12: yid kyis gsod par bsams nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:271b-13: snying gar rdo rje sgom par byed //
T02TD2510.1E:271b-14: yi ge h'um ni gyur pa las //
T02TD2510.1E:271b-15: nye ba'i sems can gang yin pa //
T02TD2510.1E:271b-16: de la phyag rgya brjod pa yis //
T02TD2510.1E:271b-17: de yi 'jigs pa thams cad las //
T02TD2510.1E:271b-18: rdo rje takki'i phyag rgya yis //
T02TD2510.1E:271b-21: sems can gang la gang dag gis //
T02TD2510.1E:271b-24: gang gis lus dang dag dar lta ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:271b-25: yid kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lus la /
T02TD2510.1E:271b-26: yid kyis rgyas 'debs pa 'dis ni rnal 'byor pas shin tu bsgoms pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:271b-27: phyag rgya 'di ni ji skad bshad pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bo rnams so //
T02TD2510.1E:271b-28: shin tu'i don ni khyad par du gyur pa dang myur ba nyid do //
T02TD2510.1E:271b-29: las rnams thams cad ji skad du gsungs pa'i phyag rgya bzhis bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:271b-30: las 'di rnams ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:271b-31: phyag rgya re res kyang las bzhi rnams la phyag rgya'i snying po bzhi sbyar ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:271b-33: gang gi tshe yid kyi phyag rgyas pha rol gyi gdug pa 'joms shing bsrung bar bya bar 'dod pa de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.1E:271b-34: de dang 'brel pa'i las 'grub par 'gyur ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:271b-35: ji skad bshad pa'i snying po bsgom zhing bzlas pas so //
T02TD2510.1E:271b-36: de bzhin du gang gi tshe lta ba dang dag dang lus kyi phyag rgya'i las bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.1E:271b-37: de dang 'brel pa'i las sgrub par byed pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:272a-0: ji skad du bshad pa'i phyag rgya bsgoms @272a * //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-2: snying po bzhi bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-3: phyag rgya 'di rnams kyi las byed par 'dod bas na /
T02TD2510.1E:272a-4: rnal 'byor pas zla ba gcig gam /
T02TD2510.1E:272a-6: lo gcig tu rang gi khro bo'i rnal 'byor gyis ji skad gsungs pa'i snying po bzhi bzlas shing bsgom par byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:272a-7: mthar mtshan thog thag bsgom par byas na las thams cad 'grub par byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-8: de nas gsang ba'i khro bo'i phyag rgya'i ye shes slob bo zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:272a-9: rnal 'byor ba'i bsgoms pa'i stobs las byung ba'i khro bo ni gsang ba'i khro bo'o //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-10: de nyid gzhan la rgyas 'debs pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:272a-11: gsang ba'i khro bo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-12: de'i ye shes bslab pa ni bstan pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-13: yan lag kun gyis 'khyud nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-15: yid kyis de la rjes su zhugs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:272a-16: yan lag gi cha shas thams cad bkang ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-17: h'um zhes gang la sbyar bya ba //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-19: yi ge h'um brjod cing ngo //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-20: dbang po gnyis ni sprad gyur la //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-22: lha dang sgrub pa po'i dbang po gnyis ni dbang po gnyis te /
T02TD2510.1E:272a-24: dbang po gnyis sprad ba ni dbang po gnyis sprad pa ste /
T02TD2510.1E:272a-25: ye shes sems dpa' dang gcig tu gyur par mos par bya zhes bya ba'i don to ;
T02TD2510.1E:272a-26: / de yi srog ni ma rungs 'gyur //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-28: bsgrub par bya ba de'i sdug bsngal nges par bcom nas /
T02TD2510.1E:272a-29: bdag nyid lha mor gyur par mthong ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-31: dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-32: yang lag kun la yongs su 'khyud //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-33: gang zhig h'um ni sbyor byed pas ;
T02TD2510.1E:272a-34: / de yi sdug bsngal nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-35: rdo rje khro bo rab drag 'dzin //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-36: rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-37: de ni khro bo'i sku gang yin //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-38: gcig tu bdag ni gsang ba mtshungs //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-39: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'ang rung //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-40: bdag nyid dang ni mtshungs pa ru //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-41: lus ni yang dag sbyor bas na //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-42: dbang gnyis snyoms 'jug brjod par bya //
T02TD2510.1E:272a-46: sems can gzhan de'i lus gang yin pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:272b-0: bdag gi lus gang yin pa dang mtshungs pa'i shes pa gang yin pa 'di ni dbang po gnyis snyoms @272b par 'jug pa zhes bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:272b-1: yang na rnam par bsgom pa yis //
T02TD2510.1E:272b-2: ji skad bshad bzhin yan lag 'khyud //
T02TD2510.1E:272b-3: rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che //
T02TD2510.1E:272b-4: dpung pa dam por bsdam par bya //
T02TD2510.1E:272b-5: yan lag kun la yongs 'khyud pa sa //
T02TD2510.1E:272b-7: dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa /
T02TD2510.1E:272b-9: 'di dang mtshungs par bsgom pa ni //
T02TD2510.1E:272b-10: mtshungs pa nyid ni dbang po yin //
T02TD2510.1E:272b-12: h'um zhes bya bar ldan pa yis //
T02TD2510.1E:272b-13: mchu sprad sos ni mchu bzang nas //
T02TD2510.1E:272b-15: gang gis sems can 'gugs par 'dod pa'i yid kyis rang gi so yes mchu bzung nas mchu sprad par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:272b-16: sbyor ba gang gis she na /
T02TD2510.1E:272b-17: h'um zhes bya bar ldan pa yis //
T02TD2510.1E:272b-19: khro bo'i sbyor ba la dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa zhes so //
T02TD2510.1E:272b-20: de yis dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:272b-21: h'um mdzad kyi sbyor bas bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:272b-22: mchu sprad nas so yis mchu bzang bar bsgoms shing bzlas pa byas te /
T02TD2510.1E:272b-23: sgrub pa po'i gdong de la mngon du phyogs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
T02TD2510.1E:272b-24: mdun du 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir ro //
T02TD2510.1E:272b-26: dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i khro bo'i rnal 'byor byas nas gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa'i sems can mdun du gnas par bdag gis yid la bsams la /
T02TD2510.1E:272b-27: yid kyis sems can de la 'khyud pa'i sbyor bas mchu sprad nas /
T02TD2510.1E:272b-28: sos mchu bzang bas mchog tu yid bde ba dang dga' ba thob pas bkug nas bka' bsgos na rnal 'byor ma de'i dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:272b-29: h'um zhes sbyor ba gang yin pa //
T02TD2510.1E:272b-30: de ni bde ba myong bar 'gyur //
T02TD2510.1E:272b-32: khro bo gang yang rung ba zhig gi snyoms par 'jug pa byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:272b-33: yi ge h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags sbyar zhing yi ge ho:sa bde ba rjes su myong ba bskul nas /
T02TD2510.1E:272b-34: dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa 'dis bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de dbang du gyur nas /
T02TD2510.1E:272b-35: de ni sgrub pa po dang bral na sdug bsngal thob pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:272b-36: khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:273a-0: bcom ldan 'das khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal po ji skad bshad pa'i zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa'i gzugs can dang gcig tu gyur par @273a * //
T02TD2510.1E:273a-2: h'um ho: zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod pas sngar bshad pa'i 'jug pa'i sbyor bas bcug la /
T02TD2510.1E:273a-4: lhan cig tu gyur ba ra bdag gis bsams pas /
T02TD2510.1E:273a-5: bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la nye bar rjes su myong bar 'gyur zhing bsgrub par bya ba mchog tu bde ba dang yid bde ba thob pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:273a-6: sgrub pa po skad cig tsam yang yangs su mi spong ba gang yin pa des spang na sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:273a-7: h'um zhes bya bar gang sbyor zhing //
T02TD2510.1E:273a-9: yi ge h'um gis yan lag thams cad btsir bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:273a-10: rnal 'byor pas bsgrub par bya ba'i lus dang rang gi lha gcig tu gyur par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:273a-11: dbang po gnyis ni sprad nas kyang //
T02TD2510.1E:273a-12: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.1E:273a-13: bsgrub par bya ba de'i lus la thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:273a-15: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i khro bo gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:273a-16: bud med dam skyes pa'i lus kyi gsang ba'i gnas nas zhugs par yid kyis bsams la /
T02TD2510.1E:273a-17: de'i lus la zhugs nas mnyam par spros la /
T02TD2510.1E:273a-18: snga ma bzhin du zla ba gsum du bsgoms nas /
T02TD2510.1E:273a-19: gsang ba'i khro bo'i ye shes bsgrub pa des las rnams byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:273a-20: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dngos grub ni /
T02TD2510.1E:273a-21: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor ji lta ba bzhin du bskyed de bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:273a-22: sgrub pa po rnams 'bras bu la spro ba skyed par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:273a-23: de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam bar rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab pa'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:273a-24: de nas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2510.1E:273a-25: dngos grub kyi ye shes bslab pa bstan pa'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:273a-26: 'di rnam par rgyal bas na rgyal ba ste /
T02TD2510.1E:273a-27: 'jig rten gsum las rgyal bas na rgyal ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:273a-28: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba de'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni /
T02TD2510.1E:273b-0: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen @273b po'o ;
T02TD2510.1E:273b-1: / de'i dam tshig ni phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:273b-2: dam tshig dang chos dang las kyi phyag rgya rnams so //
T02TD2510.1E:273b-3: de nyid kun rdzob gyi bden pa'i ngo bos phyin ci log pas na /
T02TD2510.1E:273b-5: sems can gyi khams la rgyas 'debs pa des na /
T02TD2510.1E:273b-6: de kho na nyid kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:273b-7: der nges pa'i ye shes de bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:273b-8: rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2510.1E:273b-9: sangs rgyas rjes su dran byas na //
T02TD2510.1E:273b-11: aom tsatti pra ti be dham ka ro mi zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2510.1E:273b-12: aom ya th'a sarbba ta th'a ga tasta tha aa ham zhes bya ba'i bar du byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:273b-13: rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba gang yin pa des /
T02TD2510.1E:273b-14: sangs rgyas rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgoms pas rnam par snang mdzad bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:273b-15: rnal 'byor pa gang gis sems can la phan pa'i phan pa'i phyir bsgom pa byas pa de nyid kyis des ni sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:273b-16: dbang phyug dang ni au ma yang //
T02TD2510.1E:273b-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02TD2510.1E:273b-18: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bstan to //
T02TD2510.1E:273b-19: sa la bris te de ltar mnan //
T02TD2510.1E:273b-20: zhes bya ba ni ras sam /
T02TD2510.1E:273b-23: shing dam rdzas las blugs pa'i gzugs brnyan byas pa sa la bzhag ste /
T02TD2510.1E:273b-24: ji lta ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:273b-25: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:273b-26: khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal pos bkug pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:273b-28: tshe sbyin pa'i phyag rgyas gso ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:273b-29: khro bo'i zhabs kyis 'dren pas aom badzra aam ku sha ho zhes bya bas dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:273b-30: aom badzra aa bhi she h'um na ba tram trat ces bya bas gzir ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:273b-31: aom buddha mee tri badzra raksha ham zhes bya bas bab pa'i sdug bsngal ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:273b-32: aom badzra sa ma ya gri hna banbha sa ma ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyis khro bo ti r'inti ris bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:273b-34: rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che //
T02TD2510.1E:273b-35: sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD2510.1E:273b-37: rigs rnams myur du thal bar rlog / aom ha na sa ma ya h'um phat ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:273b-38: dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis pa bstan nas /
T02TD2510.1E:273b-39: lha la sogs pa dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:274a-0: rdo rje he ru ka'i phyag rgyas rang @274a * //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-1: gi chung ma dang bcas pa'i las la sbyar la /
T02TD2510.1E:274a-2: de bzhin du sngags kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-3: ji ltar bris pa'i go rims bzhin //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-5: de bzhin du zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-6: autpala cher sngo 'tshor ba'i mdog / rdo rje h'um zhes bya bar 'dus //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-7: mche ba cung zad phyung ba'i zhal //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-8: khro dang bcas pas 'dzum pa ste //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-9: g-yon brkyang tshul du gnas pa yi //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-11: g-yon pa'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis ni //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-12: dbang phyug chen po mnan par byas //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-13: g-yas pa'i zhabs kyis au ma yi //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-14: nu ma'i steng du gnas par ni //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-15: bri ba'i cho gar bstan pa'i mtshan nyid des bdag nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.1E:274a-17: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:274a-18: de'i rang bzhin du bdag nyid rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-19: de'i dngos grub gang zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2510.1E:274a-20: de ni 'jig rten gsum las rgyal //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-21: zhes bya ba smos pas 'bras bu bstan to //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-22: ji ltar ri mo bris pa bzhin //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-23: 'bar bas bskor ba'i dbus bzhugs pa //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-24: zhes bya ba ni khro rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar du bri ba'i cho ga bstan pa bzhin du bsgom par bya'o zhes bstan to //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-25: de la sku rdo rje ni ji skad bshad pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-26: gsung rdo rje ni khro bo'i ngag dang rang gi sngags zlos pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-27: thugs rdo rje ni rang gi snying ga'i zla bar 'bar ba'i rdo rjer mos pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-28: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bsdams nas sems dpa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:274a-29: khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-30: de ltar rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bri ba'i cho ga bstan zin to //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-31: sangs rgyas rjes su dran bsgrubs pas //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-32: myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob bo //
T02TD2510.1E:274a-33: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings nas gang gi tshe /
T02TD2510.1E:274a-34: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin du bsgoms nas 'grub pa de'i tshe 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.1E:274a-35: de lta bu ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas 'grub pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:274b-0: myur du zhes bya ba ni lus de nyid dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par @274b rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa des 'grub bo //
T02TD2510.1E:274b-1: 'jig rten gsum las rgyal bcings nas //
T02TD2510.1E:274b-2: zhes bya ba ni dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag chen po bcings nas de bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.1E:274b-3: sngags dang phyag rgyas dngos grub bsgrubs na /
T02TD2510.1E:274b-4: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba bsgom pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:274b-6: rdo rje tshe dang kun du 'gro //
T02TD2510.1E:274b-8: rdo rje tshe ni rdo rje tshe ste /
T02TD2510.1E:274b-9: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
T02TD2510.1E:274b-10: 'phrin las 'ba' zhig gis mtshungs pa ni ma yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:274b-11: sku tshe yang de dang 'dra ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:274b-12: kun du 'gro zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul yang de dang 'dra zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:274b-13: rdo rje dbang gi rgyal por 'gyur //
T02TD2510.1E:274b-14: zhes bya ba ni rin chen h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po grub pas rgyal po nyid grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:274b-15: chos bzang ldan pas 'jig rten dbang //
T02TD2510.1E:274b-16: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po grub pas 'jig rten dbang phyag tu 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:274b-17: las kyi rdo rje khro bo che //
T02TD2510.1E:274b-18: rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.1E:274b-19: zhes bya ba ni las kyi h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po dang khro bo chen po rdo rje las kyi sbyor bas grub par gyur nas rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i las de byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:274b-20: sems dpa' khro bo rab tu bstan //
T02TD2510.1E:274b-21: zhes bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:274b-22: khro bo sems dpa'i sngags kyis grub par gyur nas /
T02TD2510.1E:274b-23: de rab tu brtan pa'i 'bras bu chen por 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:274b-24: khro bo rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:274b-25: khro bo lcags kyus yang dag dgug / ces bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:274b-26: khro bo rdo rje chags pa'i phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:274b-27: rdo rje chags bas chags par byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:274b-28: khro bo rdo rje legs pa'i phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:274b-29: legs par dga' ba ster bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:274b-30: khro bo rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:274b-31: khro gnyer des rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa bcom nas khams gsum du gtogs pa'i rdzas rnams 'bar ba'i lta bas bkug cing bzhag pa ni ma rungs par byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:274b-32: khro bo rdo rje nyi ma ni phyag rgya chen po khro bo'i gzi brjid nyi ma dang mtshungs par ster bar byed do //
T02TD2510.1E:275a-0: khro bo rdo rje dpal gyi phyag rgya chen po dang dpal gyi khro bos khams gsum par gtogs pa'i stobs dang mi @275a * //
T02TD2510.1E:275a-1: 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i don rnams bkug par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:275a-2: khro bo rdo rje bzhad pa'i phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:275a-3: ha ha dgod pas gdug pa dang rang gi rgyud du gtogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bdud byed do //
T02TD2510.1E:275a-4: khro bo rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:275a-5: khro bo chos kyi rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid kyi chos chen po rnams bsdus nas bsgrubs te /
T02TD2510.1E:275a-6: bcing ba'i sbyor ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:275a-7: khro bo rdo rje rnon po'i phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:275a-8: rdo rje ral gris 'dod chags la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:275a-9: phyi rol gyi dgra rnams gcod par byed do //
T02TD2510.1E:275a-10: khro bo rdo rje rgyu'i phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:275a-11: rgyu'i khro bos rang dang gzhan dkyil 'khor du 'jug cing sdug bsngal 'phrog par byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:275a-12: khro bo rdo rje bsrung ba'i phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:275a-13: khro bo smra bas spros pa dang bcas pa'i chos su gtogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'phrog par byed do //
T02TD2510.1E:275a-14: khro rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:275a-15: las kyi khro bo'i sngags kyis las bzang po rab tu byed do //
T02TD2510.1E:275a-16: khro bo rdo rje bsrung ba'i phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:275a-17: khro bo bsrung ba'i sngags des srung bar byed do //
T02TD2510.1E:275a-18: khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:275a-19: khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis 'dod chags la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:275a-20: phyi rol dgra rnams za bar byed do //
T02TD2510.1E:275a-21: khro bo rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:275a-22: khro bo khu tshur gyis dngos grub thams cad ster bar byed do //
T02TD2510.1E:275a-23: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i ni khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2510.1E:275a-26: khro bo las kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi 'bras bu gang yin pa de nyid kyi yang yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:275a-27: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar du ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i 'bras bu nyid yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:275a-28: de ltar phyag rgya chen po bstan nas /
T02TD2510.1E:275a-29: da ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:275a-30: rdo rje ni rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:275a-31: de dag bcing ba ni bcing ba'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:275a-32: rdo rje gnyis las byung ba ni //
T02TD2510.1E:275a-33: dam tshig mchog tu grags pa yin //
T02TD2510.1E:275a-35: rdo rje gnyis ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis te /
T02TD2510.1E:275b-0: de las byung ba ni @275b skyes pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:275b-1: dam tshig mchog ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:275b-3: de dag gi dam tshig mchog bcing ba bshad pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:275b-4: khyad par ci lta bu zhig ce na /
T02TD2510.1E:275b-5: khro bo'i bcing ba zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:275b-6: khros nas bcing ba ni khro bo'i bcing ba ste /
T02TD2510.1E:275b-7: khro bos bcings pas na khro bo'i bcing ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:275b-8: bla na med ces bya ba ni kun nas mchog tu gyur ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:275b-9: lag ngar rdo rjer byas nas su //
T02TD2510.1E:275b-10: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:275b-11: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snying ga'i g-yas phyogs su kha thur du bstan la bzung nas /
T02TD2510.1E:275b-12: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur g-yon pa'i ma khrig ma'i steng du bzhag nas kha thur du bstan te snying gar g-yon phyogs su gzhag pa 'di ni lag ngar rdo rjer byas pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:275b-13: lag dang rdo rjer byas pa de nyid kyis //
T02TD2510.1E:275b-14: mthe'u chung lcags kyur bcing bar bya //
T02TD2510.1E:275b-15: zhes bya ba ni mthe'u chung gnyis lcags kyur byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:275b-16: phan tshun lu gu rgyud du sprel bar byas pa ni mthe'u chung lcags kyur bcing bar byas pa khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:275b-17: ci de tsam gyis sam zhe na ma yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:275b-18: mdzub mo gnyis kyis bsdigs pa na //
T02TD2510.1E:275b-20: mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs nas gang gi tshe ba sdigs pa yin pa de'i tshe 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya bar blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:275b-22: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snying gar kha thur du bstan pa'i mkhrig ma g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur kha thur du bstan pa'i mkhrig ma bzhag ste /
T02TD2510.1E:275b-23: mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du sprel nas mdzub mo bsgrengs te sdigs mdzub tu byas nas 'dzin pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:275b-28: las kyi h'um mdzad rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyang yin la phyis kyang bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:275b-29: de bzhin mdzub mo ngos sbyar te /
T02TD2510.1E:275b-31: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya de nyid mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun lho sbyar nas rdo rje sems ma'i gnas su rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:275b-32: nor bu 'dra bar rab tu dgug / ces bya ba ni de nyid kyis zhes dbang du byed pa dang sbyar ro //
T02TD2510.1E:276a-0: mdzub mo gnyis po de nyid kyi nor bu 'dra bar byas nas rdo rje rin chen ma'i @276a * //
T02TD2510.1E:276a-1: gnas su rdo rje rin chen mar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:276a-2: gung mo mnyam bsgreng padmar bya //
T02TD2510.1E:276a-3: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'i mdzub mo dang gung mo bsgrengs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:276a-4: rgyab kyi cha phan tshun du sen mo sbyar te padma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:276a-5: rdo rje chos ma'i gnas su rdo rje chos mar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:276a-6: gung mo mdzub mo gnyi gar bsdigs //
T02TD2510.1E:276a-7: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya /
T02TD2510.1E:276a-8: ji skad bshad pa'i g-yon pa'i mdzub mo dang gung mo bsgrengs te phan tshun sbyar nas g-yas pa'i mdzub mo dang /
T02TD2510.1E:276a-9: gung mo yang sbyar bar bya ba ni rdo rje las ma'i gnas su rdo rje las ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:276a-10: mdzub mo gnyi ga rdo rjer bya //
T02TD2510.1E:276a-11: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya nyid mdzub mo gnyis kha sbyar nas khab ltar byas pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:276a-12: khro bo rdo rje sems dpa'i'o //
T02TD2510.1E:276a-13: g-yas pa lcags kyur dgug par bya //
T02TD2510.1E:276a-14: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya nyid kyi g-yas pa'i mdzub mo bskums nas lcags kyu ltar byas pa ni khro bo rdo rje rgyal po'i'o //
T02TD2510.1E:276a-15: de nyid h'um zhes bya bar 'dud //
T02TD2510.1E:276a-16: ces bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya las g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus g-yon pa'i lcags kyu 'dren pa ni khro bo rdo rje chags pa'i'o //
T02TD2510.1E:276a-17: legs pa bzhin pa de bzhin te //
T02TD2510.1E:276a-18: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya nyid kyis mdzub mo dang /
T02TD2510.1E:276a-19: mthe bos se gol ba rdebs pa ni khro bo rdo rje legs pa'i'o //
T02TD2510.1E:276a-20: mdzub gnyis dpral bar nye bar bzhag / ces bya ba ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya mdzub mo'i rtse mo gnyis mdzod spur gzhag pa ni khro bo khro gnyer gyi'o //
T02TD2510.1E:276a-21: snying gar mdzub mo nyi ma bskor //
T02TD2510.1E:276a-22: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyas snying ga'i phyogs su bzhag nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar bskor ba ni khro bo rdo rje nyi ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.1E:276a-23: lag ngar brkyang ste spyi bor gzhag / ces bya ba ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya nyid las lag dar gnyis brkyang ste spyi bor gzhag pa ni khro bo rdo rje dpal gyi'o //
T02TD2510.1E:276a-24: mdzub mo kha nas dgod ltar bya //
T02TD2510.1E:276b-0: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya nyid las mdzub mo'i rtse mo gnyis khar gzhag @276b ba'i tshul du byed pa ni khro bo rdo rje bzhad pa'i'o //
T02TD2510.1E:276b-1: mdzub mo'i sen mo sbyar bar bya //
T02TD2510.1E:276b-2: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi sen mo sbyar ba ni khro bo rdo rje chos kyi'o //
T02TD2510.1E:276b-3: g-yas pas ral gri bcangs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:276b-4: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya nyid las g-yas pa'i mdzub mo rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbyor ba las ral gri 'dzin pa'i tshul du byed pa ni khro bo rdo rje rnon po'i'o //
T02TD2510.1E:276b-5: gung mdzub mnyam bsgreng 'khor lo yi //
T02TD2510.1E:276b-6: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum rnam par gyal ba'i phyag rgya nyid las /
T02TD2510.1E:276b-7: gung mo dang mdzub mor bcas pa bsgrengs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:276b-8: rdo rje thal mo'i tshul gyis de'i dbus ma bcings pa ni khro bo rdo rje rgyu'i'o //
T02TD2510.1E:276b-9: kha yi nang nas dbyung bar bya //
T02TD2510.1E:276b-10: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya las /
T02TD2510.1E:276b-11: tshig 'byin pa'i tshul gyis kha'i phyogs su gyen du 'dren pa ni khro bo rdo rje smra ba'i'o //
T02TD2510.1E:276b-12: mdzub mo gung mo rdo rjer bya //
T02TD2510.1E:276b-13: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya las /
T02TD2510.1E:276b-14: g-yas pa'i gung mo dang mdzub mo gnyis sbyar nas bsgreng ste /
T02TD2510.1E:276b-15: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis khab ltar byas pa ni khro bo rdo rje las kyi'o //
T02TD2510.1E:276b-16: mdzub mo gnyis ni mgul par bskor //
T02TD2510.1E:276b-17: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi mgrin pa rkam pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa ni khro bo rdo rje srung ba'i'o //
T02TD2510.1E:276b-18: mdzub mo gnyis ni mche ba che //
T02TD2510.1E:276b-19: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya nyid las /
T02TD2510.1E:276b-20: mdzub mo gnyis brkyang nas mche ba'i tshul du khar 'dzin pa ni khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi'o //
T02TD2510.1E:276b-21: mdzub mo bkug pa rdo rje bcings //
T02TD2510.1E:276b-22: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya las /
T02TD2510.1E:276b-23: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo rang gi mthe bo'i rgyab sbyar la /
T02TD2510.1E:276b-24: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo'i yang de bzhin du byas pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:276b-25: khro bo rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:276b-26: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa //
T02TD2510.1E:276b-27: sems ma'i phyag rgya de nyid h'um //
T02TD2510.1E:276b-28: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por sgeg mo la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan pa gang yin pa de nyid kyis khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por yang /
T02TD2510.1E:277a-1: gnyis kyi sdigs mdzub bcing ba'i sbyor bas dam tshig phyag rgyar 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.1E:277a-2: rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid bcings la /
T02TD2510.1E:277a-4: snying gar mthe po bsnyams la gzhag / rab tu brkyang ba phreng ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:277a-5: thal mo sbyar te kha nas dbyung //
T02TD2510.1E:277a-6: gar las thal sbyar spyi bor gzhag /
T02TD2510.1E:277a-7: rdo rje bcing ba thur du blugs //
T02TD2510.1E:277a-8: rang gi thal sbyar gyen du gtor //
T02TD2510.1E:277a-9: rdo rje bsnyams te rab tu bsdam //
T02TD2510.1E:277a-10: rab tu brkyang nas byung ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:277a-11: mdzub mo gcig tu bkug pa dang //
T02TD2510.1E:277a-12: mthe bong gnyis ni mdud pa dang //
T02TD2510.1E:277a-13: mthe bong mdzub mo gdu bur bcing //
T02TD2510.1E:277a-14: rdo rje bcing ba mdzub mor bsdam //
T02TD2510.1E:277a-15: zhes bya ba'o zhes chos kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:277a-16: h'um zhes bya bar lhan cig go //
T02TD2510.1E:277a-17: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po nyid du sgeg mo la sogs pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya gsungs pa gang yin pa de nyid 'dir yang yi ge h'um dang bcas pas sgeg mo la sogs pa'i phyag rgyar 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.1E:277a-18: des na de yang ma h'a r'a ti h'um /
T02TD2510.1E:277a-22: pra ha la da ni h'um /
T02TD2510.1E:277a-29: ghanda aa:a'a:h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:277a-30: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i yang hum tr'm hr'i:aa: zhes bya bar blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:277a-31: rdo rje rnams kyi dam tshig ste /
T02TD2510.1E:277a-32: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po de'i las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.1E:277a-33: rdo rje rigs ni chen po yi //
T02TD2510.1E:277a-34: las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus nas //
T02TD2510.1E:277a-35: zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdus pa'i sdom pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:277a-36: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis su bshad ;
T02TD2510.1E:277a-37: / ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das khro bo rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya de gnyis su byas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gnyis su 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.1E:277a-38: de nas rdo rje 'gying ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis sbyor bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:277a-39: de'i don ni 'di yin te bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje bsnyems pa'i tshul du byas la rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las de'i las kyi phyag rgyar gsungs so //
T02TD2510.1E:277a-40: sogs pa smos pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pas gnas pa la sogs pa gar yin pa de ni rdo rje 'gying ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis so //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-0: tshul ni rdo rje bsnyems pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis @277b rdo rje bsnyems ma la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor bas so //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-1: bshad ces bya ba ni bstan pas so //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-3: gang dang gang gi phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-4: las kyi phyogs ni gang du ba //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-5: de dang der ni bsgyur nas kyang //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-6: phyag rgya der ni sbyar bar bya //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-8: rdo re sems dpa' la sogs pa gang dang gang gi las kyi phyag rgya gang dang gang dag bshad pa'i gnas de dang de rnams su las kyi phyag rgya phyogs de dang de rnams su bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-10: las zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.1E:277b-11: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i las rnams bskyed pa'i rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-12: de dang der ni bsgyur nas kyang //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-13: zhes bya ba ni de dang de nyid du gar gyi sbyor ba de bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-15: las kyi phyag rgya thams cad ni //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-16: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las 'byung ste /
T02TD2510.1E:277b-17: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bcing ba'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa las /
T02TD2510.1E:277b-19: langs nas gar bya ba las 'byung ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-20: de las rdo rje dbyings su gsungs pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:277b-21: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-22: g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng par bya //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-23: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya chen //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-24: sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'i //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-25: bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyis ka yis //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-26: lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-27: mda' 'phang pa yi tshul dang ni //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-28: legs so zhes pa snying gar gzhag / dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-29: snying gar nyi ma brtan par bya //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-30: g-yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs//
T02TD2510.1E:277b-31: de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-32: g-yas pa yis ni g-yon pa dbye //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-33: snying gar g-yon pa ral gri mdud //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-34: mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-35: rdo rje gnyis ka kha nas dbyung //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-36: rdo rje gar bskor bkrol ba yi //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-37: thal mo dgra ma pa spyi bor gzhag / go cha mthe'u chung mche ba dang //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-38: khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-39: rdo rje 'gying ba'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-40: bsam pa g-yos pas 'dud par bya //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-41: rdo rje bcing dang kha nas dbyung //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-42: rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yin //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-43: rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2510.1E:277b-44: bdug pa la sogs de bzhin sbyin //
T02TD2510.1E:278a-2: phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa po //
T02TD2510.1E:278a-3: mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing ba ni //
T02TD2510.1E:278a-4: mthe chung las te lcags kyu ba'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2510.1E:278a-5: bsam pa g-yos pas 'dud par bya //
T02TD2510.1E:278a-6: rdo rje ni bsnyams te mnan //
T02TD2510.1E:278a-8: 'dir khyad par ni 'di yin par blta bar bya ste rdo rje h'um mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.1E:278a-9: khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2510.1E:278a-10: rdo rje sems ma rnams ni rdo rje bsnyems ma las lag pa gnyis ka 'degs pa'i tshul du byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:278a-12: khro bo rdo rje khro gnyer dang /
T02TD2510.1E:278a-13: rdo rje rin chen ma rnams ni rdo rje gnyis dbang bskur ba'i tshul du byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:278a-15: khro bo rdo rje chos dang /
T02TD2510.1E:278a-16: rdo rje chos ma rnams ni g-yas pas g-yon pa 'byed pa'i tshul du byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:278a-18: khro bo rdo rje las dang /
T02TD2510.1E:278a-19: rdo rje las ma rnams ni rdo rje gar bskor ba bkrol ba'i thal mo sbyar pa spyi gtsug tu gzhag pa ni las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:278a-20: de la gzhan dag ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyir yang 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.1E:278a-21: gang gi phyir de'i bskyod pa la sogs pa'i gnas na gnas pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
T02TD2510.1E:278a-23: gang gi phyir de mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i gnas la gnas su zin kyang /
T02TD2510.1E:278a-24: 'khor los sgyur ba yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:278a-25: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin ni ma yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:278a-26: de nyid rdo rje 'khor los sgyur ba'i las kyi phyag rgya yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:278a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyar rnam par mi gzhag pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:278a-29: don thams cad grub par ni mi bskyod pa'i gnas na gnas pa yang /
T02TD2510.1E:278a-30: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rang bzhin yin pas 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya yin pa bzhin no //
T02TD2510.1E:278a-31: dpal mchog dang po la sogs pa'i rgyud rnams la /
T02TD2510.1E:278a-32: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya kho na rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya gsungs pas /
T02TD2510.1E:278a-34: de ltar khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i phyag rgya rnams bstan nas /
T02TD2510.1E:278a-35: da ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.1E:278b-0: khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar du khro bo thams cad kyi bzlas pa byed pa na @278b yang ;
T02TD2510.1E:278b-1: dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad du byas la las rnams bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir de nas 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa spyi'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do zhes bya ba smos te spyi ni khro bo'i lha thams cad kyi thun mong ngo //
T02TD2510.1E:278b-2: 'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya ni //
T02TD2510.1E:278b-3: ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2510.1E:278b-4: rdo rje mdzub mo'i dam tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:278b-5: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje h'um mdzad bzhi po de'i rdo rje mdzub mo'i dam tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:278b-7: rdo rje h'um zhes sngags kyis te //
T02TD2510.1E:278b-9: de yang 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:278b-10: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sngags dang /
T02TD2510.1E:278b-11: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya gang yin pa des 'di dang gang yang rung ba'i sngags bzlas pa'i sbyor bas sgrub pa po mngon par 'dod pa'i las thams cad sgrub par byed do //
T02TD2510.1E:278b-12: mthe'u chung mdzub mo lcags kyur bcas //
T02TD2510.1E:278b-14: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur mdun du kha thur du bstan la /
T02TD2510.1E:278b-15: de'i steng du g-yas pa gan rgyal du bzhag ste mthe'u chung gnyis lcags sgrog tu byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:278b-16: sdigs mdzub gnyis pa bcing ba ni khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.1E:278b-17: h'um takki dza: zhes bya ba 'di dang /
T02TD2510.1E:278b-18: lha chen po la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i 'khor thams cad dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:278b-19: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.1E:278b-20: bdag nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du bskyed par bya'o zhes blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:278b-21: rig pa dam pa thams cad kyi //
T02TD2510.1E:278b-22: 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bshad //
T02TD2510.1E:278b-23: ces bya ba ni rig pa dam pa thams cad ni /
T02TD2510.1E:278b-29: de dag las khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'i mchog tu bshad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.1E:278b-30: gzhan dag ni rig pa dam pa'i phyag rgya thams cad bskyed pa'i rgyu ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar bshad do zhes sems na de yang mi rigs te /
T02TD2510.1E:278b-32: de bzhin mdzub mo nges sbyar la //
T02TD2510.1E:278b-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang yin pa 'di nyid kyis gtso bor bshad do zhes zer ro //
T02TD2510.1E:278b-34: thams cad kyang ni gnon pa ste //
T02TD2510.1E:278b-35: zhes bya ba ni lha chen po la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:279a-0: @279a * // 'dod pa'i rgyal pos khams gsum pa bkug nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:279a-1: h'um zhes bya bas mnan par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:279a-2: de bzhin las rnams thams cad byed //
T02TD2510.1E:279a-3: ces bya ba ni ji ltar khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas mnan pa de bzhin du las thams cad kyang bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:279a-5: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud las /
T02TD2510.1E:279a-6: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.1E:279a-7: las brgya rtsa brgyad bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:279a-9: gnon pas 'dul ba rnams la gnon pa dang bslang bas 'dul ba rnams la slong ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:279a-10: btang bas 'dul ba rnams la btang ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:279a-11: bkug pas 'dul ba rnams la 'gugs par byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD2510.1E:279a-12: rdo rje mdzub mo gnyis legs par //
T02TD2510.1E:279a-13: rab mnyam bzhag la bsnyams nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:279a-14: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis bslangs te brkyang nas rtse mo sbyar la 'og tu bstan la 'degs pa ni rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:279a-15: rdo rje mdzub gnyis legs par yang //
T02TD2510.1E:279a-16: rdo rje bcing bas bcings nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:279a-17: zhes bya ba ni khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis lcags sgrog tu sbrel la bsgyur te /
T02TD2510.1E:279a-18: spyi gtsug tu gzhag pa ni rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:279a-19: rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te //
T02TD2510.1E:279a-20: mthe bo bsnyams la nang du gzhug / ces bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
T02TD2510.1E:279a-21: mthe bo bsnyams la nang du gzhug pa ni dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur gyi tshul gyis mdzub mo gnyis kyis rang gi mthe bo'i rgyab tu mnan nas /
T02TD2510.1E:279a-23: g-yas kyi phyogs su bsgrub par bya ba 'gugs par sems pa 'di ni khro bo'i zhabs 'og tu 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:279a-24: 'jig rten gsum rgyal bcings nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:279a-25: gang gi gzugs la rkang g-yon pas //
T02TD2510.1E:279a-26: zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba de bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:279a-27: lha chen po la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan mnan nas /
T02TD2510.1E:279a-28: aom badzra aa kra ma ho zhes bya ba des ci 'dod pa'i khro bo'i bzlas pa byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:279a-29: zla ba phyed sbyor ba byas nas bsgrub ba byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:279a-30: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te //
T02TD2510.1E:279b-0: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis shing ljon @279b pa gnyis su bsams te /
T02TD2510.1E:279b-1: bsgrub par bya ba la bsnun par bsams na /
T02TD2510.1E:279b-2: rdo rje khu tshur de gnyis gcig la gcig bsdams nas /
T02TD2510.1E:279b-3: aom badzra a'a be sha ha pa tram ta tam zhes brjod pa des lha chen po la sogs pa sems can thams cad dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:279b-4: de nas de rang gi ngang gis bdag nyid la dbab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:279b-5: rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings te //
T02TD2510.1E:279b-6: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:279b-7: mdzub mo gnyis go cha 'ching ba'i tshul du phyag bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:279b-8: aom buddha mee tri badzra raksha ham /
T02TD2510.1E:279b-9: zhes brjod pa des lha chen po la sogs pa'i sems can rnams sdug bsngal bsal bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:279b-10: rang ngam gzhan la 'dis bsrung ba ni 'bras bu yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:279b-11: rdo rje mthil du bcings nas su //
T02TD2510.1E:279b-12: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje lag mthil du bcings nas /
T02TD2510.1E:279b-13: mthe bo gnyis kyis khros nas dgab par bya ba de nyid kyis rdo rje'i rigs chen po rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:279b-14: 'di nyid bcings pas 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo ma lus pa'i dam tshig 'dzin pa'i las kyi dus su'am /
T02TD2510.1E:279b-15: aom badzra sa ma ya grihna bandha sa ma yam zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog bsgom pa'i dus su 'di gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:279b-16: slob dpon gyis khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por slob dpon dang slob ma rnams gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:279b-17: sems dpa' rdo rje dam byas te //
T02TD2510.1E:279b-18: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i sems ma rdo rje ma bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:279b-19: bstan par byas nas mthe'u chung gnyis khab ltar bsgrengs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:279b-21: mdzub mo gnyis kyi steng du mnan pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:279b-22: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog bsgom pa'i dus sam /
T02TD2510.1E:279b-23: las kyi dus su khams gsum pa thams cad dam tshig 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya gnyis pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:279b-25: rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che //
T02TD2510.1E:279b-26: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa //
T02TD2510.1E:279b-28: / rigs rnams myur du thal bar rlog / aom ha na sa ma ya h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:279b-29: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te //
T02TD2510.1E:279b-30: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
T02TD2510.1E:279b-31: mdzub mo gnyis lcags sgrog tu sprel te /
T02TD2510.1E:279b-32: g-yas phyogs su stobs kyis gcus nas /
T02TD2510.1E:280a-0: slar yang g-yon gyi phyogs su gcu @280a * //
T02TD2510.1E:280a-1: ba ni las kyi dus sam /
T02TD2510.1E:280a-2: dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi dus su lha 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:280a-4: aom ba linta aom ba lin badzra a'a karsha ya dza: rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te /
T02TD2510.1E:280a-5: de zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje bcing ba dam por byas te /
T02TD2510.1E:280a-6: mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba ste ;
T02TD2510.1E:280a-7: bkug nas mthe bo gnyis dbus su bzhag la /
T02TD2510.1E:280a-8: btsir pa ni bar snang gi lha rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:280a-10: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog bsgom pa'i dus su bar snang ba rnams la bka' bsgo ba la sbyar bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:280a-11: 'di'i sngags ni h'um badzra aagra pi ta ya h'um zhes bya ba'o//
T02TD2510.1E:280a-12: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis ka las //
T02TD2510.1E:280a-13: mthe'u chung gnyis ka bcings nas kyang //
T02TD2510.1E:280a-14: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis gyen du kha bstan la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis so sor lcags sgrog ltar sbrel nas bsgyur zhing bzlog ste /
T02TD2510.1E:280a-15: spyi bor gzhag pa ni nam mkha' la spyod pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:280a-16: 'di yang dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bsgom pa'i dus dang /
T02TD2510.1E:280a-17: las kyi dus der rang gi bka' bsgo ba la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:280a-19: aom badzra m'a la aa gra bam zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:280a-20: rdo rje bcing ba bsdams nas su //
T02TD2510.1E:280a-21: rdo rje bsrung ba btsir bar bya //
T02TD2510.1E:280a-22: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings su gsungs pa'i rdo rje srung ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya snying gar rdo rje bsdams te btsir ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:280a-23: sa la spyod pa rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:280a-25: dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi dus su rang gi bka' bsgo ba la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:280a-27: aom badzra bandha ham zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:280a-28: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te //
T02TD2510.1E:280a-29: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
T02TD2510.1E:280a-30: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo g-yas pa'i mthe'u chung gis mdud nas gcu zhing slar yang gcu ba byas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:280a-31: drag tu gtogs pa ni sa 'og na gnas pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:280a-32: 'di yang dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi dus sam /
T02TD2510.1E:280a-33: las kyi dus su bka' bsgo ba byas na 'di las mi 'da' bar byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:280a-35: aom badzra p'a t'a la bhanydza bhanydza h'uzm phat /
T02TD2510.1E:280a-36: rdo rje bcing ba sbrel ba ni //
T02TD2510.1E:280a-37: mdzub mo gnyi ga dam po ste //
T02TD2510.1E:280a-39: lag pa gnyis thar du bstan la mdzub mo gnyis lcags sgrog tu sbrel la /
T02TD2510.1E:280b-0: gung mo dang mthe bo khab @280b ltar bya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:280b-1: mthe bo rtse mo gnyis dpral ba'i phyags su bzhag la bskor ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:280b-2: he ru ka rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:280b-3: ma mo thams cad pa'i phyag rgya thams cad dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gam /
T02TD2510.1E:280b-4: las kyi dus su rang gi las la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:280b-6: aom he ru ka badzra sa ma ya sarbba du shta sa mu spra bhanydza ga h'u phat ces bya ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:280b-7: rod rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te //
T02TD2510.1E:280b-8: mnyam par bzhag ste snying gar gzhag / khro bo'i khu tshur gyis btsir ba //
T02TD2510.1E:280b-10: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la rgyab gnyis sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste /
T02TD2510.1E:280b-11: sen mo sbyar nas bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:280b-12: rtse mo btsir bas 'byung po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:280b-14: srin po la sogs pa rnams 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:280b-15: 'dis 'byung bo la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bkug nas /
T02TD2510.1E:280b-16: sngags dang phyag rgya rnams thal bar byed do //
T02TD2510.1E:280b-18: aom dushta badzra kro dha ha na da ha pa tsa bi dhvansa ya bi ka ra du shta sa ma ya mu dra mandalam /
T02TD2510.1E:280b-23: badzra sa ma ya h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:280b-25: snying gar rdo rje khu tshur gnyis sbyar la /
T02TD2510.1E:280b-26: mdzub mo gnyis so sor bsgrengs nas sbyar te /
T02TD2510.1E:280b-27: phan tshun gnyi ga btsir ba ni //
T02TD2510.1E:280b-28: gdug pa 'joms pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:280b-30: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi dus su sngon du sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:280b-31: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la /
T02TD2510.1E:280b-32: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo bkug nas gzung //
T02TD2510.1E:280b-33: rab tu khros pas drag btogs na //
T02TD2510.1E:280b-34: ri rab kyang ni ltung bar byed //
T02TD2510.1E:280b-35: ces bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings pa'i g-yon pa'i mdzub mo g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus bzung nas /
T02TD2510.1E:280b-36: yang dang yang du drag tu btogs pas 'byung po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:280b-38: srin po la sogs pa'i gdug pa thams cad 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:280b-40: aom ma h'a badzra kr'u ra kro dha p'a ta ya sarbba dushta manta lam bi n'a sha ya sarba du shna sa ma yam bi ka ra bi dhvansa ya spho ta yam bha nydza sarba dushta sa ma ya mu dra bandha gri hna ha na da ha pa tsa dushta sa ma ya sa stva na badzra sa ma ya h'um phat ces bya ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:280b-41: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la //
T02TD2510.1E:281a-0: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus @281a * //
T02TD2510.1E:281a-2: / rab tu khros shing bkug pa yis //
T02TD2510.1E:281a-3: gdon rnams kun la dbang du byed //
T02TD2510.1E:281a-4: ces bya ba ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo bsgreng ba la /
T02TD2510.1E:281a-5: g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis mdzub mo'i lcags kyur drangs pa /
T02TD2510.1E:281a-6: mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:281a-8: aom badzra a'a karsha sh'i ghram sarbba dushta gha na ha na badzra dha ra sa tye na h'um dza:/
T02TD2510.1E:281a-10: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi dus su dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:281a-11: rdo rje bcing ba byas nas su //
T02TD2510.1E:281a-12: lag ngar snying gar shin tu bsdam //
T02TD2510.1E:281a-13: rdo rje mdzub nyid mchan khung du //
T02TD2510.1E:281a-14: brud pa yis ni snying 'byin to //
T02TD2510.1E:281a-15: zhes bya ba ni rang gi snying ga'i phyogs su lag ngar gnyis rdo rje bcing ba dam por byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:281a-16: rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyur byas la mchan khung gnyis brud pa ni snying 'byin pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:281a-18: aom badzra pra ti gri hna hri da ya a'a karsha ya aadya yam sa ti sa sa dha ra dhi na mri ya ti /
T02TD2510.1E:281a-19: ta ssya hri da yam nishta sa tu sa ma ya h'um dza: zhes sngar bshad pa bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02TD2510.1E:281a-20: rnal 'byor ma thams cad 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:281a-21: dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi dus sam /
T02TD2510.1E:281a-22: dur khrod du las byed pa'i dus sam /
T02TD2510.1E:281a-24: rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyis bzung bas na /
T02TD2510.1E:281a-25: bkug nas phyis snying 'byin pa'i phyag rgyas sems can thams cad kyi snying 'byin par byed pa de byin la /
T02TD2510.1E:281a-26: de nas des sgrub pa pos bka' stsal pa bzhin byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:281a-27: mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yis //
T02TD2510.1E:281a-28: mthe bo gnyis ka'i drung du ni //
T02TD2510.1E:281a-29: yid kyis khros nas btsir bar bya //
T02TD2510.1E:281a-31: zhes bya ba ni lag mthil gnyis su mthe bong gnyis bzhag nas mdzub mo'i rtse mo gnyis mthe bo gnyis kyi drung du 'khor ba dang bcas pas btsir ba ni rims la sogs pa 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.1E:281a-32: 'di dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi dus sam /
T02TD2510.1E:281a-33: las kyi dus su 'phags pa'i spyi bo'i gtsug tor gyis rims la sogs pa'i nad rnams 'gugs par byed do //
T02TD2510.1E:281a-35: aom badzra ma ya aa na ya /
T02TD2510.1E:281a-36: sarba dushta dzva r'a dhi n'a sha ya h'um phat ces bya ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:281a-37: rdo rje thal mo dam byas te //
T02TD2510.1E:281b-0: mdzub mo @281b gnyis ni bkug nas su //
T02TD2510.1E:281b-2: rdo rje thal mo'i mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu ltar bkug nas /
T02TD2510.1E:281b-3: mthe bo gnyis mnyam par sbyar nas mnan pa ni sdig pa 'phrog pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:281b-4: de ni rims la sogs pa'i nad rnams zad par bya ba'i don du sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:281b-5: de'i snying po ni 'di yin te ;
T02TD2510.1E:281b-6: aom badzra karmma bi sho dh'a ya sarbba aa ba ra na ne buddha sattya na sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:281b-7: rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis nang du //
T02TD2510.1E:281b-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis lcags sgrog ltar bcings nas gyen du 'phang ba ni ltung ba slong ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:281b-10: aom sarbba aa pa ya a'a karsha ni bi sho dha na badzra sa ma ya h'um phat /
T02TD2510.1E:281b-11: rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te //
T02TD2510.1E:281b-12: gung mo gnyi nga ngos sbyar nas //
T02TD2510.1E:281b-13: mtha'am bzhi ni ngos sprad nas //
T02TD2510.1E:281b-14: sdig pa 'joms par grags pa yin //
T02TD2510.1E:281b-15: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bcing ba brtan par byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:281b-16: mthe bo dang mthe chung bzhi gcig la gcig ngos sbyar nas /
T02TD2510.1E:281b-17: gung mo gnyis bsgreng ba'i rtse mo sbyar nas /
T02TD2510.1E:281b-18: phan tshun dral ba ni sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:281b-20: aom badzra p'a bi spho ta ya sarbba aa pa ya banbha na ne tra ku sh'a sarbba aa pa ye ga te bhya:/
T02TD2510.1E:281b-21: sarbba sa t'a n'am sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra sa ma ya trata ces bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:281b-22: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:281b-23: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i cho gas lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:281b-24: rang gi khro bo'i sngags kyis yi ge bzlas pa 'bum byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:281b-25: de nas btsan thabs kyi sgrub pa byed par 'dod na /
T02TD2510.1E:281b-26: rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pas bdag nyid bsrung ba byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:281b-27: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2510.1E:281b-28: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sngags kyi bdag nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du byas te /
T02TD2510.1E:281b-29: gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan mdun du bzhag la /
T02TD2510.1E:281b-31: ming gzugs brnyan gyi snying gar bcug nas /
T02TD2510.1E:281b-32: khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal pos bsgrub bya de 'gugs te /
T02TD2510.1E:281b-33: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba bcings nas /
T02TD2510.1E:281b-34: yi ge h'um gis ltung bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:281b-35: de nas khro bo zhabs 'og tu 'gugs pas bkug nas gzugs brnyan de dang nye bar bzhag nas /
T02TD2510.1E:281b-36: khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:282a-2: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa'i phyag rgya cing ngo //
T02TD2510.1E:282a-3: aom badzra aa kra ma ho: zhes bya bas gnon pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:282a-4: aom badzra a'a be sha ha na pa ta trata ces bya bas dbab cing gzing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:282a-5: buddha mee tri zhes bya bas babs pa'i sdug bsngal bsal la ;
T02TD2510.1E:282a-6: khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.1E:282a-7: aom badzra sa ma ya grihna bandha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sarbba ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2510.1E:282a-8: dri dhome bha ba sthi to me bha ba aadzyo me bha ba aa pra ti ha tyo me bha ba /
T02TD2510.1E:282a-9: sarbba karmma su tsa me tsittam shre ya:ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha h'um zhes brjod nas /
T02TD2510.1E:282a-10: dam tshig la gzhag pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:282a-11: rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che ;
T02TD2510.1E:282a-12: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan pas /
T02TD2510.1E:282a-13: rdo rje he ru ka'i phyag rgyas rnag gi las la sbyar bas gnod sbyin mo thams cad bud med kyi gzugs kyi chung ma dang /
T02TD2510.1E:282a-14: bu mo la sogs pa byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:282a-15: drag po la sogs pa skyes pa'i gzugs thams cad nas /
T02TD2510.1E:282a-16: bran gyi mthar thug pa'i bar du lha thams cad bkug nas /
T02TD2510.1E:282a-17: snying po dang phyag rgyas rang gi las la sbyar la /
T02TD2510.1E:282a-18: kye ci zhig bgyi zhes zer ro //
T02TD2510.1E:282a-19: de nas rang gi khro bo'i lha'i phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:282a-22: las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.1E:282a-23: bsgrub par bya ba'i ming dang /
T02TD2510.1E:282a-25: rang gi khro bo'i sngags kyi bzlas pa zla ba phyed byas pas gzugs brnyan de nas sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:282a-26: de nas sgrub pa pos khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.1E:282a-27: h'um zhes bya bar rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:282a-28: de nas bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du gnas te /
T02TD2510.1E:282a-29: gnang ba nod cing kye ci zhig bgyi zhes zer ro //
T02TD2510.1E:282a-31: rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che //
T02TD2510.1E:282a-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod cing dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan to //
T02TD2510.1E:282a-33: de nas lha la sogs pa bkug la /
T02TD2510.1E:282a-34: snying po dang phyag rgya rnams la nges par sbyar nas /
T02TD2510.1E:282a-37: de nas rkang pas gnon pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas rkang pa'i 'og nas bton te /
T02TD2510.1E:282a-38: rdo rje slong bas bslangs nas /
T02TD2510.1E:282a-39: rdo rje rin chen gyis dbang bskur nas /
T02TD2510.1E:282a-40: bsgrub par bya ba ci bde bar gzhag go //
T02TD2510.1E:282a-43: srin po la sogs pa'i gdon rnams las byed par 'dod na /
T02TD2510.1E:282b-0: sngar @282b bshad pa bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor bas sngags lan 'bum brjod pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:282b-1: khro bo gzhan gyi sbyor bas re re zhing bsnyen pa khri byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:282b-2: khro bo rdo rje lcags kyus gdon rnams bkug la /
T02TD2510.1E:282b-3: khro bo stobs po ches de dag dkyil 'khor gyi sngags dang phyag rgya bza' ba dang /
T02TD2510.1E:282b-4: slar yang dbu dang phyag stong phrag mnga' ba'i khro bo stobs po ches ma rungs pa bza' bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:282b-5: mkha' 'gro ma dang rnal 'byor ma'i gdon rnams bkug nas mnyes par byas te /
T02TD2510.1E:282b-6: sngags gnyi ga re re zhing 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:282b-7: de nas khro bo gzhan gyi rnal 'byor pas de'i mtshan mor dur khrod dam ;
T02TD2510.1E:282b-8: lha khang stong par de bkug cing /
T02TD2510.1E:282b-9: snying po drangs nas phyag rgyas mnyes par byas pas /
T02TD2510.1E:282b-10: de dag gi mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi bar du byed do //
T02TD2510.1E:282b-11: brgya la gnod par byed na rdo rje he ru ka'i phyag rgyas de gzhom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:282b-12: rims la sogs pa 'joms par byed kyang /
T02TD2510.1E:282b-13: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor bas sngags gnyis so sor bzlas pa 'bum bya ba'am /
T02TD2510.1E:282b-14: yang na khro bo gzhan gyi sbyor bas kyang ngo //
T02TD2510.1E:282b-15: de nas khro bo spyi gtsug bsdams la /
T02TD2510.1E:282b-16: rims la sogs pa'i nad rnams bkug ste /
T02TD2510.1E:282b-17: de nas bsgrub par bya ba'i spyi bo nas brtsams nas /
T02TD2510.1E:282b-18: lus kun bkang na de dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.1E:282b-19: rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa'i spyi'i cho ga ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2510.1E:282b-20: rdo rje phyag rgya bzung nas ni //
T02TD2510.1E:282b-21: dkyil 'khor chen por srang bu bre //
T02TD2510.1E:282b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thog mar slob dpon gyi g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rigs thams cad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi srad bu tshon sna lnga'i sku pa blangs te /
T02TD2510.1E:282b-23: tshangs pa'i thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:282b-24: phyi nas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:282b-25: rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyi ga yi //
T02TD2510.1E:282b-26: mdzub mo rtse mo rab sbyar ba //
T02TD2510.1E:282b-27: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis ka gyen du bstan la /
T02TD2510.1E:282b-29: phan tshun du logs kyi rtse mo sbyar nas /
T02TD2510.1E:282b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'bar ba'i lta bas bkug ste /
T02TD2510.1E:282b-31: tshon rtsi la gzhug par bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:282b-32: tshon thams cad byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:282b-34: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:283a-1: dkar po la ni rnam par snang mdzad dkar po'i gzugs kyis so //
T02TD2510.1E:283a-2: sngon po la ni mi bskyod pa sngon po'i gzugs kyis so //
T02TD2510.1E:283a-3: ser po la ni rin chen 'byung ldan ser po'i gzugs kyis so //
T02TD2510.1E:283a-4: dmar po la ni 'od dpag tu med pa dmar po'i gzugs kyis so //
T02TD2510.1E:283a-5: ljang gu la ni don yod grub pa ljang gu'i gzugs kyis gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:283a-6: mdzub mo'i rtse mo yang dag par //
T02TD2510.1E:283a-7: sbyar la bkan te bsdams nas su //
T02TD2510.1E:283a-8: zhes bya ba ni tshon rtsi byin gyis rlob pa'i phyag rgya nyid sngon du bstan par byas la /
T02TD2510.1E:283a-9: sgo 'byed pa'i dus su mdzub mo gnyis so sor byas pa ni /
T02TD2510.1E:283a-11: rab tu khro nas sgo dbye ba'i sbyor ba 'dir bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:283a-13: aom badzra audgha ta sa ma ya pra be sha ya h'um zhes bya ba la'o //
T02TD2510.1E:283a-14: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.1E:283a-17: las kyi phyag rgya rnams sgrub par byed pa'i mtshan ma thob nas phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:283a-20: las kyi phyag rgya rang nyid kyis bcings la /
T02TD2510.1E:283a-21: g-yon brkyang ba'i tshul gyis gnas te /
T02TD2510.1E:283a-22: shin tu khros pa'i khro bo'i skad 'byin cing khro bo'i lta bas bltas nas /
T02TD2510.1E:283a-23: bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.1E:283a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.1E:283a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la /
T02TD2510.1E:283a-26: thams cad kyang yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
T02TD2510.1E:283a-27: de dag gi rdo rje dam tshig gi rdo rje'i rigs chen po de nyid gsal bar byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs de nyid ni rtog pa'i rgyal po'o //
T02TD2510.1E:283a-28: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa ji skad bshad pa rdzogs so zhes bya ba ni ma lus pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:283a-29: cho ga lhag ma ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa nyid du blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:283a-30: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'grel pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2510.1E:283b-0: // / de ltar khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dum bu'i rdo rje'i rigs chen po'i phyag rgya chen po gtso bor gyur pa'i @283b khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad nas /
T02TD2510.1E:283b-1: da ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa des 'dul ba'i 'gro ba rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.1E:283b-2: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.1E:283b-3: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa'o //
T02TD2510.1E:283b-4: dang po sbyor ba'i rjes thogs la //
T02TD2510.1E:283b-6: de la dang po sbyor ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa nyid yin par blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.1E:283b-7: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD2510.1E:283b-8: yang zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po la ltos pas na yang ngo //
T02TD2510.1E:283b-9: rdo rje gzungs kyi zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.1E:283b-10: khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:283b-11: byams pa'i mthar thug pa de dag ni gzungs so //
T02TD2510.1E:283b-12: de dag ni dran pa dang /
T02TD2510.1E:283b-14: yang dag par ldan pa gnyis su med pa'i sems de ni rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:283b-15: rdo rje khro bo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya lha mo la sogs pa'i gzugs de las byung ba'o //
T02TD2510.1E:283b-16: gang gi phyir phyag na rdo rje'i thugs su gyur ba'i rdo rje de nyid rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya las byung ba'i rdo rje des byin gyis brlabs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de'i don gyi rjes su song ba'i ming de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje khro bo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kar gnas pa'i sems dpa'i rdo rje'i mthu las byung ba'i gzungs kyi lha mo sprul pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.1E:283b-17: phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka nas //
